Jobtitle: Sales Executive/พนักงานขาย
column8: พนักงานขายเคมีและบริการทำความสะอาด บริษัท ราชาโยค จำกัด เราเป็นผู้ผลิตเคมีภัณฑ์และให้บริการทำความสะอาดครบวงจรมามากกว่า 40 ปี เราจัดส่งพนักงานกว่า 5,000 คน ให้แก่หน่วยงานต่างๆ เช่น โรงแรม โรงพยาบาล โรงงาน ห้างสรรพสินค้าชั้นนำ มหาวิทยาลัยต่างๆ ทั่วประเทศ ผ่านทางสาขาของเรา 9 สาขา ที่กระจายอยู่ทั่วประเทศ Job Responsibilities: ขยายยอดขายทางด้านเคมีและการให้บริการทำความสะอาด แก่ โรงแรม โรงพยาบาล โรงงาน office building หรือหน่วยงานอื่นๆ ที่ต้องการผลิตภัณฑ์และบริการทำความสะอาด ทั้งในและนอกกรุงเทพ เพิ่มยอดลูกค้า หาลูกค้าใหม่ ตามเป้าที่วางไว้ โอกาสการเติบโตทั้งรายได้และตำแหน่งสูง รายได้ดี เป็นผู้สร้าง & หัวหน้าฝ่ายขาย Qualifications การศึกษาขั้นต่ำ ปริญญาตรี ต้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 3 ปีในด้านการขาย สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ มีทักษะการสื่อสารและการเจรจาต่อรองที่ดี ต้องมีรถยนต์และใบขับขี่ (BKK & พื้นที่ส่วนกลาง) เราต้องคนที่ที่จะมาช่วยขยายงาน รักการขาย มีประสบการณ์ในการขายสินค้าหรือบริการให้กับ โรงแรม โรงพยาบาล โรงงานอุตสาหกรรม โดยเฺฉพาะการบริการทำความสะอาด จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ หากมาจากบริษัท ที่ขายสินค้าและบริการประเภทเดียวกัน จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ Compensation: ตามตกลง แล้วแต่ประสบการณ์ , เงินเดือน  start ที่ 25,000-30,000 + commission ตามยอดขาย Location: 143,145,147 สิรินธร ซอย 7 ถนน สิรินธร บางพลัด บางบำหรุ กทม 10700

Job Responsibilities: Responsible for the full implementation of our Financial Accounting, ERP or EPM application software (Financial modules, Budgeting & Planning, Financial Consolidation, etc.) including requirement collection, system build, training, UAT and support of the customers. Qualifications: Able to work in Thailand and can speak Thai fluently Bachelor Degree or higher in Business, Accounting, Information Technology or Related Fields 3 years of working experiences in implementing ERP Accounting module or EPM software or as a super user. Service-minded, self-motivated & fast learner Excellent problem solving, analytical, negotiation and presentation skills. Able to work in international environment and communicate in English very well We offer the opportunity to join a strong corporate culture and be part of the success of our growing company. If you’re enthusiastic about joining our team, please send your application and state your expected salary to: Triforce Global Solutions Limited 19 Floor, Paso Tower, 88 Silom Road Bangrak, Bangkok 10500

About the job We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to work with our clients from many industries (Software & Technology, IT Consulting, Fintech, US-based startups, and More). Apply today, We offer a free Resume Building service . As a DevOps Engineer, the candidate will maintain and optimize production infrastructure, collaborate with software engineers, and propose solutions for new customers, ensuring service stability and efficiency. Job Description Design, implement, and manage cloud-based infrastructure to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of the platform Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate the software development lifecycle, ensuring rapid and reliable release of features and updates Implement monitoring tools to track system performance and optimize for peak efficiency Create documentation about all processes and deployments that are properly compliant with standards and regulations Provide technical support to users and internal teams, and conduct training sessions for new tools or processes Stay updated with the latest DevOps tools and technologies, and explore new solutions to enhance the performance and capabilities of the platform Qualification 2+ years of experience in a Software Developer role 1+ years of experience in a DevOps role Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) for designing and maintaining availability and scalability Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, CircleCI, Travis CI.) Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Highly skilled in leading teams or managing large projects. Measured by project size or team size Continuous learning and adaptability to new technologies Excellent communication, collaboration, analytical, and problem-solving skills The expected salary ranges from 60,000-130,000 Baht based on your experience. Apply now for new opportunities and our team will contact you back later.

Responsibilities - Working with an agile team to develop, test and maintain applications and services to support business requirements. - Working alongside with UX/UI for a complex and continuous application design development. - Manage individual / project priorities, project timeline and deliverables to ensure quality solutions are delivered. - Contribute to continuous improvement of software development best practices. Qualifications - Experience in both of front-end and backend development - Experience in JavaScript frameworks especially NextJS, React-Native, NestJS - Experience in database design - Experience using Git and have a good understanding of Git workflow. - Experience working in Agile Scrum teams and productivity tools like Jira or related. - Exceptional problem solving and learning skills. - Excellent communication skills and an ability to convert business requirements to code and explain complex concepts to the business. Location: The Nine Tower nearby MRT Rama9 Working Style - Flexible time 09.00 - 18.00 - Hybrids days (WFH 3 days per week) Perk/Benefits - Salary based on Experience + performance bonus - Annual Leave 15 days and Personal Leave 10 days - Annual Company Outing Trip - Group insurance (Cover for OPD/IPD, accident), Eyeglasses/Contact Lens, and Dental claim

About the job Cube SoftTech Co., Ltd.’s clients are the leader companies in many business fields. We are now looking for a professional IT Staff to join our professional team for delivering high quality software to our customer. Job Descriptions Gather and analyze requirement from user. Design software documentation and design Diagram such as Sequence diagram, Flow chart, ER Diagram, SRS. Coordinate closely with developer during system development. Communicate with Developer teams in business and technical terms Review coding and design Database & system. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science , Computer Engineer or any related fields At least 2  years of experience as a System Analyst. Hands on experience with software development and documentation such as Functional Spec ,ER, Sequence Diagram, Data Flow Diagram, etc. Ability to explain technical details Experience in Developer will be consider as a plus. Good communication skill in listening, speaking, reading and writing. Professional with good attitude and service mind. Knowledge of database. Knowledge of programming Java, Javascript, PHP, C#.Net adventage. Benefits & Welfare: Five-day work week Flexible working hours Provident Fund Dental insurance Life insurance Medical insurance Performance bonus Company Outing Annual Leave (start at 10 days/year) Diligence allowance IT training course www.cubesofttech.com [link removed] http://www.facebook.com/CubeSoftTech [link removed]

Here you’ll get to: • Design, develop, and implement innovative, high-quality backend solutions that align with the organization's overall goals and objectives. • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product owners, frontend engineers, and designers, to ensure seamless integration of backend systems with frontend applications. • Provide technical leadership and guidance to intermediate and junior backend engineers, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous learning. • Stay current on industry trends, competitor activities, and best practices in backend development, applying relevant insights to inform the organization's initiatives. • Optimize backend performance, scalability, and reliability, implementing best practices in data management, security, and system architecture. • Conduct code reviews, ensuring adherence to established coding standards and best practices. -Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, working closely with team members and stakeholders to identify root causes and implement effective solutions. • Mentor and support backend team members, promoting their professional development and growth. What You'll Need: • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field. Master's degree is a plus. • 5+ years of experience in backend development with a strong portfolio showcasing innovative and visually appealing backend solutions. • Extensive experience in software development, with a focus on backend systems and APIs. • Proficient in server-side technologies, such as Node.js, Golang • Strong understanding of database technologies and proficiency in writing efficient database queries. • Deep knowledge of web development concepts, including, REST, and JSON, as well as familiarity with microservices architecture. • Experience in optimizing backend performance, scalability, and reliability, including caching mechanisms and load balancing techniques. • Ability to conduct thorough code reviews, ensuring high code quality, maintainability, and adherence to established standards. • Proven track record in troubleshooting and resolving complex technical issues, with a strong problem-solving mindset. • Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to mentor and guide other team members effectively. • Strong passion for innovation and staying up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies. It’s Great If You Have: • Experience with the Go programming language at least 3 years • Knowledge/understanding of DevSecOps CI/CD pipelines, event-driven systems, distributed systems, pub/sub, enterprise software security, and GRPC • Extensive experience with software engineering best practices (eg. software testing, TDD, SOLID, clean architecture, code reviews, Containerization, DevSecOps, design documentation, 12 Factor Apps) • Experience building cloud-native scalable applications (Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, Redis, Elasticsearch and etc.) • Experience in building and optimizing large-scale microservices to support high performance with low latency. • Experience in working in a startup company

Company: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
column8: Job Descriptions/Responsibilities: Undertaking quality control process on testing tasks of each Department of Compliance Division to be in accordance with sound practice Managing data to support testing taka of each Department of Compliance Division by providing accessibility, centralization and all necessary stuffs related to regulatory requirement. Handing Compliance’s project in relation to information technology to ensure that all retrieved data and information are accuracy and on time Give advice to Business Units concerning to IT Risk,IT Security and/or relevant requirements Responsible for any other activities as per Management's assignments Also, the responsibilities include the fostering role in development /enhancement Compliance related IT infrastructure to keep pace with FINTECH era. Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT, Risk Management or Accounting, Finance Minimum 6-8 years of experience with in IT and Digital Risk Management, IT Audit, IT Security, IT Compliance within Banking/Financial services and products Strong leadership and people management Ability to work closely and build trust with senior management Planning and execution skills Good communication in English

Responsibilities: Understanding the business requirements to formulate the problems to solve and restrict the slice of data to be explored. Performing cleansing, processing, and validation on the data subject to analyze, in order to ensure its quality. Exploring and visualizing data using BI tool (especially Power BI) Works closely with Data Engineer teams and all business units to develop strategy for long-term data analytics methodology. Identifying patterns and trends in data sets and analysis processes. Provides consulting and analytic services to all stakeholders. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, Applied Statistic or related field. At least 5 years’ experience in data management, data analytics field. Experience with BI tools such as Power BI and Tableau (especially Power BI) Working experience in Healthcare industry would be an advantage. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Self-motivated, good analytical, and problems solving skills. Ability to complete milestones and work toward multiple deadlines simultaneously. Excellent multitasking skills and task management strategies. Working Location : Thanya Park, Srinakarin Road (Suanluang)

Coding Java or Python to enhance new features on ServiceNow Platform. Monitor health, usage, and overall compliance of ServiceNow and its applications. Assist in building and maintaining internal technical documentation, manuals, policies, and processes. Understand how ServiceNow can enable the client to become more efficient and configure the platform to achieve measurable benefits. Coordinate application and platform upgrades. Configure and maintain SLA, catalog items and their associated workflows. General support, administration and maintenance of ServiceNow platform and associated applications. Working closely with IT and business partners to configure and improve core platform capabilities in accordance with ITIL best practices. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree, majoring in IT, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field. At least coding skill in Java or Python (The ideal candidate must use programming to enhance new features on ServiceNow Platform) Knowledge in ServiceNow, ITSM, ITIL will be first to consideration Able to communicate in English New Graduates are welcome IT One Benefit: Fixed Bonus 1 month Performance Bonus Flexible Benefit Annual leave 15 days/ year Fitness First membership Provident Fund Health insurance (include legal wife/husband/children) Life insurance Annual Health Check Up “Please note that by entering the information into this site, you explicitly consent and allow IT One to collect and process your personal data (including but not limited to name, mobile phone number, personal identification etc.) for the purpose of applying for the job. The information you provided will also be kept and shared with IT One internal stakeholders for job application purposes. The protection of your personal data is very important to IT One.  IT One is committed to keeping your personal data secured, and processing it in accordance with, applicable data protection laws and our internal policies, https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/life-at-accenture/privacy-policy [link removed]” Interested candidates, please send your full CV in English, certificate, recent photo, and expected salary to: Human Resources Department Tipco Tower, 21st- 22nd Floor, 118/1 Rama VI Road, Phaya Thai, Bangkok, 10400 Website: https://www.itone.co.th/ [link removed] Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Itone.co.th/ Linked: https://www.linkedin.com/company/it-one/

Tencent Thailand offers unique opportunities to grow with an industry-leading company while enjoying the benefits of creating and starting new business. Currently, we are looking for a candidate in the role of Senior Engineer (IOS / Android Developer ) located in Bangkok, Thailand. Tencent Thailand is dedicated to developing internet platforms with quality content for our users’ lifestyles making the online world safe, enjoyable, and educational. Our leading products include, but not limited to, Sanook.com the number 1 portal in Thailand, WeChat, and Tencent Games. At Tencent, we aim to fulfill the needs of our audiences, partners, and advertisers with diverse and innovative platforms. We seek highly motivated individuals to join us as we continue our journey to create new products, services, and opportunities in Thailand, a hub of innovation and business for Southeast Asia. Job Description/Scope: Work with the business and gather requirements and specifications. Develop, build, test and maintain mobile applications. Brainstorm new ideas, improve UX/UI and fix bugs. Perform troubleshooting and resolving of production issues Write presentation-tier HTML/CSS/JavaScript, using libraries and plug-ins where necessary Ensure optimization of the mobile applications developed Work closely with the Mobile Architects, UX/UI Designers and other team members Qualifications: Experienced candidate: having at least 7 year of hands-on experience developing and implementing mobile applications. Experience in mobile web development using Swift, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Android Studio Knowledge and/or experience in Android / iOS development Good understanding of UI/UX concepts for mobile devices. Good working experiences in C / C++ / C# / Java or other Object-oriented programming Experience in local testing using Appium, Cucumber or SeeTest for native app testing tools Familiarity with publishing of beta app through TestFlight / HockeyApp. Familiarity with Agile/Scrum delivery methodology; rapid prototyping is a plus. Ability to work creatively with an analytical mindset in a problem-solving environment Ability to work in a fast paced and dynamic Client environment All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. Tencent (Thailand) Company Limited 8 T One Building, 10th, 11th and 12th Floor (Unit 4-5), Soi Sukhumvit 40, Sukhumvit Road, Phra Khanong, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110

Company: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
column8: For this role you will get to Join the leading Data team in Thailand. Responsible for Krungsri One Data Platform which is Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) and its eco-systems both on-premise and cloud. Understand business requirements from business MIS users in order to provision Data Platform to support Design solution, implement, configuration, tuning Krungsri Data Platform with robustness, performance, scalability, high availability, secured with high data quality Create data pipeline framework, template for all data patterns such as structured, semi-structured, unstructured data into various type of database and data store such as Hive, HBase, Impala, MongoDB, graph database using batch and streaming mechanism leveraging on-premise and on-cloud Big Data architecture Create framework, template of data serving layer for business users, business intelligence, downstream applications, external entities in various output format such as json, delimiter file and APIs using Python with API framework such as Django, Flask Advise on performance optimizations and best practices for scalable data models, pipelines and queries Works in agile methodology with other scrum team as well as in the SDLC life cycle type of projects Define data assets (data models), spark, sparkSQL, and hiveSQL jobs to populate data models. Maintain proficiency in a variety of computer programming languages, such as SQL, PL/SQL, Unix shell scripting, Spark, Python, Kubernetes in order to successfully complete the tasks of the role Apply now if you have More than 5 years of Banking & Financial industry working with varies forms of data infrastructure inclusive of relational databases such as SQL, Hadoop and Spark as well as working with either a Map Reduce or an MPP system on any size/scale Experience in working with AWS or other cloud platform. Experience with orchestration tools (Airflow best fit) Strong knowledge in EDW, Bigdata Technology / Data warehouse concept, Knowledge in data management, Knowledge of Microsoft Windows Server/XP/10, UNIX, etc. Full practitioner of SDLC and other relevant IT system development management processes Why join Krungsri? As a part of MUFG (Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group), we a truly a global bank with networks all over the world. We offer a striking work-life balance culture with hybrid work policies (1 day in office per week). Unbelievable benefits such as attractive bonuses, employee loan with special rates and many more. ** Apply now before this role is close. ** Stay connected with KRUNGRI CAREER at: FB: Krungsri Career(http://bit.ly/FacebookKrungsriCareer [link removed]) LINE: Krungsri Career (http://bit.ly/LineKrungsriCareer [link removed]) Talent Acquisition Department Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited 1222 Rama III Rd., Bangpongpang, Yannawa, Bangkok 10120 สอบถามข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม : Talent Acquisition Center 0-2296-2000

Jobtitle: Mid-Senior Java Developer – Hybrid Work – Khon Kaen Based
column8: Location: Mueang, Khon Kaen Salary: 50,000 THB - 85,000 THB + Benefits Cathcart Technology is collaborating with an international company specializing in web applications to support a leading automotive firm with a current need for a Mid-Senior Java Developer based in Khon Kaen. The company is offering a hybrid working policy. The ideal candidate should have expertise in Java, strong English communication skills, and an open-minded approach. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work with a talented international team to develop new features and maintain web applications for the well-known automotive sector. Looking for a new opportunity to settle with a work-life balance in Khon Kaen, do not hesitate to Apply now. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, software engineering, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of experience in software development. Expertise in Java (knowledge of .Net is considered a plus). Experience working with SQL Server. Strong communication skills in English are a requirement. If you’re interested, do not hesitate to contact me at 064-240-9461 , or 02-038-5878 Khun Lily, Software Development recruitment consultant. I’d be delighted to have a confidential conversation with you and see how this can help further your career.

Jobtitle: Junior IT Network Engineer / System Engineer ประจำพระราม 2
column8: สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : โรงงานพระราม 2 (ใกล้เซนทรัลพระราม 2) เป็นหลัก และมีเข้าสำนักงานใหญ่สีลมเป็นบางครั้ง วัน-เวลาทำงาน: วันจันทร์-วันศุกร์ เวลา 8.30-17.30 รายละเอียดงาน Implement ระบบ,  Config Server และ Network. Monitor ระบบงาน ทั้ง Server,Network, Software และ Application ต่างๆ จัดทำเอกสารทาง Technical และ จัดทำ Report  การ monitor ระบบงาน รวมถึง Report ของ Maintenance Service Agreement ของระบบงาน นำเสนอรายงานต่างๆ ต่อผู้บังคับบัญชาในรูปแบบ Power point ประสานงานกับ Partner ในโครงการทางด้านเทคนิค และงานอื่นๆ ที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาศาสตร์ หรือวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ มีประสบการณ์ 1 ปี ขึ้นไป ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความรู้ด้านระบบปฏิบัติการทั้ง Windows และ Linux มีความรู้ด้าน IT Infrastructure (Networking, Server, Storage, Virtualization, Web Server) สามารถ config  อุปกรณ์ network ได้ (cisco, F5,  Juniper, A10, Paloalto, Forcepoint, Aruba, Pulse secure) มีความรู้ด้าน IT Security มีความรู้ด้าน Database : MS SQL, Oracle มีความรู้ด้าน Data Management tool เช่น Backup software เป็นต้น สามารถเรียนรู้ได้ด้วยตนเองและรักการทำงานเป็นทีม สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ For interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click "Apply Now" All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality. Chanwanich Group Silom (Head office): Kongboonma Building, 699 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Phrapradaeng Factory: Suksawad Rd., Pakklong Bang pla kot, Phrasamutchedi, Samutprakarn Sinsakhon Factory: Sinsakhon Printing City & Industrial Estate, Samutsakhon https://www.chanwanich.digital [link removed], http://www.chanwanich.com [link removed] Find us on Line application: “@chanwanich”

Roles and Responsibilities: Execute data analysis to provide key business insight, identify business solution and provide solution recommendation. Continuously leverages advanced data-driven problem-solving techniques and analytics to understand, influence, and report on key performance indicators to the business. Handle to support sales team and management in delivery both of daily, weekly and monthly report for all sales performance and KPI. Work closely with internal and external party to understand business requirement system, business target and document requirements. Preferred Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Information Management or related fields. Minimum of 5 years direct experience on Business Analyst or System Analyst in Insurance industry. Experienced in core system of insurance industry is an advantage. Strong in SQL, Microsoft Office, VB, Advance BI. Able to find creative solutions to problems and adapt to new challenges in term of innovative. Strong organizational skills and communication skills desired.

Jobtitle: ERP Consultant FI/CO หรือ PP/QM/SAP Functional Consultant (ประจำหาดใหญ่ /...
column8: Job Summary: The ERP Consultant FI/CO or PP/QM is responsible for overseeing business processes implemented in ERP applications, driving continuous process improvement and automation, documenting processes, conducting business requirement analysis, and providing project control and support. The role requires expertise in the company's business processes, proactive engagement with users to automate manual processes, and leading process improvement projects while closely coordinating with business and IT teams. The ERP Consultant FI/CO or PP/QM will drive the change process to transform the organization's culture into one of process improvement and compliance. Job Description: Gather requirements from clients, understand business rules, and ensure alignment with development teams. Facilitate the implementation and support of SAP FI/CO or PP/QM. Perform detailed analysis of complex business process requirements and provide appropriate system solutions; identify, interpret, validate, and document customer requirements. Facilitate workshops to collect business requirements. Map client business requirements, processes, and objectives; develop necessary product modifications to satisfy clients' needs. Design, customize, configure, and test FI/CO or PP/QM. Identify gaps, issues, and work-around solutions. Create documents to support projects, including Business Requirements, Business Blueprints, Functional Specifications, Test Cases for SIT and UAT, Training Documents, and User Manuals, depending on the project type. Act as a liaison with clients for troubleshooting: investigate, analyze, and solve software problems. Handle changes or emergency transports as needed for high-priority issues. Act as a liaison between the business functions and the technical team. Provide ad-hoc training and user support as required. Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or equivalent industry experience. Excellent reading, writing, and speaking skills in English and Thai. Strong communication, presentation, and self-learning skills. At least 5 years of experience as an ERP Functional Consultant, Business/System Analyst, or Business Process Improvement role on SAP ERP FI/CO or PP/QM. Job Description As the leader of Cyber Security Solution Consultant engineering team, you will play a pivotal role in delivering exceptional technical presale services and product consultancy to both external clients and internal stakeholders. Your responsibilities will encompass solution designing, proposal development, Bill of Quantities (BoQ) creation, and the execution of Proof of Concepts (PoC). Key Responsibilities: Lead and inspire a team of Cyber Security Solution Consultants in providing comprehensive technical presale services, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions. Collaborate closely with clients, serving as a trusted advisor to comprehend their technical and business challenges, and effectively communicate these insights to the sales team. Act as a subject matter expert in the field of Cyber Security, staying abreast of industry trends and advancements. Evaluate and recommend cutting-edge tools, technologies, products, and processes to enhance service differentiation and quality. Demonstrate proficiency in driving business results within a complex outsourcing framework, spanning all facets of Cyber Security in applications, infrastructure, and operations. Provide support in operational roles, overseeing application, infrastructure management, and end-user Customer Care services. Take ownership of team competency development, fostering both technical and professional skills to meet evolving business needs. Collaborate with the Sales team on technical opportunities, preparing detailed technical proposals and addressing customer requirements effectively. Monitor and assess the progress and health of the opportunity pipeline, ensuring strategic alignment with organizational goals. Oversee the hands-over procedure and process between technical presale and delivery, ensuring a seamless transition and high-quality service delivery. Qualifications: Minimum of 5 years of experience in presales within the Cybersecurity or Network products domain. Preferred experience working with cybersecurity vendors, IT consulting firms, or IT distributors. Proven experience in managing presales teams. Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

Jobtitle: Senior Software Engineer for Fleet Management System
column8: TRANSTRON (THAILAND) Co., Ltd. is seeking a talented and experienced Senior Software Engineer to join its development team and play a key role in developing a robust and scalable fleet management system. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software components of the system, working closely with other engineers and stakeholders to ensure project success. Responsibilities : Design and develop new features and functionalities for the fleet management system. Implement and maintain software modules related to vehicle tracking, route optimization, fuel efficiency, and maintenance scheduling. Integrate various software components and ensure smooth data flow within the system. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following best practices and coding standards. Conduct unit testing and integration testing to ensure code quality and functionality. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and QA testers. Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in software development, especially those related to fleet management and Internet of Things (IoT). Contribute to technical discussions and provide expert advice on software design and implementation. Assist with system documentation and maintenance. Help mentor and guide junior engineers. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree or higher Minimum 3-5 years of experience in software development, preferably with experience in developing fleet management systems or similar applications. Proven experience designing and developing web and/or mobile applications. Strong knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum). Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) principles and design patterns. Proficient in at least one programming language, such as Java, Python, C++, or JavaScript. Experience with databases (e.g., SQL) and cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure) is a plus. Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills. Strong analytical and critical thinking skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Good command in English and computer literacy. (Optional) Good command in Japanese language.

At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals. Work you will do This role sits within the Customer and Marketing (C&M) team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which is a part of Deloitte that uses technology and creativity to better connect the customer with the business. Better known as Deloitte Digital, we use emergent technology to imagine, deliver, and run entirely new business futures. We create innovative ventures, digital platforms, and more meaningful experiences. As part of Digital Customer Team, you will leverage insight-driven strategies and advanced technology solutions to energize sales and service operations for digitally powered growth and enhance our client’s customer relationships with immersive experiences powered by leading digital arts. Eighty percent of the customer moments that make up their brand happen in the sales and service experience. We not only help our clients to make those memorable for their customers, but we integrate their whole business around those moments—whether it’s a trip into their supply chain, logistics, and fulfilment, or advancing the customer mind-set of their employees and partners. You will: Design and develop salesforce solutions based on customer requirements Implement User Stories in an agile approach for CRM Systems or Salesforce applications. Analyses technical requirements and translates them into implementable application designs and configurations. Evaluates possibilities with different technologies and platforms Understand client business process and potential constraints (budget, timeline, expertise, etc.) to define optimal and reasonable project scope and expectations Create and defend solution estimate and SOW Implement an interface to an already existing Community Cloud Application in order to retrieve data Coordinate with Solutions Architects on integration, and data consultants, and others, as needed, for specific technical design requirements Enough about us, let's talk about you If you are someone with: Tertiary qualification in a relevant software or engineering discipline. Minimum 3-8 years of experience and expertise in CRM systems and or Salesforce technical architecture and solutions design and knowledge of the wider Salesforce ecosystem. Relevant certification(s) on the technical will be a plus. Minimum 3 three full-lifecycle Salesforce development, with strong expertise in at least two of the following areas/modules: Sales Cloud Service Cloud Custom / App Cloud Force.com Siebel CRM/Oracle CRM/Microsoft CRM Experience implementing CPQ technologies (Financial Services Cloud, Calliduscloud, Big Machines, Apttus, Cameleon) will be an advantage. Experience with system configuration using workflows, approval processes, custom objects, validation rules, formulas, process builder, flows and Data Loader. Drive and determination to continually learn new things and develop yourself. A natural team player who enjoys working with others to solve problems and sharing knowledge. Willing to push the technical limits and find the best solution for the business and our customers. Drive, tenacity, client focused and results oriented. An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment.

We're seeking a seasoned Senior Security Operations Specialist who specializes in incident response and management, endpoint security tool administration, as well as threat mitigation and vulnerability remediation. This position calls for someone with a strategic understanding of organizational security improvement and a strong technical background. The successful candidate will collaborate closely with our Endpoint Security Platform Architect, Platform Owner & Service Managers to not only implement, manage, and enhance our Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) solution, but also play a crucial role in our incident management processes. With a focus on incident response, this role will require managing real-time security events, coordinating remediation efforts, and ensuring incidents are thoroughly documented and analyzed for improvements. We're particularly interested in those with a passion for technology, with a spotlight on endpoint security technologies, who have the technical acumen and resilience to effectively respond to and manage high-stress incident scenarios. We're looking for a dedicated professional who can leverage their skills and experience to improve our security posture and incident response capabilities at every level of our organization. In this role, you will not only support, monitor, and maintain the Endpoint Detection and Response Suite within the organization but will also take a leading role in improving our incident response and threat management capabilities. Key responsibilities Demonstrated expertise in handling security incidents and rapid response. Advanced knowledge of Windows, Linux/Unix tools, architectures, and security configurations/monitoring techniques. Solid experience in managing agent-based software on endpoints, with a preference for security-based software. Proven experience working with advanced threat detection solutions and Docker/Containers. Familiarity with scripting in Python/PowerShell, utilizing automation tools, REST API, etc. for incident response. Experience in creating data-driven security dashboards. Strong troubleshooting abilities, with an emphasis on resolving security incidents promptly and effectively. Capacity to build and maintain reports, develop scripts to automate tasks, and improve incident response times. Key requirement Graduate Degree in computer science, information technology, or similar field, plus recent computer application programming experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience. Have worked for at least 5 years in IT Infrastructure domain preferably related to security Knowledge on Network and Infrastructure architecture Security certifications would be plus: CISSP/CompTIA Security+, CEH, CISA, CISM Understanding of IT Security practices/programs Strong analytical and decision-making abilities Technical understanding of EDR platform ITILv3 or above certification [plus] Prior experience in creating reports and data analysis Good communication skills, interpersonal, oral, and written in English

Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong negotiating and persuasion skills. LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! World-Check Risk Intelligence helps our customers meet their due diligence obligations and identify potential criminal activity with information from reputable public domain sources. Our data will also help them address their Politically Exposed Persons (PEPs) monitoring requirements. They can access over 4m records, delivered in a highly structured format.The product also protects their business from financial crime and reduce risk when carrying out their KYC due diligence screening obligations with World-Check Risk Intelligence - used and trusted by the world’s biggest companies for over two decades. Main Responsibilities / Accountabilities: Responsible for the definition, design, construction, testing, installation, modification, and maintenance of properly engineered World-Check Editorial workflows and business rule management Engage with product owners, architects and other specialists you'll design world-class solutions to address our customer needs Work with team members to analyze technical requirements, design options and complexity estimates, and agree how to deliver the requirements through participation in refinement and planning sessions Develop enterprise software, adhering to company standards and established software methodology Build and maintain efficient, reusable, reliable and secure code based on User Stories Actively participate in Scrum meetings, you'll give timely status updates on areas for which you are responsible Inspect and adapt, finding innovative ways to make your team work more effectively through agile retrospectives and reviews Essential Skills/Experience Required: Experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS and REST API development is required. Experience in low-code technology e.g. IBM BAW, Salesforce, Camunda or any workflow-related platform with BPMN is an advantage. Experience in AWS Server-less Technologies, Python and SQL database technology is an advantage Understanding of secure coding approaches and writing clean, readable code and reusable components Familiar with continuous build and integration and code management tools (GitLab, Git Pipeline and Jenkins) Proven problem solving and interpersonal skills, both verbal and written Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to us are aware of this privacy notice.

PRTR is currently recruiting a skilled Lead Backend Engineer for our client, a prominent financial technology company based in Bangkok, Thailand. In this position, you will have the opportunity to work with state-of-the-art technologies and contribute to the development of an innovative platform that sets industry standards. Responsibilities Ensuring optimal performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identifying and resolving bottlenecks and bugs. Assisting in maintaining code quality and organization. Designing, developing, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable C# code. Qualifications Familiarity with various design and architectural patterns. Thorough understanding of Web API technologies such as RESTful, WebSockets, and Webhooks. Basic understanding of Common Language Runtime (CLR), including limitations, weaknesses, and workarounds. Proficient in designing database schemas that support analytic processes. Ability to develop reusable C# libraries. Proficient in using code versioning tools. Familiarity with continuous integration practices. Solid knowledge of object-oriented programming concepts. Familiarity with .NET Core and the ASP.NET framework. Committed to writing clean and readable C# code. Proficient in C# programming language, with a strong understanding of its ecosystems. Experience in implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests. Knowledge of Microsoft Azure services.

Order the supply of security tools and equipment required in carrying out security operations Manage the security processes for securing classified and sensitive information Set up key controls on company equipment and facility to limit access to restricted property Keep track of incidents in order to evaluate them and recommend a course of action Prepare and present reports of incidents and ways to limit re-occurrence Oversees incident response planning and the investigation of security breaches, and assists with any associated disciplinary, public relations and legal matters. Provides advice and assistance to troubleshoot the most complex problems in a manner that minimizes interruptions in the ability to carry out critical business activities. Supports rapid response teams in response to customer service problems resulting from catastrophic events such as virus infections or widespread power outages. Executes security operation tasks include, but not limited to security patch management, security vulnerability management, and security configuration management. Supports and assists in maintaining a vulnerability/gap/response assessment program. Supports development and maintenance of cyber security architecture of the company, including IT and Business/Process Control networks. Supports the deployment of the cyber security architecture for infrastructure and applications worldwide. Implement and enforce security protocols, policies, and procedures necessary for safeguarding company asset Ensures proper security documentation is in place regarding standard operating procedures. Requirements: Bachelor or Master’s degree in Computer Engineering, MIS, IT or a related field. At least 3-5 year experiences in computer security area Knowledge of International Security frameworks, Standards, and Guidelines e.g., COBIT, NIST-800, ISO 27001, PCI-DSS, OWASP, and etc. Experience in system and application security management and control. Experience in facilitating information security risk assessments. Technical writing, documentation development, process mapping, and visual communication skills. Professional certificates related to work (e.g. CISSP, CISM, CISA, CRISC, CEH, Sec+, ISO 27001, PCI DSS, OSCP, CEH, GPEN or similar general security certification) is desirable Talent to identify and create a broad vision for a security solution and to execute it Systematic Thinking - the ability to see how parts interact with the whole (big-picture thinking) Proven experience of acting as the expert in project teams.

This is just the start - we are aggressively using technology to delight our customers in all segments. Company: ATA IT (National Bank of Canada Group)
column8: We are looking to recruit  Full Stack Developer (Java, Angular/React js.) ATA-IT Limited- the subsidiary of National Bank of Canada (NBC). Currently, we are looking for Full Stack Developer to join our development team. We are looking to see you be a member of National Bank of Canada. Main objectives and Summary : Work with the scrum team to ensure that the solution is properly delivered as per expected. Guarantee the quality of the source code, for all developments under your responsibility. Perform unit testing, and contributes to integration testing, functional testing and UAT. Coordinate and work with Developers, DevOps, Security and Infrastructure team to manage and solve issues in the required solution and/or environment. Mentor and coach junior developer. Contribute to improve Norms and Processes, and development techniques. Contribute to deliver innovative functionalities to the customers of the bank. Stay up-to-date and research on the new technology that will help improve the solution. Qualification : Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or Computer related field 2 - 10 years of working experience as full stack developer with Angular JS or React JS and Java. Proficient with frontend languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Proficient with Java, Spring Boot, REST, SOAP, API, Web services, Microservice, JSON, Apache CXF, Tomcat, Mockito, Docker Experience on AWS cloud technology is a big plus Familiar with Agile methodology, OOP, CI/CD process, tools e.g. Jenkins, Urbancode application and process used for software development Experience within a project that has developed reusable components in a service-oriented architecture Good understanding of Atlassian suite tools (Jira, Bitbucket and Confluence) Experience in developing applications for the financial markets and brokerage operations Good command of English Nice to have : Experience in integrating with Analytic tool, White labeling Experience in wealth management Previous experience working with Western company French language Banking background What you will get from ATA IT : 14 days’ vacation in first year Health insurance for staff & families Life insurance Dental fee for staff & families Provident fund Monetary Assistance (Childbirth, Funeral, Basket Visit) Annual Party Monthly Activities- Staff Birthday & Company Activities Annual Health Check Multi-national company with flexible working hours, but professional company culture Work from Home Policy

We are looking for an Android Developer passionate about pushing mobile technologies to the limits. This Android app developer will work with our talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications. Android programming works closely with other app development and technical teams. Responsibilities You will have to be a part of the development team in a project with 19 Million++ users installed! Work closely with the Product Owner, Scrum Master, QA, Service Engineer, and UX/UI Designer to ensure the backlog is efficiently planned and occasionally assist in technical discussions with the operation and architecture teams. Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class applications for millions nationwide. We prefer experiences in Kotlin, but that is fine if you are a Java Developer. Write unit tests and automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our users. Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you will be able to adapt to the evolving needs of our users and also yourself. Requirements BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject Proven software development experience and Android skills development Proven working experience in Android app development and Have published at least one original Android app Proficient with Kotlin, Java, and Android SDK Deep understanding of Android Architecture Components ViewModel, LiveData, Room Experience in modern design practices such as Modular architecture, Clean Architecture, MVVM, OOP, and SOLID principles Deep knowledge and understanding of Multi-threading, Networking, and Memory management Experience in Dagger, Koin, Coroutines, RxJava2, Retrofit2, OkHttp3, Gson, Glide, Realm Familiar with automated testing A "Can-do attitude" and a product mindset Experience with Flutter is a plus.

Jobtitle: AVP - IT Project Management ( Application Solution / IT Business Consulting )
column8: Job Summary: Responsible for planning and leading teams to deliver projects that span across teams from internal and external. Manage resources, schedules, and budget. Tasks are included in management of issues, risks and project change requests to ensure successful commitment with quality and on-time project delivery. Contribute to process improvement initiatives as it relates to improving project delivery. AVP - IT Project Management might be required to coach and mentor all team members being managed the projects properly. Job Responsibilities: Work with stakeholders to define project scope, objective, dependencies, and timeline Estimate resources and cost to reach objective and manage resources in an effective and efficient on resources capability Work with project teams to develop and manage a detailed project plan for all phases of the projects Manage teams to find solutions with relevance and related teams Organizing meeting projects/sprints grooming, planning, project progress update, demo, and deployment. Minutes on key summarization, issues, and actions Monitor, track, and control project progress, resolve issues, blockers, conflicts, dependencies, and critical path deliverables Communicate project progress status update regarding project milestones, deliverable, dependencies, risks, and issues including proposed mitigation plan to stakeholders Build and motivate project team members to meet project goals, adhering to their responsibilities and project milestones Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement Process improvement, projects/sprint retrospective to continue improve process and project team quality Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree / Master's Degree in IT, Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Management Information System or related fields At least 7 years-experienced in IT Project Management, IT Software Delivery or IT Consulting Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle, Fundamental Project Management Processes, Methodologies, Tools, and Techniques Experienced in Software Project Management in Banking or Financial / Insurance / Real Estate / Property Development Industry Ability to encourage and enable people to work together as a team to accomplish the project Strong Communication and Presentation Skills Strong Problem Solving and Analytical Skills Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume with expected salary, and enclosing a recent photograph via click "Apply Now" to Recruitment Center Major Development 141 Major Tower Thonglor 18th  Floor, Soi thonglor10, Sukhumvit 55, Wattana, Bangkok 10110 Contact Us Recruitment Major - CRAFTING LIFESCAPE TO EXCELLENCE Telephone : 02-392-1111 #3306 (Khun Phairat) Line@ : @ majorcareers Facebook : Major Development Careers

Could you be the full-time Software Designer in Bangkok , Thailand we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your software designing expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll report to one of our Software Engineering Team Leader Onboard in Bangkok, Thailand, and work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll be part of the team who is responsible in developing ERTMS and Installation, Test & Commissioning (ITC) Tools, a software tools intended to install, configure and test Alstom’s onboard signalling products. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business to successfully test the development of targeted systems and products including subsystem and system testing according to the testing process for the onboard products. We’ll look to you for: To successfully develop the solutions that create a reliable ERTMS test environment and reliable ITC Tools to satisfy the development, testing, validation, installation and configuration process within Alstom. Act as an instance for the Homologation Responsible together with the Test Coordinators and have interfaces to Systems Engineering, HW/SW Product Development, Test Engineering and Validation. To ensure the system and software development aligned with railway standards (especially EN50128:2011), ERTMS/ETCS technology and working in close collaboration with the Developers and Test Engineers. All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Bachelor of Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, or similar. Minimum 3 years’ experience in software development. Good English communication skills, both verbal and written skills. Experience in Programming Languages C++ /C and scripting languages including OOP concept. Experience in QT Creator : IDE. Experience in operating systems (MS Windows, Linux, and VxWorks). Experience in hardware programming and real time systems,  implementing software to hardware communication. Experience in networks and network programming. Experience with Git version control software including CI/CD. Experience in complex software projects. Basic knowledge of railway safety systems and standards EN50128:2011) are beneficial. Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines. Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues. Contribute to innovative projects. Utilise our flexible and agile working environment. Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries. Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning. Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage (life, medical, pension).

Monitor systems and processes, through both automated and manual checks, to identify current or potential issues. Fluent in programming languages, especially Java, SQL, Python. An expert in cloud and mobile applications, preferably with some programming background. Understanding of networking concepts, including TCP/IP, LAN, WLAN, load balance and security. Positive mindset, can-do attitude, and ability to work under pressure. Good analysis and troubleshooting skills. Good communication in English and negotiation skills.

Implement new features and maintenance company Application (web and/or mobile) with selected frameworks. Analyze product requirement and design experience and prototype to validate product directions. Own and lead the end-to-end product front-facing process of products/ideas/solutions as well as user acquisition. Work through product problems from definition and opportunity to shipping software to our customers. Be actively involved in defining the strategy for your product, thinking in terms of experience. Work closely with Product Owners and UX/UI Designer to reiterate design to launch quickly and respond to users' feedbacks. Qualifications At least 4 years of experience working with Mobile Development. Experience with Flutter for both Android and iOS. Experience with git and familiarity with RESTful APIs. Knowledge of major state management approaches (BLoC, Provider, GetX, etc.) Understand Flutter Widget, Flutter Animation, Flutter Custom widget, Flutter Responsive, Application lifecycle. Write clean and well-structured codes. Experience with CI/CD, GCP, Microservice, Flutter Unit Test and UI Test will be advantage. Interested candidates can send CV to   sarawan.w @ 360qm.co.th for more info please call/Line 065-232-4155

They are expanding their development team and focusing on new cutting-edge technologies. If you interest, please read the following job description below. Responsibilities: - Produce dynamic applications for the Android/iOS platforms (Focus on Android but must do both). - Collaborate with the product owner to determine the feasibility and complexity of new products/features. - Contribute to all aspects of the software development lifecycle - Troubleshoot and debug issues with existing Android and iOS systems. - Coach and guide members of the squad. Qualifications: - Bachelor's and/or master's degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, or a similar field - Ability to develop high-quality, performant, and user-friendly native mobile applications for either the Android or iOS platforms is required. - Experience with modern mobile development frameworks such as SwiftUI, Kotlin Jetpack. - Experience with implementing mobile app CI/CD pipelines using modern tools like CircleCI, Jenkins, or Fastlane. - Experience in SuperApps (Ecommerce, Social Network, Payment) will be a plus. - Familiarity with Cloud technologies will be a plus.

Analyze, debug, and recommend corrective actions for test related issues on the manufacturing floor. PRTR is working with a lead consulting company to find qualified candidates for a Business Consultant Manager. We are seeking a business consultant manager to contribute digital marketing strategies and drive data-driven business across the organization. Understanding data integration, optimizing data roadmap and activation to ensure seamless data utilization. If you are looking to work with a fast growth company, This opportunity is for you! Key Responsibilities Data Strategy Development: Executing data-driven strategies for optimizing marketing and advertising efforts in alignment with overall business objectives. Digital Marketing Analysis: Evaluating performance trends in SEO, SEM, social media, and marketing, improvement and growth opportunities. Business Analysis: Conducting in-depth business analysis to identify KPIs and provide insights to drive business value and growth. Marketing Roadmap Optimization: Collaborating across teams to refine the marketing roadmap, market trends, and customer behaviour insights. Big Data Utilization: Applying advanced analytics to large datasets, facilitating informed decision-making. Advertising ROI: Assessing advertising campaign ROI and offering recommendations for optimizing ad spend and targeting. Team Leadership: Leading and mentoring a team, learning, and data-driven decision-making. Reporting and Visualization: Creating and maintaining dashboard reports for real-time insights. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Data Science, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience as a Business Analyst with a focus on digital marketing and data analysis. Proficiency in digital marketing techniques and expertise in big data analytics tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Leadership and team management abilities. Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus. Knowledge of industry trends, best practices, data integration, and activation processes. Experience collaborating with Data Engineers and understanding their role in data preparation. Fluent in English, both written and spoken. We value diversity and welcome all qualified candidates.

To build client business analysis report that inspecting, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information, informing conclusions, and supporting decision making for business analysts to interpret company ultimate goal is to make data accessible so that organizations can use it to evaluate and optimize the company performance. The maximum absence or vacations must be agreed beforehand. - The laptops and test devices are managed by the vendor, with the same client defined policy - The tools and access are under client governance. - Support in Facility for Scrum ceremony across client and the provided teams - Ability to work from office at least 2 days per week

Jobtitle: Senior Quality Assurance - Accountant/ผู้ทดสอบซอฟต์แวร์
column8: What will you do here? Formulate, develop, and implement comprehensive test plans and test cases to ensure the software aligns with specified requirements and maintains high-quality standards. Identify, document, and monitor defects, collaborating with development teams to facilitate effective resolution. Actively participate in product design reviews, offering valuable feedback on functional requirements and product designs. Create and sustain test automation frameworks to enhance testing efficiency. Conduct performance, usability, and security testing to validate software robustness. Stay abreast of the latest software testing tools and methodologies, integrating them into our testing processes. Foster collaboration with fellow QA testers to enhance the overall quality of the software development life cycle. Demonstrate a profound understanding of accounting principles and practices. Identify and rigorously test for common accounting errors. Effectively communicate and collaborate with accountants and other financial professionals. What will you learn from working with PEAK? You will learn about real "business processes, accounting, tax, and finance for SMEs in Thailand." You will experience working in fast pace and highly dynamic tech startup environment. What background work best for this position Minimum of 2 years of experience in software testing. Experience of working in accounting is a plus. Thorough knowledge of software testing principles and practices. Proficient in using test automation frameworks and tools. Experience in performance testing, usability testing, and security testing. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and teamwork abilities. What kind of person thrive working with PEAK? Have a growth mindset and love to learn new things. Comfortable to dive into the unknown and explore a way to make thing happen. Since we are a tech company and many time we need to learn and do something that we have never done before, those who are comfortable to tackle the unknown are very welcome. Open-minded and less ego is very important here. We provide feedbacks to each others (to peers, supervisor, or subordinates) regularly. We appreciate those who can tell the truth and help everyone grow. We believe no one is well aware of his/her own behavior and character. So feedback from others are important to help someone grow. We want to work with those who want his/her work to represent his/herself. It mean those who take pride in their work and want their work to be at the best. We want to work with those who have craftsmanship in coding. Our tech team is quite outgoing and funny to spend time with. A new member should be able to constrain themselve into working and not playing too much. We do play, but we do work very hard too. Learn more about our working culture [link removed] and working life [link removed] here.

Our client is leading turnkey solution provider in industrial automation and advanced equipment manufacturer. They are expanding for team member for Technical Sales Manager position, qualifications as below. Position: Technical Sale Manager ​​​​​​​Job Description Contribute to identifying market opportunities and set sales targets by analyzing customer needs and forecasting market trends. Provide regular updates on the sales pipeline, quantify opportunities, report achievements, highlight issues and risks, and propose actions to meet sales targets and enhance profitability. Offer valuable business intelligence and analysis to quantify and prioritize opportunities, keeping the team well-informed. Regularly update business information related to customers, competitors, and industries to stay current with market dynamics. Act as the primary point of contact for customers, initiating discussions for new opportunities and engaging in technical consultations to understand and document customer requirements. Work closely with development and applications engineering to create automation concepts addressing customers' manufacturing challenges while meeting company profitability targets. Collaborate with internal teams to develop cost models and provide timely responses to Requests for Quotations/Proposals. Add and pre-qualify new business contacts through personal and professional networks, existing or prospective clients, and cold-calling. Maintain an updated list of potential customers. Establish and maintain professional relationships with customers, ensuring clear communication between internal teams and customers for on-time delivery and excellent project execution. Conduct sales presentations and plant tours and follow up with customers on service and quality feedback. Adhere to company business processes and Quality Management System guidelines. Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering or equivalent, / Professional Degree in Business Management. At least 5 years of working experience of direct sales experience in industrial automation products or related products / Relevant experience in Industrial machine control systems / Industrial robots / Capital equipment or automation systems Experiences in solutions sales approach to capital. Good communication, interpersonal and presentation skill with ability to excel in a fast -paced environment. Good team player and leadership skills Good business acumen that is sensitive to different dynamics of decision makers through complex sales process. Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by APPLY NOW JAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd 10F Emporium Tower  622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Contact : K.Chanida Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website : https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

รายละเอียดงาน พวกเรากำลังมองหา Software Developer เพื่อมาร่วมงานกับเรา การทำงานแบบเป็นกันเอง ให้คำปรึกษาแลกเปลี่ยนความรู้ ไม่ปิดกั้นความคิด มีความรับผิดชอบ กระตือรือร้น ชอบเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆอยู่เสมอ ร่วมงานกับ Spinsoft ดีอย่างไร ? องค์กรมีความมั่นคง มีโอกาสก้าวหน้าในตำแหน่งงาน Work-Life-Balance การทำงานแบบคนรุ่นใหม่ สามารถ WFH  ได้ สวัสดิการดี เพื่อนร่วมงานดี คอมพิวเตอร์และจอส่วนตัวสำหรับทำงาน ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี โบนัสประจำปี (ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการ) ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ ประกันสังคมที่ครอบคลุม ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี ตำแหน่ง Backend Developer (GO) Frontend Developer (Angular) Android Developer (JAVA หรือ Kotlin) iOS Developer (Swift) System Engineer (Docker, Kubernetes) VoIP Developer ตำแหน่งเหล่านี้ต้องทำอะไรบ้าง? ศึกษาค้นคว้า และเปลี่ยน Framework ที่ใช้ตามความเหมาะสมของงานอยู่เสมอ แก้ไขปัญหางานเก่า และพัฒนาให้ดีขึ้น รายละเอียดของแต่ละตำแหน่ง https://www.spinsoft.co.th/jobapplication.html [link removed] สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมของแต่ละตำแหน่งที่ 02-107-1631 งานนี้เหมาะกับคนแบบไหน ? ใช้ Git เป็น เข้าใจหลักการ OOP, MV(C, P, VM), SOLID ชอบค้นคว้า หาข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมด้วยตัวเองอยู่เสมอ มีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับ Database เข้าใจ RESTful API มีผลงานที่สามารถใช้งานได้จริง และกำลังใช้งานอยู่จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ เงินเดือน : 20k+ (จบใหม่) 23k+ (มีประสบการณ์) หรือตามตกลง (กรุณาระบุตัวเลขเงินเดือนที่คาดหวังตอนสมัคร) อัตรา : ไม่จำกัด สถานที่ตั้ง : สำนักงานใหญ่131 อาคารนวัตกรรม1 ชั้น2ห้องINC 1-226  ถนนพหลโยธิน ต.คลองหนึ่ง อ.คลองหลวง จ.ปทุมธานี 12120 https://goo.gl/maps/EubVpHChB1LHTUpe8 [link removed] Website : www.spinsoft.co.th [link removed] โทรศัพท์ : 02-107-1631

SCB 10X is the technology investment arm of SCB X with the goal of creating and discovering exponential technologies and passionate, forward-thinking entrepreneurs. SCB 10X is divided into two core businesses: venture capital and venture building. The venture capital team invests in exponential technologies, while the venture building team ideates and builds technology startups. Our focus invest & build areas include Web3, blockchain, deep tech and AI, and green tech. Job Descriptions: The senior engineer/architect position will be part of the central technical team of SCB 10X. Some responsibilities include but not limit to: Be the main person to lead (and peer review) the design of solutions, architecture, and infrastructure (e.g., data, model deployment, optimization, monitoring). Support Venture Capital team to evaluate prospect companies, particularly on their engineering feasibility and technology capability. Stay up to date on the latest technology emergences relevant to the business domain. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to explore ideas where AI, Blockchain, Metaverse, or any other promising technology. Provide technical support in product idea validation. Work with industrial experts, other engineers, and scientists to develop a proof of concept of validated ideas. Build on the speed and lean mindset when testing ideas and build on the quality and security mindset when the systems come to production. Qualifications: Solid computer science / engineering fundamentals Hands-on experience in architecture design, infrastructure management and end-to-end software development projects Strong knowledge of cloud computing platform (AWS, GCP, Azure) Experience in some of these programming languages: Node.js, Go, Python, Scala, Java Ability to take ownership, think proactively, make rational decisions, and communicate results / raise issues to the team effectively Strong team player: prioritize works and organize your time to support others efficiently Excellent analytical thinking and problem-solving skills Self-starter and fast learner in working with new areas/topics Deep knowledge in one or more of industrial domains is preferred Experience in AI, Blockchain, or Metaverse project development is preferred Strong background in frontend development (UI design, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React) is a plus Interested candidates, please submit your CV and Cover Letter by clicking Apply Now Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted by SCB 10X. SCB 10X Co., Ltd. (Head office) No. 2525, One FYI Center Building, Office zone, Unit number 1/301-1/305, 3rd floor, Rama 4 Road, Klongtoei, Klongtoei, Bangkok 10110 Website: www.scb10x.com Careers: www.scb10x.com/careers

LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! FXall is a leading multi-dealer Foreign Exchange Trading platform, with over 200 Liquidity Providers and 2,300 Buy-side institutions. We have commenced building the next generation of the platform, moving to a modern HTML5 GUI hosted in our strategic Workspace Desktop and rebuilding the venue using a microservice based architecture hosted in the cloud. We are seeking dedicated full-stack software engineers to join our Development team in Bangkok. The ideal candidate will have experience as following; Frontend : HTML5/React JS Backend : Java, preferably in an Azure or AWS cloud environment Experience of MS Azure, Kafka, Kubernetes, Microservices, SQL is desirable. Capital Markets and/or Financial Services background is advantageous but not essential. Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. Responsibilities ด้านเครือข่าย (Networking) วางแผนการติดตั้งและปรับปรุงระบบเครือข่ายคอมพิวเตอร์ จัดให้มีระบบรักษาความปลอดภัยในเครือข่ายตามนโยบายของบริษัท ดูแล บำรุงรักษาและบริหารจัดการโครงสร้างพื้นฐานระบบเครือข่าย ดูแลและบริหารจัดการการเชื่อมต่อโครงข่ายคอมพิวเตอร์ระยะไกล (WAN) ด้านการบำรุงรักษา (Maintenance) ดูแลและบริหารจัดการบำรุงรักษาระบบคอมพิวเตอร์ ทั้งซอฟท์แวร์/ฮาร์ดแวร์ ด้านการฝึกอบรม (Training) ส่งเสริมและสนับสนุนการฝึกอบรมทางด้านคอมพิวเตอร์แก่ผู้ใช้งาน ด้านระบบภายใน (Internal Systems) ดูแลการแก้ปัญหา การสำรองข้อมูล การกู้คืนระบบ และจัดหาผู้เชี่ยวชาญมาสนับสนุนเมื่อมีความจำเป็น ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และระบบเครือข่าย ด้านการจัดการทรัพยากรคอมพิวเตอร์ (Asset Management) บริหารจัดการการจัดซื้อซอฟท์แวร์และฮาร์ดแวร์ รวมทั้งสร้างความสัมพันธ์ที่ดี ด้านการจัดการแก้ไขปัญหาและให้คำปรึกษา (Help Desk Administration) ตอบสนองความต้องการใช้งานระบบให้ความช่วยเหลือที่เพิ่มขึ้น ช่วยแก้ไขปัญหาและให้คำปรึกษาการใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์แก่ผู้ใช้งานให้ทันเวลาโดยมิให้งานเสียหาย ด้านการสื่อสารในหน่วยงาน จัดให้มีการประชุมในทีมงานอย่างสม่ำเสมอเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการปฎิบัติงาน แจ้งข่าวความเคลื่อนไหวในองค์กรทั้งเรื่องทั่วไปและเรื่องเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศให้แก่ทีมงาน นำเสนอข้อมูลข่าวสารและกิจกรรมการปฎิบัติงานให้หน่วยงานอื่นได้รับรู้ นำเสนอความก้าวหน้าในวงการเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศแก่องค์กรอย่างสม่ำเสมอ ด้านการจัดการ มีความคิดริเริ่มสร้างสรรค์ ปรับปรุง เปลี่ยนแปลงในงานที่รับผิดชอบ สนับสนุนงานด้านไอทีตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บริหาร รวบรวมข้อมูล วิเคราะห์แนวโน้มกฎหมายทางด้านไอที เพื่อกำหนดเป็นมาตรฐานสำหรับใช้ในองค์กรให้สอดคล้องกับกฎหมายดังกล่าว Qualification Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Information Technology, IT Management or related fields. Experience in Network, Systems Administrator, System Engineer (Microsoft, Unix, Linux, VMware, Hyper-V, Oracle VM) Proven experience as a Head of IT or similar leadership role Strong personal leadership and communication abilities - while empowering others to grow and deliver results Delivers on commitments (such as SLAs, projects) through operational excellence Knowledge of technological trends to build strategy Understanding of budgets and business-planning Knowledge and experience of PM, analysis, and reporting-related tools Be a logical problem solver and demonstrable good leadership skills
