Jobtitle: Senior Data Governance – IT compliance and Data Security
column8: Job summary Salary up to 120,000 THB + Benefits Location Bangkok (BTS/MRT) The company We are looking for a seasoned data governance & data security expert, who has good experience in data governance and security policy design and implementation, to join a fast-growing investment firm in Thailand. You will be overseeing the data quality control, data access policy design, data masking and encryption, and legal compliance of the data usage in the company’s data platform. Responsibilities: Developing the data governance policies and procedures to standardize the company’s data usage Oversee the execution of data governance and data security procedures to ensure the compliance to the policies Monitoring the data quality and response to the security breach incidents in the data platform Provide training to the company’s employee in regards to the data governance and data security policy Ensuring the compliance of the company’s data governance policy with the laws and regulation Qualifications: 4+ years of experience in data governance, data assurance, data security, data management Hands-on experience with data governance and security both policy design and implementation Experienced with access control , data encryption , and data masking Experienced with data quality assurance , data usage metric monitoring Experienced with data sharing procedure across organizations Strong knowledge in data security control with industrial-level certification is preferred : CISSP, CDMP, ISO 27001, etc. Intermediate level of English communication If you are a senior data governance officer with strong knowledge in security compliance, please click “Apply now”. Shall you need any further information, please call 064-240-9462 (Art) at Cathcart Technology.

Job Purpose: Senior Data Engineer responsible for transforming various data source into Data Mart and Data Model that can be promptly use and easily to analyzed, ensuring the data is correct and is in a highly usable state by the time and good performance, working with stakeholders and product owner to design and implement data platform. Experience in cloud platform such as AWS, GCP. Ability to develop Python, R is advantage. Good business understanding, able to identify business problems, formulate business goals, and find relevant data.

Job Summary To provide SAP-FI/CO/PS and its relevant applications support in day-to-day business operation and initiative in SBF TH & Indochina including SWETH, in line with Suntory Global and Regional direction to its best performance. Work closely with SAP COE Lead, Business and Global/Regional IT in Finance Area to ensure SAP-FI/CO/PS and related core applications are efficiently utilized, aligned with local BU expectation, and all regulatory and compliance requirements are met. Job Responsibilities Act as Business Partner for SAP Finance Area: SAP FI: Finance Accounts Receivables (FI-AR) Accounts Payables (FI-AP), Invoice Verification (MM-LIV) Asset Accounting (FI-AA) General Ledger Accounting (FI-GL) Bank Accounting (FI-BL) SAP CO: Controlling Cost Element Accounting (OM-CEL) Cost Center Accounting (OM-CCA) Internal Orders (OM-OPA) Product Cost Controlling (PC) Profitability Analysis (PA) Profit Center Accounting (PCA) Material Ledger/Actual Costing (ML/AC) SAP PS: Project System Integration of FICOPS with other SAP Modules Integration of FICOPS with other applications outside SAP e.g., Bank Application, Trade Spend Planning (TSP), APA-KOFAX, Robotic Process Automation (RPA), TPM Kantar and Coupa. Act as SAP Finance domain (SAP-FI/CO/PS) expert to provide technical solution and evaluate solution provided by 3rd party service provider. Perform feasibility studies and prepare proposals, including business cases for Finance domain (SAP-FI/CO/PS). Ensure application support process and procedure are followed and comply with defined service level agreement. Establish and maintain business partner relationship with Finance Key Stakeholders for both internal and external BU. Be a gatekeeper for all SAP finance integration with other application. Lead change management for SAP-FI/CO/PS related. Initiate improvement/new idea to support business operation and SAP User knowledge in their domain (not limited to SAP). Support SAP digital transformation and automation. Skills and Experience Bachelor's and/or master's degree in computer science, Information Technology, Management, Accounting, Statistic or MBA. At least 5 years’ experience in SAP Implementation and Support (ECC and S4HANA/ Fiori with global template/rollout concept is preferable). Knowledgeable in SAP-FI and SAP-CO both configuration and business process (having SAP-PS experience is a plus). Experience in design and build integration between SAP-FI/CO/PS with relevant applications e.g., Bank, Business Consolidation software, KOFAX, RPA. Intermediate knowledge in writing functional specification, debug and understand ABAP Language is a plus. Understanding CPG, FMCG or Foods and Beverages Industry Business is preferable. Deep understanding in one or more business operations domain (finance, supply chain, sales and logistics, procurement, manufacturing, engineering asset management) Understanding of Enterprise and IT organizational goals and objectives. Good analytical and problem-solving skills Ability to lead adoption and sustainment of change. Ability to drive execution across various departmental and regional stakeholder groups. Organized, the ability to handle the pressure of tight deadlines. Good communication skills. Good command of spoken and written English. Able to travel upcountry and overseas. Fast learner and Self-motivate.

Jobtitle: Technical Lead/ Senior Software Engineer/ หัวหน้าทีมพัฒนาซอฟแวร์
column8: We are seeking a Technical Lead (Squad Lead in Scrum) with a strong proficiency in Node.js, Angular, Nest.js, and MSSQL. This role requires a unique blend of technical expertise and leadership skills to guide our development team, make strategic architectural decisions, and ensure the successful delivery of complex web applications. Responsibilities: Be the Squad Lead in the Scrum framework, responsible for leading and mentoring a cross-functional team of developers. Provide technical leadership in Node.js, Angular, Nest.js, and MSSQL, driving architectural decisions and ensuring code quality. Collaborate closely with stakeholders to understand project requirements and objectives. Mentor and coach squad members, fostering their technical growth, skill enhancement, and career development. Troubleshoot complex technical challenges and guide the squad in effective problem-solving and decision-making. Implement Agile methodologies, optimize processes, and drive continuous improvement within the squad. Requirements: At least two years proven experience as a Technical Lead, Squad Lead, or similar leadership role in Node.js, Angular, and Nest.js development . Strong knowledge of MSSQL database design, query optimization, and data integrity best practices. Proficiency in version control systems (e.g., Git) and continuous integration/delivery pipelines. Exceptional leadership skills, capable of motivating, mentoring, and managing a diverse technical team. Thorough understanding of Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum, and experience leading Agile ceremonies. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, to facilitate collaboration and convey complex technical concepts. Problem-solving mindset and the ability to guide the team through intricate technical challenges. Dedication to fostering a positive team culture, promoting continuous learning, and driving innovation.

Perform coding and unit testing as required. Participation to software development projects run by Head Office, or Regional Development team. Procedures setup and control for launching new projects. Develop Android application of C# in ASP.NET and web API integration. Qualifications: Bachelor or Master's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or related fields. At Least 1-3 years of experiences in software engineering field. Good command of English communication skills. Strong knowledge of C# in ASP.NET, .NET framework, .NET Core, MVC, web application, web service, web APIs. Knowledge of JSON and XML concepts. Ability to use SQL statement. Ability to work well in a team, integrity. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming Able to use RDBMS (MySQL or SQL Server is required) Familiarity with the .NET framework 3.5 or greater.. Skill for writing reusable C#libraries. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools (Git, Gitlab, SVN, Others) Location: BTS Wongwian Yai, BTS krungthonburi Interested applicants please apply in person or send your full resume with a copy of transcript & expected salary together with a recent photo via Apply now button only. GHL (Thailand) Co.,Ltd. 77/161, 37th Fl, Sinn Sathorn Tower, Krungthonburi Rd., Klongtonsai , Klongsan ,Bangkok 10600 Tel : 02-440-0111

Jobtitle: Senior Programmer (C# or JAVA) @BTS Chit Lom
column8: - Design and Develop Windows/ Web Application according to client requirement. - Coordinate with other team member to finish the project. - Onsite and make suggestion during meeting with client. - Analyze and execute Unit test for each responsible part. - Discuss with SA, Tester, Support Engineer to resolve problem during developing phase. - Other task as assign by Project Manager. Requirement Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineer, or related fields At least 3 years of experience in C#.Net, VB.Net, or Java programming language . Good programming knowledge in .NET [Core language for TSE] English is Lower Intermediate Level (use for writing, and reading) Have experience in coding with C#, JAVA, JS, C#, CSS, PHP (optional) Good basic knowledge of business logic & production and Factory. Ability to work under pressure and time constraint. Good analytical and problem-solving skills. Good personality, service-minded, enthusiastic, and hardworking.

Jobtitle: SAP Basis Consultant/ที่ปรึกษา SAP Basis
column8: Responsibilities Define requisites for new installations, installation of SAP systems and post activities. Define requisites for upgrade, upgrade of SAP Systems and post activities. SAP Solution Manager basic configurations. Be part of the on-call service. Be part of a third level Helpdesk, supporting your colleagues in problem solving of high technical issues. Client copies and System copies of SAP Systems. Migration of SAP Systems to different platforms and different operating Systems. Maintaining operational and technical documents. You will have the opportunity to learn more about the different SAP Systems and how to monitor and update them, product such as SAP ERP, SAP HANA, SAP BW, SAP APO, SAP CRM, SAP SRM, SAP PI/PO, SAP Portal, SAP Solution Manager, SAP Fiori, SAP Business Objects, SAP HANA Cloud Platform, SAP HANA Cloud Integration, SAP C/4HANA Qualifications Bachelor's degree in IT or related fileds Minimum 2 years experience in SAP Basis Strong technical skills. Team player and ability to work autonomously.

Responsibilities Primarily responsible to plan, monitor and deliver scoped systems modules and functionality according to quality standards to provide ERP application management support. Provide solutions to incidents raised by customer. Conduct unit tests and/or integration tests. Configuration, modification, implement and support for related modules SAP Module PP,FI/CO,QM Analyze, solve problem (root cause) and provide appropriate solution. Support user in order to prevent and avoid any impact to business. Knowledge sharing and continued improvement. Trains key users and end users. Provide mentoring and knowledge sharing to colleagues. Qualifications Bachelor Degree or Higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or related field. Minimum of 5 years’ experience in IT system, application support or related fields. Minimum 1-3 years relevant SAP experience in the area applied for SAP PP,CO-PC,QM Experience in SAP ECC6.0 , SAP S/4 HANA Understanding of the business processes, standards and practices of related applications relevant to his/her area of responsibility. Integration knowledge with other SAP modules will be highly valued. Excellent communication skills and customer relationship skills. Good analytical, problem-solving and consulting skills. Greenline Synergy Co., Ltd. 488 Samitivej Srinakarin Hospital Building, 7th Floor, Srinakarin Road, Suanluang,  Suanluang, Bangkok  10250

IT One is an end-to-end IT solution provider which is a unique partnership between Accenture, the world leading provider of management consulting, technology services and outsourcing, in a joint venture with SCG, Thailand's largest industrial conglomerate. https://www.itone.co.th/ IT One Benefit: Fixed Bonus 1 month Performance Bonus Flexible Benefit (20,000THB yearly) Annual leave 15 days/ year Fitness First membership Provident Fund Health insurance (include legal wife/husband/children) Life insurance Annual Health Check Up English allowance when passing TOEIC score 750+ Job Description Be responsible for design, implement and delivery the functional and technical components of the planning, budgeting and forecasting solutions. Able to interact with clients to understand the business requirements to conclude blueprint, configuration, testing, migration, support, and continuous enhancements. Responsibilities include, using knowledge of accounting function on General Ledger, Asset Accounting, Controlling and Profitability process areas. Focusing on SAP SAC and SAP Datasphere on development and deployment of business Intelligence Solutions to support business requirements using SAC Planning. SAP Business Planning and Consolidations (BPC), BusinessObjects/Business Intelligence (BO/BI) and Data Warehouse (BW) skills will be an advantage. Qualification Bachelor's degree in IT or equivalent work experience. Minimum 2 years of experience in managing SAP Analytical and/or Reporting work streams for large or complex systems for various industry sectors Experience on SAC/BPC as a planning tool, designing/implementing data models and data conversion Demonstrates thought proven abilities and technical experience with SAP Analytics technologies: S/4HANA Embedded Analytics, BW/4HANA, SAP Fiori, Google/Azure/AWS Cloud technologies and BI/visualization tools Good Understanding of SAP data structures, End to End dataflow, SAC predictive capabilities, augmented analytics, planning, budgeting, forecasting, etc. Ability to be flexible and work analytically in a problem-solving environment Ability to travel to client sites (local or overseas) Excellent leadership, communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills “Please note that by entering the information into this site, you explicitly consent and allow IT One to collect and process your personal data (including but not limited to name, mobile phone number, personal identification etc.) for the purpose of applying for the job. The information you provided will also be kept and shared with IT One internal stakeholders for job application purposes. The protection of your personal data is very important to IT One.  IT One is committed to keeping your personal data secured, and processing it in accordance with, applicable data protection laws and our internal policies, https://www.accenture.com/us-en/careers/life-at-accenture/privacy-policy [link removed]” Interested candidates, please send your full CV in English, certificate, recent photo, and expected salary to: Human Resources Department Tipco Tower, 21st- 22nd Floor, 118/1 Rama VI Road, Phaya Thai, Bangkok, 10400 Website: https://www.itone.co.th/ [link removed] Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Itone.co.th/ Linked: https://www.linkedin.com/company/it-one/

System Analyst/Programmer (JAVA) Job Description:- Design and create Software Unit Test and Software check list with Senior Developer. Create Software Development Environment and Tools based on CMB Integrating Framework (Include Version control system, Bug Tracking or any system). Create Software Prototype with Senior Developer based on CMB Integration Frameworks. Create template of software operation manual. Requirements:- At least 5 years experience in software architecture. Knowledge of Object-Oriented Analysis & Design with UML. Knowledge in J2EE framework Struts, Web Service, Spring, Hibernate, Java APIs in XML, Thread, Mail, CLI Stream, JDBC and XML language series. Knowledge of BEA or Web Sphere Web Service technology. Knowledge of System integration concept and design. Knowledge in Banking background is a plus. Personal Characteristics:- Accountability Good attitude Self-directed Proactive Compromise Java Programmer Descriptions:- Coding and testing program modules that meet design specifications; assisting in design. Fix defects submitted by tester accuracy based on specification. Build and deploy application. Works mostly independently within task guidelines established by management. Perform work based on defined process and provide feedback on process improvements as appropriate. Co-operate with team leader in estimation effort, developing plan/schedule and performing tasks according to the plan. Requirements:- Thai only Bachelor's Degree or Master 's Degree in Computer Science/ Engineering/ Information Technology or related fields. Have 3-5 years of experience in candidates in software development using JAVA and JAVA technology including JSP, Java Script, J2EE, Servlet, -EJB, Struts Framework,Hibernate,Eclipse etc. Applicants must have strong Java skills. - Knowledge of conception of Object Oriented Design and UML Design. Knowledge of SQL Command. Eager to learn for new technologies. Able to deal and handle difficult situations and work under time constraints. Can work as a team, must be able to work under extremely high pressure. Proactive, self-motivated, systematic thinking, fast learner and willing to contribute and work as a team. Interested candidates are invited to write in with full resume, stating present and expected salary, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below: Job Location : BKK Contact : Innopia (Thailand) Co., Ltd Address : 26th Floor, Gaysorn Tower, Ratchadamri Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Tel : DID + 66-(0)20730223 Website : www.innopiaglobal.com

Company: GMO-Z com Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
column8: Responsibilities: Develop cloud-based company website and backend system using Angular and C#. Develop marginable stock calculation system. Develop real time risk management monitoring system. Develop AI real time chat bot. Develop web-based algo trading. Develop internal tools and company KPI monitoring dashboard. Conduct unit test, integration test, and deployment for current and new features developed utilizing CI/CD. Keep track on latest technologies and trends such as AWS Cloud Computing, Microservices Software Architecture, Robotic Process Automation, Container, NoSQL, Machine Learning, Blockchain, etc. Create technical document, user manual. Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. Qualifications and Experiences: 3 - 6 years in software development. Experience in securities company or any financial related area is a plus. Good command of written and spoken English. Able to work in an Agile environment. Must be able to work well under pressure. Strong analytical skills, rational thinking with excellent interpersonal skills. Highly self-motivated to achieve responsible assignment. Pleasant personality with service minded, energetic, enthusiastic and a good team player. We are fully providing the benefits as followings; Group Life & Health & Dental Insurance: OPD from THB 77,000-150,000 allowance per year, IPD room & board of THB 3,000 per day, etc. Provident Fund Annual Health Check-up Company’s outing and New year party Other supports refer to company’s policy (i.e. marriage gift, hospital visit gift, birthday gift, dead benefit, etc.) Performance Bonus Business leave 3 days Annual leave 6 days (after probation) and will increase 1 day annually with maximum of 12 days. ***** For full details, please refer to company’s benefits plan ***** Please send updated Resume with photo, current and expected salary. All applications will be treated in the strictest of confidence. GMO-Z com Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited No. 9, G Tower, Grand Rama 9, 15th Floor, South Wing, Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310, Thailand Mobile: +66(0)64-180-2407 (HR Department)

Responsibilities Transportation Owner • Cost Verification (60 hours/ month) - Transportation Freight Bill Voucher cost verification - Miscellaneous: Delayed Unloading, Additional truck, Reject / Return Transport Cost, Direct To Store Cost - Back Haul cost - Monthly fuel cost updates • Report Verification (30 hours/ month) - OTD (On Time Delivery) result pre-check before meeting - Review, update, and verify master data: Update and verify transportation costs, trip rates, freight bill, on-time-delivery, customer transit times, and cost saving projects • Meeting (10 hours/month) - Attend weekly transportation connect meeting and assist with minute-of-meeting write-up and share the summary with the team through email - Attend any additional meeting that may require transportation owner to assist transportation leader NPI Owner • Update approver list (5 hours/ month) - If there is any approval matrix change, update approver list Customization Owner • Quotation (20 minutes/ project) - Change to contractor without any trigger from CIL leader. Information will be already provided since project kick off - FCST upload or Base check or PM inventory check (20 minutes/ project) - Change to contractor without any trigger from CIL leader. Expected date will be already given since project kick off - Confirm in project management tool (in the future) Warehouse Process Engineer Assistance (10 hours/month) Help support Process Engineer in cross-doc warehousing project Qualification - Bachelor’s degree of science/ engineering/logistics or related - Good in English – Business Communication level. Capable to communicate with business partner in other country. (Singapore, Philippine, China) - Analytical thinking and management skills. - Able to manage workload effectively via delivery team meeting. - Attention to details - MS Office – Strong in Excel: Pivot Table and V- lookup, Strong in Power Point - 1 to 3 years of proven experience in project management or logistics or supply chain is a plus. (Other experiences are also welcome to apply) Work Schedule: Mon-Fri, 8.30 - 17.00 Location: Wellgrow Industrial Estate, Bangna-Trad Rd., Bangpakong, Chachoengsao Company: Consumer Product Employment Type: Contract with Manpower (Open-ended) Benefits: SSO, Group health insurance, Annual leave, Bonus, Annual Health Check, Provident Fund, Travel Allowance, Annual salary increment etc. If you are interested, please click apply with your resume (with photo) attached and state your expected salary. All information provided will be kept confidential and used only for recruitment process.

More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550 dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in Southeast Asia. Role Responsibilities Leading solution design workshops, ensuring technical excellence within the team. Delivering innovative solutions, and taking ownership until optimal outcomes are achieved. Fostering a culture of learning, especially in DevOps concepts. Applying proficiency in Agile/Lean methodologies, contributing to Continuous Improvement initiatives. Ensuring efficient delivery of value to customers, aligning with our commitment to excellence. Demonstrating curiosity and customer empathy, seeking optimal solutions beyond the initial response. Collaborating effectively in problem-solving through activities like Huddles and Pair Programming. Providing and receiving feedback openly fosters continuous learning. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent industry experience as a Software Engineer. Front and back-end development (VB6, VB.NET, C#). Handling large monolithic legacy systems. Experience with relational databases, preferably MS SQL Server. Familiarity with AWS and container architectures is highly desired. Strong software engineering fundamentals, including Object-Oriented/functional programming, Design Patterns, Domain domain-driven design, and Test-Driven Development. Test automation experience (Unit, Integration, End-to-End User Interface). Proficient in modern software tooling (CI/CD platforms, Github, Datadog, Sonarqube). Solid understanding of the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). Application of Continuous Delivery concepts for software deployment.

Our client is a leading cloud service provider with extensive experience in the ICT industry. General Description of Duties and Responsibilities Advocating CLOUD technology in the wider community. Develop and execute a strategy to promote technical solutions with existing and future customers. Earning trust and building relationships with developers is key. Attending various technical community events & university workshops and delivering keynote speeches or delivery training courses on CLOUD services. Helping users understand how they can develop, deploy and operate applications that are scalable, secure, and maintainable. Working as a bridge between the open source & developer communities and organizing for meetups, taking part in educating, sharing best practices via how-to videos and conducting technical workshops, building efficient and effective solutions. Working with the product management team to plan content and events such as tutorials, promotional videos, and technical blog posts. Working as a Partner with CLOUD Development teams to evaluate the latest CLOUD services resolve customer issues and solicit feedback for improvements, feedback on potential bugs, and usability issues to Development teams. Candidate Requirements At least a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related fields. 3-5 years of technical experience in Cloud technologies. Possession of related Cloud Certifications, such as HCIP, AWS, Azure, and GCP. Possess a good command of at least one of the programming languages, such as Java, Python, C++, GO, and JavaScript. Possess knowledge of data structures, algorithms, operating systems, computer networks, databases, and mainstream middleware. Good understanding of the technology stack in either Blockchain, Mobile, AI, Big Data or IoT areas. Prior experience working with Developer Communities via the conduct of technical workshops and/or providing technical solutions to companies.

Scope of work: วางแผน ออกแบบและพัฒนาเว็บแอปพลิเคชัน Full Stack ออกแบบ ติดตั้ง ควบคุม และดูแลรักษาระบบงานในระดับ Server และฐานข้อมูล ออกแบบและพัฒนา APIs สำหรับการสื่อสารระหว่าง Frontend และ Backend สามารถแก้ไขปัญหาระบบและทำงานประสานงานร่วมกันในทีมพัฒนา ทำงานร่วมกับทีมวิศวกรซอฟต์แวร์ และทีมผู้บริหารโครงการ ทำการทดสอบและปรับปรุงโค้ดเพื่อรักษาคุณภาพและประสิทธิภาพ ให้บริการรองรับการทดสอบระบบงานในส่วนของลูกค้า เช่น System Integration Test, User Acceptance Test, Performance Test, Security Test เป็นต้น Qualification : มีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนาเว็บแอปพลิเคชันแบบ Full Stack อย่างน้อย 3 ปี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในเรื่อง UI/UX, Responsive Design, HTML5, CSS, XML, Browser Developer Tools, Web Performance, jQuery และ JavaScript มีความถนัดและเชี่ยวชาญด้าน Frontend Framework เช่น React, AngularJS, Vue.js, Flutter มีความถนัดและเชี่ยวชาญด้าน Backend เช่น Spring Framework, Java EE, Node.js, Hibernate ความรู้และประสบการณ์ในการทำงานกับฐานข้อมูล SQL และ NoSQL ความเข้าใจในการใช้งานและการทำงานกับ RESTful APIs (Optional): ความรู้หรือประสบการณ์ในการทำงานกับ Docker และ Kubernetes หรือ มีทักษะในการใช้งานเครื่องมือและเทคโนโลยีที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) เช่น Bitbucket, Jenkin, Ansible หรือ มีความเข้าใจ DevOps ความคุ้นเคยกับการทำงานในระบบ Cloud เช่น AWS, Azure, Google หรือ Huawei ความรู้หรือประสบการณ์ในการทำงานกับ Software Version Control เช่น Git หรือ Quality Management Tool เช่น Sonarqube ความรู้หรือประสบการณ์ในการทำงานเพื่อเชื่อมต่อกับ SAP system

Jobtitle: System Analyst (System Integration) ประจำสีลม
column8: Report to: Project Manager Subordinate: -/- Work location: สีลม Work day: จันทร์ – ศุกร์, 8.30 – 17.30 น. Job responsibilities จัดเก็บและวิเคราะห์ Business Requirement เพื่อทำเป็น Technical Requirement และประเมินผลระบบ จัดทำเอกสาร Technical Requirement ให้กับคนในทีม วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นจากระบบธุรกิจที่เป็นอยู่ และผลกระทบที่เกิดจาก Technical Requirement รวมทั้งกำหนดทางเลือกต่าง ๆ ที่เป็นไปได้ ในการแก้ปัญหา ออกแบบ UI หรือ Screen Design , Database Design, Report or Dashboard Design เพื่อส่งต่อให้กับทีมพัฒนาระบบ ออกแบบและวางระบบงานให้สอดคล้องกับการใช้งานขององค์กร รวมทั้งแจกแจงสิ่งต่าง ๆ ที่จำเป็นต้องพัฒนาขึ้นเพื่อใช้หรือทดแทนระบบเดิม กำหนด Spec ของอุปกรณ์คอมพิวเตอร์และซอฟต์แวร์ตามความเหมาะสมขององค์กร ประสานงานกับทีม Tester เพื่อทดสอบระบบบ หรือทดสอบการทำงานของระบบด้วยตนเองพร้อมสรุป Defect ส่งให้ทางทีมพัฒนาระบบปรับปรุงแก้ไข Support การทำงานของทีมพัฒนาระบบและลูกค้า จัดทำเอกสาร User Acceptance Test (UAT) และทดสอบร่วมกับทางลูกค้าหรือผู้ใช้งานจนกว่าลูกค้าจะยอมรับ จัดทำแผนติดตามความคืบหน้าของการพัฒนาระบบและรายงานผลกับทาง Project Manager(PM) เป็นระยะจนกว่าระบบพัฒนาแล้วเสร็จ จัดทำเอกสารสำหรับส่งมอบงานให้ลูกค้า เช่น เอกสาร Software Requirement Spec(SRS), เอกสารคู่มือการใช้งานระบบ, เอกสารตรวจรับตามขอบเขตงาน เป็นต้น จัดทำเอกสารการฝึกอบรม และร่วมอบรมการใช้งานระบบให้กับลูกค้าหรือผู้ใช้งานระบบ Training การใช้งานและสนับสนุนวิธีการใช้งานระบบให้กับทีม Support เพื่อช่วยสนับสนุนการใช้งานระบบให้กับลูกค้าหรือผู้ใช้งานระบบในระยะ Warrantee หรือ Maintenance ของโครงการ Requirement: ปริญญาตรี สาขา วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ 3 ปีขึ้นไปในสายงาน System Analyst มีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรม หรือเคยเป็น Developer มาก่อนจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถออกแบบระบบ Web Application, Mobile(IOS, Andriod), API ได้ สามารถออกแบบ UX, UI และอธิบายงานให้ Developer พัฒนาระบบงานต่อได้ สามารถจัดทำเอกสารคุณสมบัติของระบบงาน (Software Requirement Spec ในรูปแบบของ UML) ได้ Tools: Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio, Oracle DB, Toad, SQL Developer, Window Server, Linux Server, Microsoft Office เป็นต้น มีความรู้ด้านสถิติ คิด วิเคราะห์ และนำเสนอแก่บริษัทลูกค้าได้ อัธยาศัยดี มีความเป็นมืออาชีพ อดทน พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากมีประสบการณ์ทำงานกับหน่วยงานราชการมาก่อน สามารถเดินทางไปทำงานที่กรมสรรพสามิต (พระราม 6) หรือตามไซต์งานลูกค้าได้ For interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click " Apply Now " All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality. Job description A normal day as a programmer with us, means that you work from our office in Rayong. You and other developers work in teams with each other but work on your own tasks. The team is important to be able to help each other, meet any challenges and to feel good at work. We are not requiring that you must work from the office every day, as it is sometimes better to work from home. When there is time left, we spend that time learning new techniques, and improving those we already know. Job requirements Full-stack programmer with skills in C#.Net MVC and some knowledge of front-end programming (Javascript or TypeScript), and styling as well (HTML,CSS). We make systems where we integrate API with front-end, mostly Angular, API's may also need more functions or modifications, so a knowledge of C# and Entity framework is needed. English speaking. Angular is a merit, if you don't know Angular you can learn it during employment.

Responsibilities: ASP.NET Core and SignalR Development: Design, develop, and maintain back-end applications using ASP.NET Core. Implement real-time data communication solutions using SignalR or other relevant technologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate back-end functionalities seamlessly. C# and TCP Socket Expertise: Utilize C# to write efficient and maintainable code for back-end services. Implement and manage TCP socket connections for effective data exchange. Troubleshoot and optimize code for performance and scalability. Web Security and Authorization: Implement robust web security measures to safeguard back-end systems and data. Develop and maintain web authorization mechanisms for user authentication and access control. Stay updated on the latest security trends and best practices. Requirements: Proven experience as a Back-End Developer with a focus on ASP.NET Core. Proficiency in real-time data communication, especially with SignalR or equivalent technologies. Strong knowledge of C# and TCP socket programming. Familiarity with web security principles and best practices. Experience in implementing web authorization and access control mechanisms. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively. Preferred Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Experience with other back-end frameworks and languages. Familiarity with cloud services and deployment (Azure, AWS, etc.). Understanding of agile development methodologies. If you are a Back-End Developer passionate about creating scalable, secure, and real-time solutions, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, and any project portfolios that showcase your back-end development expertise. Join us in shaping the future of technology!

Job Description: Provides any necessary technical support to Sales Managers during technical meetings. Prepares and delivers technical presentations and demonstrations for both internal staff and customers on complex product issues. Offers product/solution/service related training. Offers technical advice and provides comment on enquiry specifications for customers with regard to company's products/systems/ applications (Mobile substation, containerized solution and prefabrication solution). Performs analytic and diagnostic studies to determine most suitable technical solution to meet customer needs. Proposes technical solutions for complex enquiries. Prepares and checks technical articles for publication. Qualifications: 2-3 years of experience in Sales Engineering in power, electrical, automation, or energy industry. Has an understanding of the power and utility market. Has a Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering. Familiar with using English in a professional capacity. Must be able to drive. Candidate must have a car and a license.

Jobtitle: Software Developer/โปรแกรมเมอร์
column8: Position Type: Permanent/Full-time Office Location: 143/130 Moo 5 T.Rasada A.Muang Phuket 83000 proALPHA Thailand ต้องการรับสมัครผู้ร่วมงานในตำแหน่ง  Software Developer จำนวนมากเพื่อรองรับปริมาณงานที่เพิ่มมากขึ้นและเพิ่มศักยภาพในการเติบโตของบริษัทในอนาคต คุณสมบัติ: มีความรู้ ความเข้าใจเบื้องต้นเกี่ยวกับ Database Query (SQL, MySQL, Oracle, ODBC, etc.), Programming, Coding, DevTool (Jira, Git, Bitbucket etc.) ยินดีต้อนรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ และผู้มีประสบการณ์ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง สำเร็จการศึกษาปริญญาตรีสาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความรับผิดชอบ กระตือรือร้น ความคิดสร้างสรรค์ สนใจเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆอยู่เสมอ และสามารถทำงานร่วมกันเป็นทีมได้เป็นอย่างดี สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษพื้นฐานได้ หากมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับ ERP Software จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ลักษณะการทำงานภายในบริษัท Work-Life-Balance: การทำงานต้องอยู่บนพื้นฐานของความสมดุล เพื่อก่อให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดต่อการทำงานควบคู่ไปกับการดำเนินชีวิตอย่างมีความสุข Training and Development: การเริ่มต้นกับ proALPHA ไม่ได้ยากอย่างที่คิด เรามีหลักสูตรอบรมพนักงาน รวมไปถึงมีการให้คำปรึกษาพนักงานทุกคน เพื่อเพิ่มศักยภาพในการทำงาน และการสื่อสารระหว่างองค์กร เพิ่มโอกาสในการพัฒนาตัวบุคคลและความก้าวหน้าภายในองค์กรให้ดียิ่งขึ้น Security: สัญญาจ้างงานประจำกับบริษัทที่เติบโตและมีการพัฒนาอย่างต่อเนื่อง รายได้และสวัสดิการที่มั่นคง Company culture: เน้นการทำงานเป็นทีม เปิดกว้างรับไอเดียใหม่ ๆ และทำงานอย่างเป็นกันเอง อดทน ยอมรับและเรียนรู้จากข้อผิดพลาดในการทำงาน ใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในการสื่อสารกับเพื่อนร่วมงานสาขาอื่น ๆ Work environment: บริษัทพร้อมให้การสนับสนุนอุปกรณ์สำหรับทำงานอย่างเต็มที่ มี Laptop คุณภาพสูงให้พนักงานได้ใช้งาน รวมไปถึงเฟอร์นิเจอร์และอุปกรณ์ในสำนักงานที่มีคุณภาพดี Work from home บริษัทอนุญาตให้ทำงานจากที่บ้านได้ ตามพิจารณาเห็นสมควรโดยหัวหน้าแผนก สวัสดิการ ทำงาน 5 วัน หยุด เสาร์ อาทิตย์ วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 18 วันต่อปี วันพักร้อนประจำปี 12 วันต่อปี โบนัส ตามผลการทำงาน ยูนิฟอร์ม การฝึกอบรม กิจกรรมสังสรรค์ของพนักงานประจำเดือนและประจำปี

LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! Connected to over 100+ of the largest banks, liquidity providers, global custodians, correspondent banks and prime brokers, Settlement Center allows automation of middle and back office trade processing by exchanging SWIFT confirmation messages, trade matching, settlement instructions, trade-netting, third-party notifications, trade receipt splitting and more We have commenced building the next generation of the application, moving to a modern HTML5 GUI hosted in our strategic Workspace Desktop and rebuilding the venue using a microservice based architecture hosted in the cloud. We are seeking dedicated full-stack software engineers to join our Development team in Bangkok. The ideal candidate will have experience of; HTML5/React JS front end Java back-end development Preferably in an Azure or AWS cloud environment. Experience of MS Azure, Kafka, Kubernetes, Microservices, SQL is desirable. Capital Markets and/or Financial Services background is advantageous but not essential. Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to us are aware of this privacy notice.

Jobtitle: Recruitment Specialist (Sr. Talent Acquisition)/ผู้ชำนาญการ สรรหาว่าจ้าง
column8: Main Purpose of the Job This position will be responsible for all stages of the recruitment process until hiring for on-going and new projects awarded to the company in addition to proposing or fulfilling requests for office and technical personnel requested by the company or its clients. The main focus is to source national and expatriate officers, technicians and engineers experienced in the required fields. Missions & Responsibilities The roles require the individual to be involved in all stages of the recruitment process until hiring which includes but not limited to: Receiving and qualifying job descriptions from the clients and requesters. Searching for suitable candidates using a variety of sources including in-house database and search engine, external search engines, referrals and job advertising. Managing applications, screening and shortlisting suitable candidates within deadline Interviewing candidates for selection purposes to ensure skills as well as cultural fitness Fully qualifying candidates on qualifications, expected package, and other relevant requirements Preparing CVs for proper submission as per requirements Arranging interviews appointment, and briefing and preparing candidates for interview Preparing an offer letter with the contract terms and conditions to selected candidate Offering, negotiating and explaining to the selected candidate as necessary to ensure the acceptance of offer Arranging pre-employment medical check-up booking Informing all related parties for a new joiner with relevant information Making appointment with the selected candidate and all relevant parties for arranging an orientation and employment contract signing Maintaining Applicant data records Ensuring that any vacancy requirements are recorded in as detailed as possible Ensuring that details of the recruitment process i.e. CVs sent, interviews arranged, vacancy requirements and placements are recorded in a timely, accurate and proper manner. Filing documents and updating information of the new joiner in company's server Providing support on any other HR related roles as assigned and agreed with the line manager Qualifications Bachelor's or higher degree At least 5 years of experience in recruitment, especially engineers and technicians Minimum 3 years of experience in oil and gas or refinery industry or other engineering sectors Good command of written and spoken English Proficiency with Microsoft Office programs is essential. A team player with good communication and coordination skills Self-motivated, ability to set priorities and meet deadlines, and ability to perform under pressure

Responsibilities : As a developer, you will be responsible for the overall quality of the software solutions developed. This encompasses: The participation to concept and design phases of products The follow-up of the development phases and quality checks The identification of software improvements and providing advises The development of additional features and integrations The optimization of code and infrastructure components to ensure seamless experience for our customers. The development of automated unit and integration testing The conduct of performance testing and tuning Maintaining the code, compliance, and security standard Keeping up to date with software development and technology trends and apply to the project. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, IT, MIS, or equivalent experience Personal interest in blockchain technology and willingness to learn At least 3 years experience in system development (+ is an advantage) Experience with one of these backend framework Java (Spring Boot), Node.js. Experience with one front-end framework such as Angular or React. Experience with MariaDB and MongoDB. Good to have experience with Jenkins and CI/CD process. Autonomous and able to work in a team. Can-do and positive attitude. Good communications and interpersonal skill. Benefit & Other : Flexible working hours with 5-day work week with WFH Policy* Life insurance ,Medical insurance, OPD , Dental insurance Education allowance Performance bonus Annual Health Check

Account Manager / Sales Engineer What’s the role? We are looking for a high potential candidate with strong business acumen to unleash high potential at Hilti, starting as Account Manager. This is no ordinary job. Our people come from all different backgrounds with a shared dedication to high performance, consistent results and outstanding customer service. Who is Hilti? If you’re new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 75 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service. With some 30,000 people in more than 120 countries, we’re a great place for you to show us your worth as you learn, grow and carve-out your career. What does the role involve? As Account Manager / Sales Engineer, you will directly report to Sales Manager. Professional knowledge in products, market and service are fundamental to the role as key responsibilities involve developing and growing the assigned sales territories. You will need strong winning mindset to identify new sales potential and turn leads into our customers. From day to day, challenging tasks and responsibilities will help you pave your way as becoming an ambitious market leader. It would be great if you have some experiences with contractors. At Hilti, you’ll enjoy all the perks of being part of a big company, but with the autonomy of running a small business. What do we offer? We’ll give you everything you need to excel in your role, including ongoing training and lots of responsibilities from the start. In return for your exceptional performance and consistent results, you’ll receive one-to-one career mentoring, as well as exciting opportunities to move around the business. Why should you apply? We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative, more productive team. So, if you’ve never worked in construction, that’s fine with us. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, regardless of your background. What you need is: Degree in Civil Engineering/Mechanical Engineering/ Electrical Engineering or any related field At least 3 years of sales experience or equivalent contractors/customers Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Good command of written and spoken Thai & English Computer literacy and experience in SFDC or any CRM, it would be an advantage Dynamic personality with strong winning and high performance mindset Self-motivated and a quick learner If we’re impressed with your CV, we’ll invite you for an interview, introduce you to the team and pay for your travel to get there. Do you have any questions? Please contact HR Department Tempted to apply or find out more? Go to https://careers.hilti.group/en/jobs/

column8: Opening for these following positions. Senior Mobile Developer: A mix of team management and coding base role. Integration : Integrate third-party APIs, libraries, and services to enhance app functionality. Testing : Conduct unit and integration testing to ensure the reliability and performance of applications. As a part of MUFG (Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group), we a truly a global bank with networks all over the world. Scope of work: As a Senior mobile developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing mobile applications for various platforms, such as iOS, Android, etc. This position requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills and also requires you to take advantage of opportunities to learn new technology and development best practices. You should have strong coding skills and a passion for creating engaging mobile experiences. You should also have excellent problem-solving and communication skills and be able to work effectively in a team environment. You will work closely with the back-end developers, SA, and project managers to implement and support the core functionality of the application. You should have strong problem-solving skills and a good understanding of mobile or cross-platform technologies. Duties and Responsibilities: Developing and maintaining mobile and cross-platform applicationsusing languages such as Java, Swift, Kotlin,React Native, Flutter, Xamarin, and etc. Ensuring that applications are optimized for performance and cross-platform compatibility. Collaborating with back-end developers to integrate mobile code with server-side logic. Troubleshooting and debugging issues as they arise. Staying up to date with new technologies and trends in the field. Providing technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or a related technical field. Minimum 3 years’ experience in developer. Strong knowledge mobile or cross-platform script such as Java, Swift, Kotlin, React Native, Flutter, Xamarin, and etc. Experience with modern cross-platform frameworks. Ability to integrate user interfaces with back-end systems and APIs. Ability to implement security and data protection measures. Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Familiarity with agile development methodologies. Ability to stay up to date with the latest mobile and cross-platform technologies and best practices. Ability to provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers and lead projects. Ability to troubleshoot and debug issues and complex problems.

LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! FXall is a leading multi-dealer Foreign Exchange Trading platform, with over 200 Liquidity Providers and 2,300 Buy-side institutions. We have commenced building the next generation of the platform, moving to a modern HTML5 GUI hosted in our strategic Workspace Desktop and rebuilding the venue using a microservice based architecture hosted in the cloud. We are seeking dedicated full-stack software engineers to join our Development team in Bangkok. The ideal candidate will have experience as following; Frontend : HTML5/React JS Backend : Java, preferably in an Azure or AWS cloud environment. Experience of MS Azure, Kafka, Kubernetes, Microservices, SQL is desirable. Capital Markets and/or Financial Services background is advantageous but not essential. Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. column8: We are looking for a dynamic and experienced Project Manager to join our team and lead nation-level IT projects for government clients. The ideal candidates will have a strong background in project management, with a focus on IT solutions and system integration. As Project Managers, you will play a crucial role in collaborating with the Presales Team and working seamlessly with various internal and external stakeholders. Your responsibilities include managing and controlling the project budget, schedule, and scope of work, including ensuring the quality of deliverables. Additionally, you will be responsible for identifying risks and implementing effective mitigation strategies. Location: Silom Office (BS: Chong Nonsi, Surasak, Saint Louis) Workday: Monday - Friday (8:30 – 17:30) Benefits: Phone allowance, Project Incentive, Performance bonus, Annual leave (13-14 days), Business leave, Parking, Health and Life Insurance (Emergency, IPD, OPD), Provident Fund Report to: Head of Project Management Subordinate: - Responsibilities: Develop and implement project plans, including timelines, milestones, and deliverables. Coordinate project resources and activities to ensure successful project execution. Collaborate with Presales Consultants to understand client requirements and propose effective solutions. Work closely with the IT Operation Team to ensure seamless project implementation and support. Engage with the Software Team to align product offerings with client needs and market trends. Collaborate with the Procurement Team to ensure timely acquisition of necessary resources. Liaise with external parties, including IT outsourcing companies and other vendors. Manage and control project budget. Oversee project schedule, ensuring adherence to timelines and milestones. Monitor and manage the scope of work of the project. Ensure the quality of project deliverables meets established standards. Identify project risks and develop effective mitigation strategies. Communicate project status and updates to clients, stakeholders, and internal teams. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in IT/Technology or a related field. Proven experience as a Presales Consultant or Presales Engineer in the IT Solutions/System Integration industry. Strong technical knowledge and understanding of IT Infrastructure (Software, Hardware, Network, Cloud, and others) Excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Ability to evaluate project costs accurately. Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills. Proven experience in negotiating project prices. Demonstrated ability to prepare comprehensive project proposals. Experience in preparing for and participating in auctions. Familiarity with government clients and projects is advantageous. For interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click "Apply Now" All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality. Chanwanich Group Silom (Head office): Kongboonma Building, 699 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Phrapradaeng Factory: Suksawad Rd., Pakklong Bang pla kot, Phrasamutchedi, Samutprakarn Sinsakhon Factory: Sinsakhon Printing City & Industrial Estate, Samutsakhon https://www.chanwanich.digital [link removed] Find us on Line application: “@chanwanich”

LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! Connected to over 100+ of the largest banks, liquidity providers, global custodians, correspondent banks and prime brokers, Settlement Center allows automation of middle and back office trade processing by exchanging SWIFT confirmation messages, trade matching, settlement instructions, trade-netting, third-party notifications, trade receipt splitting and more We have commenced building the next generation of the application, moving to a modern HTML5 GUI hosted in our strategic Workspace Desktop and rebuilding the venue using a microservice based architecture hosted in the cloud. We are seeking dedicated full-stack software engineers to join our Development team in Bangkok. The ideal candidate, will have experience of HTML5/React JS front end and Java back-end development, preferably in an Azure or AWS cloud environment. Experience of MS Azure, Kafka, Kubernetes, Microservices, SQL is desirable. Capital Markets and/or Financial Services background is advantageous but not essential. Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Company: ATA IT (National Bank of Canada Group)
column8: We are looking to recruit a Java Developer ATA-IT Limited- the subsidiary of the National Bank of Canada (NBC). Currently, we are looking for a Java Developer to join our development team. We are looking to seeing you be a member of the National Bank of Canada. Main objectives and Summary : Work with the scrum team to ensure that the solution is properly delivered as expected. Guarantee the quality of the source code, for all developments under your responsibility. Perform unit testing, and contribute to integration testing, functional testing and UAT. Coordinate and work with Developers, DevOps, Security and Infrastructure team to manage and solve issues in the required solution and/or environment. Mentor and coach junior developers. Contribute to improving Norms and Processes, and development techniques. Contribute to delivering innovative functionalities to the customers of the bank. Stay up-to-date and research on the new technology that will help improve the solution. Qualification : Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or Computer related field Working experience as full stack developer with Java. Working experience in responsive web development with CMS Working experience in Adobe Experience Manager 6.4+ / Form 6.4 is a big plus Proficient with frontend languages such as HTML, Bootstrap, CSS/Less, and JavaScript/TypeScript Proficient with Java programming, SOAP and REST API, Web services, Microservice, Mockito, Docker Familiar with Agile methodology, OOP, CI/CD process and development tools (Git, Junit, Maven, Jenkins, Shell script or curl) Experience within a project that has developed reusable components in a service-oriented architecture Experience in developing applications for the financial markets and brokerage operations Good command of English Nice to have : Experience in integrating with Analytic tool, White labeling Experience in wealth management Previous experience working with Western company French language Banking background What you will get from ATA IT : 14 days’ vacation in first year Health insurance for staff & families Life insurance Dental fee for staff & families Provident fund Monetary Assistance (Childbirth, Funeral, Basket Visit) Annual Party Monthly Activities- Staff Birthday & Company Activities Annual Health Check Multi-national company with flexible working hours, but professional company culture Work from Home Policy

Jobtitle: Application Consultant/ที่ปรึกษาทางด้านโซลูชั่น
column8: Job Description Responsible in Presales and consulting duty on IT as Software Development , Package and Solution in IT technology. Establishing new, and maintaining existing, relationships with potential customers. Managing and interpreting customer requirements. Making technical presentations and demonstrating how a product will meet client needs. Use strong leadership skills to independently prioritize and execute project tasks in a methodical and disciplined manner. Develop relationships with key partners for growth within their customer base. Effectively position the technology against competitive offerings. Build proper documentation in the form of scope of work, technical proposals and other documents as required by prospective customers. Responsibilities: Study and develop a good understanding of the possible applications of new technologies, and suggest customers on how those technologies can be applied to help improve their businesses. Build and maintain close relationships with customers of all levels ranging from operations to executives, evaluate customer’s needs, identify selling opportunities, reach out to potential customers, and more importantly close the deals to meet the sales target. Analyze competitors and keep track of the demand and competition (customer’s projects and competitor’s proposals) in the market, and strategically maintain as well as expand the market share to establish a sustainable sales ecosystem. Coordinate across parties including both technical and non-technical teams to best deliver products or services to customers and to professionally facilitate effective communications between parties. Prepare necessary documents and proceed through e-Bidding systems and purchase processes of government organizations and public/private companies Attend a broad range of meetings with other departments in collaboration to provide advisory comments or opinions regarding how to improve sale processes/activities and participate in sale and marking activities. Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree Business Management, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields Bachelor’s degree Business Management, or Information Technology will be preferable. 3-5 year’s experience in Pre-Sale or Consulting in IT Field will be preferable. Strong communication skills, inter-personal skills, analytical skills, systematic thinking and able to work under pressure within deadlines. Good computer skills (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint) Able to travel abroad Good command in English (writing and speaking) สามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ มีความสามารถในการสื่อสารได้เป็นอย่างดี และมีภาวะผู้นำ มีความสามารถในการวิเคราะห์ และแก้ปัญหาที่ดี มีความมุ่งมั่นและรับผิดชอบต่องานที่ได้รับมอบหมาย มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์เพื่อบรรลุเป้าหมายและจัดการกับปัญหาในแบบที่คุณต้องการ มีความรับผิดชอบสูง มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ มีทักษะในการเจรจาต่อรอง การติดต่อสื่อสาร และการประสานงาน สวัสดิการ ค่ารักษาพยาบาล IPD/OPD ประกันอุบัติเหตุ กองทุนประกันสังคม กิจกรรมเสริมสร้างความสัมพันธ์ประจำปี โบนัส (ตามผลประกอบการ) ค่าเดินทาง (กรณีเดินทางไปปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่) วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี 14 วัน/ปี เงินเดือน 30,000 - 70,000 บาท สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร

Jobtitle: Manager, Internal Audit - IT and Data Analytics
column8: Key Responsibility Perform an IT audit and testing ITGC (Information Technology General Computer Control), Data Analysis and utilize technology effectively. Take part of integrated audit by performing test of IT dependency controls e.g., automated application control, IT dependent report, system access and authorization control. Analyze and solve problems especially big data analysis. Assess and giving advice on IT/network security architecture design Assess risk related to information and cybersecurity and evaluate effectiveness of internal controls based on industrial-accepted standard e.g., Information Security Management System (ISMS) Assess and giving advice on security technology and security-related configuration e.g., firewall, IDS/IPS, Content filtering, Network routing equipment, Wifi controller, Network access Control, etc. Provide overall co-ordination of the audit planning for the areas/ programs under his/her supervision, and supervise the follow up process of subordinates to ensure timely dispatch of audit reports to auditee and obtaining reply from auditee on the implementation status of recommendations Delegate, allocate and assign resources to carry out the audit work, and advise, supervise, and oversee the audit activities carried out by the IA as per the Annual Audit Plan. Discuss with GCAE for major risk or audit findings identified during audit. Oversee the follow up process of the Senior Internal Auditor to ensure timely dispatch of audit reports to auditee and obtaining reply from auditee on the implementation status of recommendations. Review and discuss on the reply received from auditee for any disputes or disagreement. To ensure that audit engagements are conducted in accordance with the audit work program and objectives of the audit have been achieved. Carry out special / investigation audit assigned by GCAE. Participate in the Exit meeting with auditee’s management to discuss on the audit findings identified during audit. Qualifications Bachelor's degree preferably in IT, Computer Science or Engineering, Statistic. Having 3-5 years of experience in Professional IT Auditor or an equivalent function or experience in auditing firms or as internal auditor more than 7 years Preferably proficient in Oracle or any other related Accounting System. Working knowledge in IT Auditor; highly proficient with ERP configurations e.g., SAP and Oracle. Ability to apply best practices of one ERP system in other ERP systems. Able to work to upcountry or overseas Preferably a CISA. Excellent communication skills in both oral and written English Able to appreciate business process issues and understand business transaction scenarios, and how an application system (e.g., SAP, Oracle, etc.) can support them Basic understanding of ERP configurations e.g., SAP, Oracle. Ability to apply best practices of one ERP system in other ERP systems Resourceful and able to work out technical solutions Good appreciation of fundamental accounting knowledge and/or audit knowledge and financial controls Good grasp of IT technical concepts, e.g., Operating Systems (Unix, Windows, etc), Databases (Oracle, SQL, etc.) Able to handle multiple tasks and assignments Logical thinking, good attitude, fast learner and good team player Working independently without closely supervisor. Ability to persuade and influence others, to motivate others and promote teamwork and mentor any others, and to provide effective feedback. Certification/Licensure Certified Information System Auditor (CISA), (Preferred). Lotus's Ek-Chai Distribution System Co., Ltd. Buengkum, Bangkok 10230, Thailand “By applying for this position, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal data to us, our recruitment firms and all relevant third parties for the purpose of processing your application for this job position (or any other suitable positions within Lotus's and its subsidiaries, if any). You understand and acknowledge that your personal data will be processed in accordance with the law and our policy.”

Who is Cloud HM? Founded in 2014, we are the industry leader in the Thai cloud market. Over 1,000 enterprises trust us for our multi cloud, DevSecOps and big data services. We offer cutting edge technology to help our customers grow their business. Our revenue has been growing 2x yearly. We expect our revenue to hit 400 MB (12 mn USD) in 2023. We are looking for people to come further develop our business. What kind of engineer do we need? We are looking for an engineer who enjoys solving problems and isn't fond of strictly adhering to processes, because a true engineer's role is about problem-solving. We need an engineer who loves learning new technologies and isn't afraid to explore and study new things. I'm a tech enthusiast, and I'm committed to self-improvement. I'm not afraid of what I don't know because I have Google. I enjoy reading and learning continuously. We seek an engineer who enjoys experimenting with new things in a lab environment. An engineer who understands that we are in the tech field, not accounting. If I stop learning, within 5-6 years, I'm at risk of losing my job because the tech world changes rapidly. It's not like accounting, which has remained somewhat constant over 50 years. Knowledge of tech/IT from 15 years ago doesn't help me in the fast-paced world of Cloud. So, I have to keep learning. Someone who takes pride in completing their work, not just finishing it. Completing a job means solving problems for customers, not just responding to them. Having a fundamental understanding of VMware, AWS, Azure, GCP, or DevSecOps is a plus. We're not serious about you being an expert from day one because we believe that there's nothing too difficult for someone who's willing to put in the effort to learn and research, including using Google for additional information. What kind of engineer do we not want? Just want to work in a conventional manner. Focus on following processes rather than problem-solving. Choose engineering solely for a high salary without a genuine interest in facing and resolving challenges or learning new things. Avoid social interactions at work (dislike joining parties or activities) because we understand that customer communication can be stressful. Therefore, if colleagues don't enjoy working with us, it can be very dull. What are the responsibilities of an engineer? Design, deploy, and maintain cloud infrastructure on AWS, GCP, and Azure. Optimize cloud resources for performance, scalability, and cost-effectiveness. Monitor and troubleshoot cloud services to ensure high availability and reliability. Implement security best practices to protect cloud environments and data. Collaborate with development teams to implement CI/CD pipelines for application deployment. Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or equivalent. Manage containerized applications using Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes. What will an engineer gain from Cloud HM? The most cutting-edge knowledge and experience in the cloud market, which is currently in high demand. Experience and expertise that you will never forget.

Job Summary : The Director of Information Technology reports to VP-Corporate Strategy, and this position is accountable for the overall planning, organization, technical leadership, project leadershipand execution of all IS and IT functions to meet current and future requirementsforHaadThip PCL, Coca-Cola Bottler, Southern Thailand.This role is also responsible for overseeing technology risk, cyber-security and managing capital budgeting, purchasing and reporting.This includes the support and maintenance of existing applications and development of new technical solutions. Duties/Responsibilities: Develop IT, IS and OT policies, standards, practices and security measures to ensure effective and consistent information processing operations and to safeguard information and company resources. Direct the design, development, and maintenance of systems, programs, software, and applications to meet the company's business needs. Provide IT strategy analysis and forecasting needed to support business growth. Recommend short and long-range strategicIT plans to the Company leadership team. Advise and direct a vision for frontier technologies, e.g. Artificial Intelligence Manage IT budget and provide fiduciary oversight of programs and management ofinvestments/costs to deliver business financial objectives. Required Skills/Competencies: Driving effective ITand IS initiativesincluding implementation of digital transformation agenda. Excellent business acumen and familiarity with modern trade practices, including E-commerce, O2O, etc. Experience in digitaltransformation, business applications and other related applications Excellent interpersonal, communication and negotiation skills.Highly collaborative, open and trustworthy personality, and strong relationship building skills. Proactive mindset, independent, strong follow-up skills,high mental agility. Excellent in analytical,logical thinking and problem solving. Sense of professionalism, integrity, Initiative, teamwork, humility, mutual trust & respect, customer focus. Passionate about people (& their career growth) and able to drive team’s contribution A positive ‘can-do’ approach and hands-on attitude. Structured and results driven with excellent attention to detail. Proficiency in English, both written and verbal. Education and Experience: Bachelor's Degree (or higher) in Business, Computer Science, Information Technology, Information Systems or related fields. Able to work and lead in a matrix environment getting results through those organizations. 10 plus years' experience in an IT/IS role with 6 plus years as senior strategic leader for an IT business unit in a large-scale manufacturing or industrial environment with emphasis on SAP. Experience with development of business tools, including business intelligence (e.g. Tableau, Power BI), CRM, online marketing and sales platforms. Demonstrated leadership capabilities including building cohesive and collaborative teams, both internal and with external partners and successfully leading change in an organization. Experience in the transformation of an IT department, Significant prior experience in vendor management with proven ability to lead governance processes. Ability to develop, present and articulate business cases along with budget experience and a strong financial acumen. Professional certifications would be an advantage. WorkRequirements This position is based in Hat Yai OR Bangkok,with frequent travel to Bangkok/Hatyai, Surat thani, and occasionally other Southern provinces at short notice. The candidate must hold a current and valid driving license.

Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced software developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development and be able to work collaboratively with other team members to design and implement software solutions. Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain software applications according to specifications Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex software problems Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to other team members Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in software development Communicate with stakeholders to understand their requirements and provide technical guidance and support Debug and troubleshoot software issues Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in CE , CS , IT , or related fields. Minimum 1-3 (Junior) or 4-6+ (Senior) years of Java or C# programming experience. Hands-on experience with Java (Spring Boot) or C# (ASP.NET) . Experience of Agile methodologies . Basic Knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker . Familiarity with SQL (MySQL, SQL Server, etc.) and database technologies. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Preferred Qualifications: Hands-on experience with Window Apps and Web Apps . Understanding or can develop with Delphi is a plus. Experience with at least one of the following tools is a plus: JSP, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, TypeScript, Spring Boot, or .NET Core . Experience with Cloud Technology Platforms (such as Azure, AWS, GCP)
