วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี - ปริญญาโท สาขาวิชาชีพ - วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ - วิทยาศาสตร์ เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน Depend on qualifications and experience ตำแหน่ง 5 ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน Maintain customers retention and find new customers. Makes the sales plan to cover the areas assigned in the most effective and economic manner. Frequent visits the existing and potential customers. Sells products to customers to achieve the agreed budget and targets. Takes customers’ orders and prepares order forms with full details to Sales Coordinator. Furthermore, follow-up direct shipment status and delivery of goods to customers on time in full. Maintains and develops relations with customers and provides them with commercial and technical service as well as promotes goodwill of the organization. Responds to all customers’ problems on products, delivery, documents, etc. คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Science (Major Petrochemical, Polymer, Chemical or relate field) At least 1-3 years experience in Sales, R&D or Process Engineer. If have experience in Sales will be an advantage. Excellent interpersonal, good communication skill and customer-oriented mindset. Strong initiative, problem solving skill and proactive. Good interpersonal and communication skills. Good command of English and computer literacy: MS Offices-Word, Excel, Power point. Own car with license. รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ Global Connections combines technical knowledge of its products and the understanding of the local markets to provide the best solutions and technical support to our customers and end-users in various industries such as: automotive, industrial, and consumer products, etc. For suppliers, GC provides knowledge of local markets and future trends to ensure long-term business development and economic success. GC strongly believes in forming long-term strategic partnerships with all of our customers and suppliers. วิธีการสมัคร Apply Now !!! Sent your resume and transcript to Email >> hr_admin@gc.co.th www.gc.co.th Tel : 02-763-7999 Ext.212 , 213, 214 ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท โกลบอล คอนเน็คชั่นส์ จำกัด (มหาชน) 13/1 หมู่ 2 ถ.กิ่งแก้ว แขวงราชาเทวะ เขตบางพลี จังหวัดสมุทรปราการ 10540 อีเมล์ : hr_admin@gc.co.th โทร : 02-763-7999 ต่อ 212, 213 เว็บไซต์ : www.gc.co.th

Want to be a part of our team? Oversees and leads service teams in the delivery of outsourced solutions. Manages technical aspects of the project and is responsible for overseeing vendors and subcontractors. Oversees the delivery of continuous and effective services and ensures project completion within budget and in accordance with contract requirements. Identifies areas where continuous improvement can be applied. Selects, develops, and evaluates personnel to ensure the efficient operation of the function. Working at NTT The primary responsibility of Service Transition Management is to oversee, manage and coordinate the activities a team in the completion of client transition of IT service components or a complete subset of a client IT environment from the client or existing outsource provider to successful operation in the NTT environment. This role ensures that transition projects adhere to all required governance processes, utilise the correct tools and that client requirements are met. Key Role and Responsibilities: Own the transition process, develops the organisation's approach and defines the acceptance criteria for service transition. Act is the point of escalation for transition projects and will take responsibility for resolving or owning the resolution of all escalated issues. Remain current of developments in the transition management arena and maintain their expertise on transition management approach and methodology Manage risk and minimise potential failure by planning and ensuring the execution of all testing, training and change management activities. Contributes to the Pre-Sales process by partnering with the internal stakeholders to understand the client’s requirements and to plan and design the required transition process. Required to undertake due diligence investigations to determine exact client requirements. Work according to standard and set project management methodologies to plan and manage the execution of service and outsource transition projects. Engage clients in planning sessions and scoping sessions and use the outcomes to create detailed documentation that will include project definition, project planning, work break down structures, budgets, schedules and project reporting and controls. Establish positive relationships with the client stakeholders and engage with them on a regular basis. Plan and co-ordinate engagement sessions with the client and prepare for and facilitate these sessions. Ensure that all parties remain informed throughout the process by ensuring that the required communication and reports are prepared and distributed on a regular basis. Identify resource requirements for the transition project and negotiate and agree the use of the resources. Compile baseline budgets for transition projects and manage and report against signed off budgets. Compile process definition and the requirement specifications for toolsets and resources required to deliver the service. Ensure that the NTT environment is prepared, configured and equipped to operate and support the client service according to agreed Service Level Agreements Ensure the execution of service validation and testing and take responsibility for service release and deployment. Knowledge, skills and attributes: Excellent knowledge of project management methodologies, tools and standards (both Waterfall and Agile) Business and commercial acumen coupled with strategic thinking ability Ability to balance delivery with agreed and contracted expectations Effective and professional leadership and people management skills Ability to professionally handle complaints, problems and issues, managing resolutions and corrective actions Ability to develop and enhance client and stakeholder relationships In-depth understanding of IT industry and expertise on transition management approaches and methodologies Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or Information Technology Experience required: Demonstrated experience in applying, managing and executing transition management approaches and applicable methodologies Demonstrated experience in project management within an IT environment Relevant specific experience in services transitioning within a large enterprise environment Demonstrated experience in compiling and managing a budget Experience in managing stakeholder relationships, including clients and vendors Experience in leading and managing a team and allocating resources What will make you a good fit for the role? Equal Opportunity Employer NTT is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category

Company: บริษัท กิงโกะ ซอฟต์ จำกัด
column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - ทุกสาขา เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 18000 - 35000 ตำแหน่ง 4 ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน ศึกษาและทำความเข้าใจ Application / Software ที่กำหนดใช้ในองค์กร เพื่อนำมาใช้กับงานได้อย่างเหมาะสมและมีประสิทธิภาพ สนับสนุนการแก้ไขปัญหาการใช้ระบบงาน Application / Software ให้เป็นไปตามข้อตกลงที่กำหนดและช่วยดำเนินการแก้ไขปัญหาในเชิงป้องกัน รวมทั้งให้คำปรึกษากับผู้ใช้งาน คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร สำเร็จการศึกษาขั้นต่ำระดับปริญญาตรี หรือเทียบเท่า ทางด้านวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือ ด้านระบบสารสนเทศ หรือ ด้านวิศวกรรมศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ (Computer Engineering) หรือ สาขาวิชาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง หรือมีประสบการณ์ทำงานที่เทียบเท่า มีทักษะในการคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์อย่างเป็นระบบและทำงานแบบมุ่งผลสำเร็จ มีความรับผิดชอบ มีความกระตือรือร้นในการเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ และมีทัศนคติที่ดีต่อการทำงาน สามารถทำงานภายใต้สภาวะกดดันและเวลาอันจำกัดได้ดี มีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร มนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดี ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ เราคือผู้เชี่ยวชาญทางด้าน Digital Transformation, Paperless Solution, Document Management, e-Signature, e-Tax invoice and e-Receipt, Enterprise Content Management และ Robotic Process Automation เราส่งมอบประสบการณ์ การทำงานที่ดีมีประสิทธิภาพและเหมาะกับธุรกิจ เพื่อช่วยธุรกิจของคุณเติบโตได้อย่างแข็งแรง บริหารเวลาในการทำงานได้ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม วันหยุดพักร้อนประจำ 12 วัน/ปี งบประมาณสำหรับเรียนคอร์สต่างๆ ทั้งออนไลน์และออฟไลน์ วิธีการสมัคร download ใบสมัครได้ที่ ใบสมัคร ส่งใบสมัครที่กรอกแล้วพร้อมเอกสาร Transcript, CV และ ผลงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง มาทาง e-mail ( hr@ginkgosoft.co.th ) ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท กิงโกะ ซอฟต์ จำกัด 140/30 ชั้นที่2 แขวงจตุจักร เขตจตุจักร จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10900 อีเมล์ : wekij.l@ginkgosoft.co.th โทร : 020685566 เว็บไซต์ : http://www.ginkgosoft.co.th ใกล้กับสถานีรถไฟฟ้า MRT : สถานีลาดพร้าว, สถานีบางซื่อ

Company Description At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible. At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon. We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future. Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too. We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands. Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: To support customer communicate in term of onsite audit/visit, reporting product performance, and working with customer on Feedback/Complaint. Qualifications REQUIRED: Bachelor or higher degree in Engineering/Science or related field. At least 5 years in Engineering, Manufacturing, Quality System or experience in customer support related job PREFERRED: NA SKILLS: Good command of spoken and written English Good command of spoken and written Chinese Computer literacy, Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools such as PowerPoint, Excel, and Word Good in Presentation Additional Information Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution. Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

Company: บริษัท ฟินคับ จำกัด
column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ - วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ - เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 30,000 - 50,000 ตำแหน่ง หลายอัตรา ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน Provide assistance related to the installation, operation, and maintenance of specific computer software application programs as per the work instruction by company at a certain level of supervision. Coordinate and escalate the issues that are not in company work instruction to application team or direct supervisor. Investigate and identify the root causes of technical problems. Maintain detailed records of customer interactions, issues, and resolutions. คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other IT-Related fields. Have basic SQL skill. Have basic IT skill (Windows, MS-Office). Have Software development skill; Java, .Net. Experience in basic Windows, Unix OS, Oracle SQL,. Experience in Websphere App Server will be advantage. Have analysis skill. รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ บริษัทด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ We work with a lot of industry experts and have more than 20 years of experience in Financial Software Development and Implementation. We deliver IT Solutions and Consistently great services to meet the diverse needs of customers. สวัสดิการพนักงาน Outsource (แบบ Contract สัญญาจ้าง) 1. เงินเดือน (ตามตกลง) 2. ประกันสังคม 3. วันหยุด 12 วันต่อปี 4. ค่า Laptop 2,000 บาทต่อเดือน (กรณีใช้อุปกรณ์ของตัวเอง) 5. เงินจูงใจอยู่ครบสัญญาเดือนละ 500 บาท 6. Company Outing Trip 7. ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 8. ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี (กรณีทำงานครบ 1 ปี) วิธีการสมัคร - สมัครผ่านทาง Email: kittimaporn.p@finkub.co - สมัครผ่านทาง LINE Official: @499zbfxj ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท ฟินคับ จำกัด 338/23 ซอยลาดพร้าว 80 แขวงวังทองหลาง เขตวังทองหลาง จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10310 อีเมล์ : kittimaporn.p@finkub.co โทร : 0956416179

Want to be a part of our team? Sells company products to customers via telephone or electronic inquiries. Must close the sale on products, systems, and/or services. Sales are typically made through inbound telephone sales activities. May have limited outbound call responsibility. Does not require in-depth technical knowledge of the product. Acts as part of a sales team and supports field sales staff. May sell lower-tier products, supplies, components, etc. Responds to customer inquiries for the purpose of taking orders. May respond to web and/or fax inquiries and orders. Focuses on retaining and growing an existing customer base. May also be involved in order fulfillment, post-sales, or administrative related activities. May perform customer database tracking activities. May carry team or individual quota. Working at NTT The primary objective of the Inside Sales Client Managers is to manage and grow relationships and drive expansion and renewals across all solutions (foundational solutions primary) within assigned accounts segments 4. These employees mine for new sales opportunities within an assigned account list. The Inside Sales Client Managers have a proactive and systematic approach to working through the assigned account list. This is done by leveraging NTT (Ltd)’s tools and methodologies to understand the client’s implicit and explicit needs. Primary Segment Focus Existing clients Secondary Segment Focus TBC Sales Process Involvement Land, Adopt, Expand and Review Client Load Existing: 60 - 80 Prospect: 0 Sales Time Allocation Pre-sales: 10% Engaged selling time: 35% Sales completion: 35% Sales Facilitation: 20% Solution Focus Primary: Foundational Secondary: Partnership All solution areas Sales Strategy with Buyers & Products Existing: Retention (current products) and Penetration (new/different products) Key Roles and Responsibilities: Manage and grow relationships and drive expansion and renewals across all solutions (foundational solutions primary) within assigned accounts in segment 4. Minimize churn and maximize retention in assigned accounts. Drive client satisfaction throughout the entire lifecycle of the clients’ buying process. Generate demand by assisting clients to identify current needs, and then effectively articulate how NTT‘s can add value through our services and solutions. Use NTT’s sales tools and methodology to effectively manage accounts, opportunities, pipelines, and forecasts. Present new and additional offerings to clients. Communicate quotes, provide supportive sales documentation and obtain a sales order where there is an opportunity to close a sale. Build relationships with clients and display an interest in and knowledge of the client environment. Identify opportunities for up-selling of solutions and services and display superior telephone etiquette. Identify sales opportunities by managing and growing revenue and expansion across solutions areas in the assigned accounts in segment 4. Comply with and adhere to pre-identified governance and compliance standards as outlined by NTT(Ltd) and escalate identified problems for investigation and resolution. Adhere to Finance standards and procedures to reduce costs and report associated risk. Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes: Sales business acumen - The skills supporting successful selling through organizational and business outcome mindset. Success will require focusing on planning, leveraging tools and data, and concentrating on NTT Ltd's business requirements. Developing the skills to understand your client’s business (including commercial and financial aspects) in order to bring value to them from NTT’s portfolio of services. Sales client engagement and management - The skills used to effectively manage and analyze the client throughout the client lifecycle, with the goal of improving client relationships and driving sales growth. Success will require a detailed understanding of client needs, effective sales planning, and building trust, all while managing to client expectations. Developing the skills required to know your client, building effective & lasting relationships with them, and being seen as a trusted advisor. Sales solution skills - The knowledge of NTT Ltd’s offerings, client applications, use cases, and market trends and the skill to apply them to the individual client and prospect situations that positions the sales team member as an expert client advisor. Success will require the ability to link NTT Ltd offerings, including high-value services to a specific client and prospect needs and outcomes. Sales pursuit - The skills and knowledge that enable a sales team member to create success by identifying and advancing opportunities at assigned prospects and clients. Success will require both individual ownership as well as accountability for coordinating internal and external resources in order to close sales opportunities. Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Relevant Degree Required Experience: Demonstrated experience in a similar role in a similar environment Demonstrated sales and client engagement experience Demonstrated experience negotiating with clients and vendor Demonstrated experience analyzing commercial information What will make you a good fit for the role? Equal Opportunity Employer NTT is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category

Company: Cargill Group Thailand (กลุ่มบริษัทคาร์กิลล์ ประเทศไทย)
column8: Identify improvements and simplifications to project portfolio management processes and implement the processes. Integrate technical applications and systems to research and analyze project data and other relevant data and information to be used for portfolio management. Prepare reports and materials using defined procedures for use by stakeholders. Analyze and interpret data and information from project processes to develop and produce metrics including leading and lagging, quantitative and qualitative and process performance and process compliance metrics. Collaborate with other process stakeholders to deliver value from people, process and data and technology system improvements and track development progress and business readiness efforts and identify value opportunities through optimization initiatives. Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned

Join a team that is changing millions of lives. Transforming smiles, changing lives. At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. We revolutionized the orthodontic industry with the introduction of the Invisalign system, and we have never lost sight of that spirit of innovation. Our diverse and collaborative teams are constantly pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Ready to join us? About this opportunity This individual will have previous sales experience and a proven sales record. Managing a sales area for Align Technology selling the Invisalign product. The individual will be responsible for selling the product, establishing account relationships and practice development in the assigned territory, as well as proactively communicating with customers and potential prospects. In this role, you will… Deliver Results Achievement of Monthly, Quarterly and Annual Sales Targets, MBO, Operational Plan and Profitability Plan for Thailand. Responsible for the working with assigned accounts and team within Align Tech (Thailand), including direction, motivation and development of sales plans, targets, and strategies and the removal of obstacles to success. Provide all appropriate reporting to the Regional Sales Manager including feedback from customers on a weekly and monthly report Responsible for the sales area as ‘their business’ and be willing to take responsibility for its planning and development in what is a high growth business. Work closely with co-colleagues to develop a high-performance team in Thailand and within SEA. Drive the Best Outcomes Acquire and maintain detailed knowledge of the company's products; Provide training in product knowledge, selling skills, and territory management, and Align Terms and Conditions of Business. Evaluation and coaching of co-colleagues through observation during co-travel, frequent feedback and the analysis of data. Evaluate levels of customer, product and systems knowledge via in-field assessment. Provide appropriate training and field coaching as required. Build strong ethical business relationships with customers to ensure usage of our products and gain greater market share by focusing high value activity and selling. Ensure professional dress code and attitude is maintained at all. Participate in proactive team efforts to achieve departmental, company goals and comply with all policies, practices and procedures. Work with the Regional Sales Manager to set Operational plan for future periods and perform other duties as assigned. Keep abreast of what competitors are doing; and update SEA Marketing Manager of market intelligence and pulses in the market. Be responsible for all quality updates records and customer product feedback for Thailand market. Comply with all policies, practices and procedures. Lock in Key Relationships Engage certified doctors and develop potential for new cases; engage non-certified doctors and establish their potential as an Invisalign provider and current submitters to develop Invisalign business. Balance the short term operational needs with the long term organizational needs of the business. Work closely with Marketing Manager to develop and implement sales and marketing strategies; such as management of Platinum Elite Accounts as well as opening new accounts and assist customers to achieve sales, distribution and display objectives. In this role, you’ll need … To perform this job successfully, the individual must have mastered the skill set of a Territory Manager. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Strong analytical and business planning skills High integrity Demonstrated leadership Track record of coaching/developing Sales Representatives Capacity to execute marketing plans Capacity to manage budgets and expenses Excellent written and verbal communication skills to diverse customer audiences. Strong capabilities to interface effectively with all customer types Ability to function effectively in a high performance team EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE BS or BA preferred and/or equivalent experience. A degree in sales, marketing or a related science discipline would be an advantage. medical, orthodontic, and/or dental sales and/or marketing experience preferred alternatively, background as dental therapist/hygienist and acquired valuable knowledge of the industry and its products Excellent oral and written communication skills Pride in excelling and self-directed individual. Computer knowledge is required. Provide support to audit processes and quality management system as required Sound like a good fit? Great! Click the "Apply" link to let us know you are interested. Not the right fit? Don’t worry, Align is quickly growing so we are creating more opportunities to expand our Align family. Please consider joining our Talent Network to receive notifications about future jobs or sharing this opportunity with others in your network. About Align Align Technology is a publicly traded medical device company that is transforming smiles and changing lives. Our global team of talented employees develop innovative technology, tools and treatment options to help dental professionals worldwide achieve the clinical results they expect. Our digital ecosystem combines the power of technology to create beautiful smiles through the integration of AI and machine learning, digital imaging and visualization, biomechanics and material science to develop the Invisalign system, the most advanced clear aligner system in the world; iTero Intraoral Scanners and OrthoCAD digital services. Did you know? Align is the world’s largest manufacturer of custom 3D-printed materials. By joining Align, you will be part of a global, fast-growing company in one of the most dynamic industries. Great people, innovative technologies, and meaningful work – these are just some of the things employees say make Align Technology a great place to work. Global Diversity Statement: At Align, we believe in the power of a smile, and we know that every smile is as unique as our employees. As we grow, we will continue building a workforce of diverse cultural backgrounds and life experiences and fostering a culture of open-mindedness and compassion for all our employees. We live our company values by promoting healthy people and healthy communities. All with the intent of changing millions of lives, one unique smile at a time. Equal Opportunity Statement It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunity in all of our employment practices without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, marital status, protected veteran status, age, individuals with disabilities, sexual orientation or gender identity or expression or any other legally protected category. Applicants for positions with Align must be legally authorized to work in the country which they are applying for and verification of employment eligibility will be required as a condition of hire. #LI-HL2 | #LI-Onsite

รายละเอียดงาน พัฒนา Mobile Application Android / IOS คุณสมบัติ มีประสบการณ์ การเขียน Mobile Application มีประสบการณ์ในการเรียกใช้ HTTP POST/GET, RESTFul ใช้งานระบบฐานข้อมูล แบบ SQLite และสามารถใช้งาน JSON, XML ได้ สามารถประยุกต์ใช้ library ต่างๆ หรือสามารถพัฒนา Custom View เพื่อให้งานได้ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการเขียนโปรแกรมแบบ OOP มีความเข้าใจเรื่อง MVC design pattern เป็นอย่างดี สามารถทำงานแบบเป็นทีม และพร้อมรับแลขแบ่งปันความรู้ในทีมได้ สามารถศึกษาหาความรู้เพิ่มเติม เมื่อมีความต้องการใหม่ศ ของลูกค้าได้ สวัสดิการ เงินเดือน ประกันสังคม ประกันสุขภาพ โบนัสประจำปี (ขึ้นอยู่กับผลประกอบการ) ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี, งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ ค่าโทรศัพท์ (เฉพาะบางตำแหน่ง) เบี้ยเลี้ยง, ค่าล่วงเวลา วันลาพักร้อน, วันหยุดประจำปี ยูนิฟอร์ม เวลาทำงาน จันทร์-ศุกร์ 9.00-18.00 น.

Jobtitle: Financial Advisory: Digital Forensic Assistant Manager
Company: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos Co., Ltd.
column8: What impact will you make? At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and society. Whatever your aspirations, Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realise your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals. So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now. Introduction Deloitte Forensic helps clients to react quickly and confidently in a crisis, investigation and dispute. We use our global network, deep industry experience and advanced technology to understand and resolve our client's issues. We also deliver the proactive advice that clients need to reduce the risk of future problems. In Thailand, our Forensic Technology services cover: Digital forensics & Discovery Cybercrime & Incident Response Forensic analytics Fraud Management Solutions Work you'll do Assessing, preserving and collecting digital evidences that may include computers, hard drives, cellphones, or network devices, using our forensic technology tools and global methodology Recovering corrupted or deleted information for examination and analysis Retrieving computer artefacts from the operating systems to determine user’s behavior or suspicious usage patterns Extracting data from client’s core business database and applying selected libraries of our analytical models to gain particular insight, e.g., fraud red flag, suspicious trend and patterns, or anomalies. Your role as a leader At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We expect our people to embrace and live our purpose and shared values, challenging themselves everyday to identify issues that are most important to our clients, our people and the communities, and to make an impact that matters. In addition to living our purpose, Assistant Managers across our Firm are expected to: Understand objectives for stakeholders, clients and Deloitte whilst aligning own performance to objectives and sets personal priorities Develop themselves by actively seeking opportunities for growth, shares knowledge and experiences with others, and acts as a strong brand ambassador Seek opportunities to challenge themselves, collaborate with others to deliver and takes accountability for results Build relationships and communicates effectively in order to positively influence peers and stakeholders Work effectively in diverse teams within a highly inclusive team culture where everyone is supported, respected and recognized for their contribution Requirements Over 3-5 years’ experience as an IT security consultant, IT auditor, IT solutions consultant, System engineer, Network engineer, Software developer, Database architect, or in a related occupation in software, database and information security Bachelor degree or above in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems or Business Administration in Technology Knowledge of forensic imaging tools (hardware and software) such as EnCase, Falcon, Cellebrite. Knowledge of forensic electronic discovery (document review) platform such as Relativity, NUIX and Intella. Technical knowledge of Windows operating systems, e.g., Windows Registry, Active Directory, WMI, Windows domain and file system, etc. General knowledge of business IT solutions, ERP systems, and business processes. Also, below are the advantages: Certifications in professional IT, network or forensic technology are an advantage (e.g., EnCE, CCFP, CEH, CISSP, CISA, ITIL, CCNA, CCIE, CCDA) Experience or knowledge of digital forensic, cyber forensic, forensic investigation, and Electronic Discovery (eDiscovery) Able to work under tight schedule and in multi-tasking manner context Strong interpersonal skills with experience to work in cross-border team environments and with significant client face time Ability to communicate effectively both verbally and in writing with English proficiency Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Ops Strategy & Analytics – Bangkok Based Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: Agoda Homes – a core business line within Agoda – supports a wide range of non-hotel accommodation types, including serviced apartments, homes, private villas, farm stays, chalets, boats, and many more. While these accommodations were always available on Agoda, a changing market demands more focus on increasing supply and elevating their quality. The Opportunity: As a Ops Strategy & Analytics, the key objective is to drive the overall business development strategy for Agoda Homes across our key markets. You will be responsible for analyzing data and trends, identifying growth opportunities, and owning the performance management of commercial teams across 10+ markets. The role entails analyzing and synthesizing insights leveraging internal and external data, scanning the competitive landscape, and spotting trends to ideate, plan and execute experiments or improvements as needed. You should be analytical and data-driven in order to identify and present insights and be able to work cross-functionally to implement recommendations that enable the business to grow. In this Role, You’ll Get To: Develop and drive strategic alignment on commercial initiatives to grow the Agoda Homes business Leverage industry and internal data to identify critical insights, analyze performance and identify appropriate levers to improve supply performance Own and maintain the performance management system for the Agoda Homes commercial team of account managers across 10+ key markets Prepare updates on business performance, project initiatives and analyses to large team of account managers and senior management Work closely with key stakeholders cross-functionally within Agoda to drive execution of strategic initiatives and track their impact(operations, markets, product, data teams) Support the ongoing development of the broader Agoda Homes Supply Team through knowledge sharing, coaching and training What You’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 4 years of total experience in Sales Operations, Business Development, Data Analytics, Strategy, Program Management, or other relevant fields Excellent English communication skills (both verbal and written) to efficiently present to different size audiences and work with stakeholders Experience with SQL and ability to leverage data to come up with recommendations Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Entrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work It’s Great If You Have: Experience using customer-relationship management (CRM) systems such as HubSpot or Salesforce #taipei #bangkok #bangalore #newdelhi #jakarta #bali #bandung #tokyo #osaka #yokohama #kualalumpur #manila #seoul #hcmc #hanoi #ANLS #4 #LI-KR1 Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy. To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Jobtitle: Associate/ Senior Associate - Regional Business Development (Shopee)
column8: The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. The teams are always looking to acquire business opportunities to drive Shopee to be the No. 1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. The aim of the Business Development and Partnership teams is to provide Shopee’s buyers with a wide variety of product listings at the best prices. Lead workstream to drive strategic initiatives at regional level by working closely with local markets and various business functions to deliver business impact in growth, profitability, and efficiency Work closely with local markets to identify opportunities and gaps, review problem statements, and generate useful solutions on regional strategic initiatives Conduct data analysis and competitor benchmarking, take a hypothesis-driven approach to address business challenges, identify new growth opportunities and initiate the project with structured business case

Jobtitle: Senior IT Operation & Support (ประจำโรงงานบางพลี สมุทรปราการ)
column8: หมวดหมู่งาน : งานเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ ระดับตำแหน่งงาน : ระดับพนักงาน ประเภทการจ้างงาน : พนักงานประจำ บริษัท : บริษัท เบอร์ลี่ ยุคเกอร์ จำกัด (มหาชน) สถานที่ทำงาน : กรุงเทพ หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ให้ความช่วยเหลือ และแก้ไขปัญหาด้านไอทีต่าง ๆ ของผู้ใช้งาน ดูแลและ Support ระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และซอฟแวร์ต่างๆ ในเครื่องให้พร้อมใช้งาน ดูแลและบำรุงรักษาระบบ Server, Network และอุปกรณ์ IT ต่างๆของบริษัทฯ ให้สามารถทำงานได้ อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด และ ดำเนินการติดต่อ Vender, Supplier เมื่อมีปัญหาเกี่ยวกับอุปกรณ์ Network ต่างๆ ประสานงานกับทีม IT ส่วนกลางในการควบคุมดูแลระบบ IT Technology ให้เป็นมาตรฐานเดียวกัน ควบคุมดูแลระบบ IT Asset ดูแลขั้นตอนการจัดซื้อ IT ของโรงงาน TGI (เอกสารการตรวจสอบอุปกรณ์ Transfer, Write Off & PR) คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีและสารสนเทศ, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรืออื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้าน IT Support อย่างน้อย 3 ปี มีความรู้ computer hardware and software systems and programs Computer networks, network administration and network installation Computer troubleshooting Computer viruses and security E-mail and internet programs หากมีความรู้พื้นฐานด้านอุปกรณ์ Network เช่น Switch L2 และ L3, router ciscoมีความรู้พื้นฐานด้าน Network เช่น VLAN, IP address, Subnet mask , Telnet จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ หากสามารถ Configure อุปกรณ์ Cisco พื้นฐานได้ (Create IP , Create VLAN , Open Port , Save Backup Config , Show Status จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถปฏิบัติงานที่ บริษัท อุตสาหกรรมทำเครื่องแก้วไทย จำกัด (มหาชน) ถนนบางนา-ตราด กม.18 อำเภอหนองปรือ จังหวัดสมุทรปราการ (บริษัทในเครือ BJC) สมัครงาน

column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ - วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ - เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 35,000 UP ตำแหน่ง หลายอัตรา ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน Design, develop and maintenance application according to requirements. คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other IT-Related fields. At least 1 year' experience working in Java. Knowledge and skill in Java, Spring Boot. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ บริษัทด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ We work with a lot of industry experts and have more than 20 years of experience in Financial Software Development and Implementation. We deliver IT Solutions and Consistently great services to meet the diverse needs of customers. สวัสดิการพนักงาน Outsource (แบบ Contract สัญญาจ้าง) 1. เงินเดือน (ตามตกลง) 2. ประกันสังคม 3. วันหยุด 12 วันต่อปี 4. ค่า Laptop 2,000 บาทต่อเดือน (กรณีใช้อุปกรณ์ของตัวเอง) 5. เงินจูงใจอยู่ครบสัญญาเดือนละ 500 บาท 6. Company Outing Trip 7. ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี 8. ปรับเงินเดือนประจำปี (กรณีทำงานครบ 1 ปี) วิธีการสมัคร - สมัครผ่านทาง Email: kittimaporn.p@finkub.co - สมัครผ่านทาง LINE Official: @499zbfxj ที่อยู่ของบริษัท/สำนักงาน บริษัท ฟินคับ จำกัด 338/23 ซอยลาดพร้าว 80 แขวงวังทองหลาง เขตวังทองหลาง จังหวัดกรุงเทพมหานคร 10310 อีเมล์ : kittimaporn.p@finkub.co โทร : 0956416179

Jobtitle: Assistant Manager - Digital for Commercial , Chemicals Business
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ: Creating and maintaining databases, and developing and implementing data-driven strategies to improve business performance. Creating reports, dashboards and visualizations to communicate insights Collaborating with different teams across the organization to identify areas for data-driven improvements Identifying and recommending new data sources and tools to enhance the company’s data analysis capabilities Conducting scenario testing, statistical analysis, and other data analysis techniques to support decision-making and problem-solving. คุณสมบัติ: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Polymer Science, Chemical Engineering, Business Administration or related fields Achieved a minimum GPA of 2.7 for Undergraduate and 3.3 for Post-graduate studies Good communication in both spoken and written English (required TOEIC at least 550) Having at least 2 years of experience in the petrochemical and refinery industry is a plus Having experience in business management background with data management knowledge is preferred Strong interpersonal communication, persuasion, and creative problem-solving skills

What's the Role? We are looking for a high potential candidate with strong business acumen to unleash high potential at Hilti, starting as Account Manager. This is no ordinary job. Our people come from all different backgrounds with a shared dedication to high performance, consistent results and outstanding customer service. Who is Hilti? Hilti is where innovation is improving productivity, safety and sustainability in the global construction industry, and beyond. Where strong customer relationships are creating solutions that build a better future. Where there is pride and a sense of belonging across our 120 locations, carrying right into our lives and homes. Where people are exploring possibilities, leveraging their potential, owning their personal development and growing lasting careers. What does the role involve? As Account Manager / Sales Engineer, you will directly report to Sales Manager. Professional knowledge in products, market and service are fundamental to the role as key responsibilities involve developing and growing the assigned sales territories. You will need strong winning mindset to identify new sales potential and turn leads into our customers. From day to day, challenging tasks and responsibilities will help you pave your way as becoming an ambitious market leader. It would be great if you have some experiences with contractors. At Hilti, you’ll enjoy all the perks of being part of a big company, but with the autonomy of running a small business. Once you join Hilti, you’ll see why people stay. Indeed, 85% of people who joined us two years ago are still with the company. What do we offer? Show us what you’re made of and we’ll offer you opportunities to move around the business – to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. It’s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career you’re after. We have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. We screen everyone in the company in a yearly career performance matching process. It means we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. It’s how we find the right fit and further our teams personally and professionally. Additionally, we offer you a competitive salary and a wide range of benefits, including training opportunities and very good health care plan. What you need is: Degree in Civil Engineering or any related field At least 1-3 years of sales experience to contractors or any construction business Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Good communication skills in both Thai & English Computer literacy and if experienced in SFDC or any CRM, it would be an advantage Dynamic personality with strong winning and high-performance mindset Self-motivated and a quick learner Why should you apply? We have a diverse and inclusive workforce and offer a high performance yet caring culture. We will give you all of the training and development opportunities that you need to help grow your career with a market leader. If we’re impressed with your CV, we’ll invite you for an interview.

column8: วุฒิการศึกษา - ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาชีพ - วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ - วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ - เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ เงินเดือน/ค่าตอบแทน 23,000 - 50,000 ตำแหน่ง 10 ตำแหน่ง รายละเอียดของงาน ได้พัฒนา Web ร่วมแสดงความคิดเห็นในการเพิ่มหรือแก้ไขฟีเจอร์ของ Application Perform unit test การเขียนโปรแกรมจะต้องคำนึงถึงด้านความปลอดภัยของข้อมูลและระบบเสมอ ทำงานในรูปแบบ Agile สามารถทำงานในการติต่อกับ RDBMS/N0SQL db ได้เป็นอย่างดี และถ้ามีประสบการณ์ในการ Tune Performance หรือเขียน code ติดต่อกับข้อมูลปริมาณมากจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ชอบเขียนโปรแกรม มี passion ในการเรียนรู้ ต้องการเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของความสำเร็จ มี Growth Mindset ทำงานร่วมกันผู้อื่นได้ดี บริหารเวลาและชีวิตตัวเองได้ดี รายละเอียดบริษัท / สวัสดิการ เราคือผู้เชี่ยวชาญทางด้าน Digital Transformation, Paperless Solution, Document Management, e-Signature, e-Tax invoice and e-Receipt, Enterprise Content Management และ Robotic Process Automation เราส่งมอบประสบการณ์ Favorite Medium is a global consultancy specialising in digital product design and development. Established in 2006, we have launched over 125 products for clients around the world in the energy, technology, and financial services verticals. You will be working to solve challenging problems with a group of talented teammates from diverse backgrounds. We are looking for a meticulous, curious junior software engineer to join our growing team. An ideal candidate will have a strong academic background in computer science or engineering and deep knowledge of at least one object-oriented or functional programming language. Although this is initially a generalist role to start, after gaining experience there will be opporunities to work with senior engineers to specialize in data engineering, ML, applications (front end, mobile) and back end. This position is based in Chiang Mai, Thailand, a city known for its fantastic quality of life, diversity, amazing food, and great infrastructure. Visa processing and housing subsidy will be provided. Requirements Substantial competence in one or more of the following languages C/C++ Rust, Golang Haskell, Erlang, Elm Solid understanding of computer architecture (memory, processor, I/O, storage) SQL and data modeling Fluency in spoken and written English Excellent communication and presentation skills are essential Openness to working in a global, location-independent team Nice to have Experience working independently in remote working environment Exposure to design tools, such as Figma, Invision, Adobe XD, etc. Serverless functions React or Angular web frameworks Web Assembly (WASM) Experience in developing native or cross-platform mobile apps Active open source contributor Benefits Health insurance coverage Housing subsidy Relocation package Computer hardware stipend

Jobtitle: Senior Business Insight Analyst – Bangkok Based
column8: Senior Business Insight Analyst – Bangkok Based Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: Agoda Homes – a core business line within Agoda – supports a wide range of non-hotel accommodation types, including serviced apartments, homes, private villas, farm stays, chalets, boats, and many more. While these accommodations were always available on Agoda, a changing market demands more focus on increasing supply and elevating their quality. The Opportunity: As a Senior Business Insight Analyst, the key objective is to drive the overall business development strategy for Agoda Homes across our key markets. You will be responsible for analyzing data and trends, identifying growth opportunities, and owning the performance management of commercial teams across 10+ markets. The role entails analyzing and synthesizing insights leveraging internal and external data, scanning the competitive landscape, and spotting trends to ideate, plan and execute experiments or improvements as needed. You should be analytical and data-driven in order to identify and present insights and be able to work cross-functionally to implement recommendations that enable the business to grow. In this Role, You’ll Get To: Develop and drive strategic alignment on commercial initiatives to grow the Agoda Homes business Leverage industry and internal data to identify critical insights, analyze performance and identify appropriate levers to improve supply performance Own and maintain the performance management system for the Agoda Homes commercial team of account managers across 10+ key markets Prepare updates on business performance, project initiatives and analyses to large team of account managers and senior management Work closely with key stakeholders cross-functionally within Agoda to drive execution of strategic initiatives and track their impact(operations, markets, product, data teams) Support the ongoing development of the broader Agoda Homes Supply Team through knowledge sharing, coaching and training What You’ll Need to Succeed: Minimum of 4 years of total experience in Sales Operations, Business Development, Data Analytics, Strategy, Program Management, or other relevant fields Excellent English communication skills (both verbal and written) ito efficiently present to different size audiences and work with stakeholders Experience with SQL and ability to leverage data to come up with recommendations Experience working in a fast-paced and high growth environment Entrepreneurial and not afraid to be hands-on on the work It’s Great If You Have: Experience using customer-relationship management (CRM) systems such as HubSpot or Salesforce #taipei #bangkok #bangalore #newdelhi #jakarta #bali #bandung #tokyo #osaka #yokohama #kualalumpur #manila #seoul #hcmc #hanoi #ANLS #4 #LI-KR1 Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy. To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

Jobtitle: Lead Analyst/ Senior Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
column8: Lead Analyst/ Senior Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided) Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests. Display: Test, analyze, and optimize campaigns on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and others. Modeling: Analyze the vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop models we can use for optimization, and build dashboards for account managers. Jobtitle: Senior Database Administrator (MSSQL – Performance tuning expert)
column8: Senior Database Administrator (MSSQL – Performance tuning expert) Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know Our Team ​The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward. The Opportunity In Agoda, we have 800+ MSSQL instances across 5 data centers which have 7 nines uptime to serve customers, affiliates, and Agoda employee users around the world. We have been working on a big scale of fast & safe database CI/CD pipeline with involved 1,000+ Engineers in IT department and it leads to having new 50-100 store procedures deployment on production every day. As Senior DBA, you will have a big challenge & opportunity to help define, standardized, and provide the best practice of T-SQL query performance to make sure query performance is optimized to run all apps and databases together efficiently. In This Role, You’ll Get to Work with CI/CD engineering team to create excellent database performance checks to do performance tests before going to deploy on production. Be a mentor in the performance tuning area and able to give advice & best practices technique to the development & DBA team. What You’ll Need to Succeed Solid production experiences in a “high transactional” 24×7 OLTP of MS SQL Server administration. Expert in T-SQL query, Optimizer, and Execution plan principles Excellent English is written and verbal communication. Be able to work multi-task and context-switch effectively between different activities and teams Be able to attend On-Call rotation It’s Great If You Have Storage, windows OS, Network principle MCSA, MCSE, and/or MVP certifications #london #moscow #taipei #seoul #tokyo #hongkong #beijing #sydney #hcmc #london #munich #telaviv #kyiv #sanfrancisco #shanghai Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. Worknetics Global, a cutting-edge Employer of Record (EOR) company headquartered in the thriving business hub of Singapore. We redefine the future of global workforce solutions with a forward-thinking approach and an unwavering commitment to service excellence. As a leader in the industry, we are on a rapid expansion journey across Asia, transforming the way businesses manage their talent across borders. Our Vision: We envision a world where businesses seamlessly navigate the complexities of global employment. Through innovative solutions and a client-centric approach, we empower organizations to focus on their core objectives while we take care of the intricacies of international workforce management. Key Features that Define Us: Forward Thinking: Embracing Technology: We leverage cutting-edge technology to streamline processes, enhance efficiency, and provide real-time insights into global workforce management. Future-Ready Solutions: Our solutions are designed with scalability in mind, anticipating the evolving needs of businesses in an ever-changing global landscape. Service Excellence: Client-Centric Approach: Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We tailor our services to meet the unique needs of each client, providing personalized and comprehensive EOR solutions. Dedicated Support: Our team of experts is committed to delivering unparalleled support, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience for our clients. Expansion Across Asia: Hub in Singapore: Situated in the heart of Asia, our Singapore headquarters serves as a strategic base for our regional operations. Rapid Expansion: With an ambitious growth strategy, we are rapidly expanding our footprint across key Asian markets, bringing our innovative EOR solutions to new horizons. Global Talent Management: Diverse Workforce: We understand the importance of a diverse and skilled workforce. Our solutions empower businesses to tap into global talent pools effortlessly. Compliance Assurance: Navigating the complexities of international employment regulations, we ensure our clients remain compliant in every jurisdiction. Join Us on the Journey: Explore the future of global employment with Worknetics Global, where innovation meets service excellence, and together, we redefine possibilities. The Role Are you ready to embark on a dynamic career journey that blends innovation, flexibility, and operational excellence? We are seeking an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Operations Management Assistant to join our growing team in the vibrant city of Bangkok, Thailand. This is a unique opportunity to contribute to our global operations while enjoying the perks of flexible hours and primarily remote work. Key Responsibilities: Operational Support: Assist in day-to-day operations, ensuring smooth workflow and effective communication across departments. Process Improvement: Collaborate with the operations team to identify and implement process enhancements for increased efficiency. Data Analysis: Analyze operational data to provide insights and recommendations for optimizing performance. Project Coordination: Support various projects by coordinating tasks, tracking progress, and facilitating communication among team members. Documentation: Maintain accurate records and documentation related to operational processes and procedures. Communication Liaison: Act as a bridge between different teams, facilitating clear communication and ensuring alignment on operational goals. B enefits: Flexible Hours: Enjoy the freedom to set your work hours, allowing for an optimal work-life balance. Remote Work: Take advantage of the opportunity to work remotely, with periodic in-person meetings and team events. Professional Development: Access to ongoing training and development opportunities to enhance your skills and advance your career. Dynamic Team: Join a collaborative and diverse team that values creativity, innovation, and teamwork. If you're ready to contribute to a forward-thinking organization and elevate your career in operations management, we want to hear from you! Note: The position is based in Bangkok, Thailand, but offers flexibility with remote work arrangements. Ideal Profile Experience: 2+ years in operations or a related field. Education: Bachelor's degree in business, operations management, or a relevant discipline. Tech-Savvy: Proficient in using productivity tools and project management software. Attributes: Detail-Oriented: Strong attention to detail with the ability to spot inefficiencies and propose effective solutions. Adaptability: Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment with the flexibility to adjust to changing priorities. Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Thai language proficiency is a plus. Initiative: Proactive mindset with the ability to take initiative and drive projects forward independently. What's on Offer? Excellent career development opportunities Flexible working options Leadership Role

The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud. Native fluency in Thai and strong command of English (reading, writing, listening, speaking) Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Business, Economics, Engineering, Computer Science or Supply Chain Operations Management related field is preferred At least 5 years of work experience in product management, business or systems analyses, management consulting, IT and implementation consulting related fields are preferred Have very strong project management skills including interpersonal & communication skills Familiar with business impact sizing studies, feasibility analyses, and projection implementation cross-functionally A proactive, fast learner, team player and leader with ability to work and manage diverse team communities in dynamic environments Adept at understanding business priorities to forecasting and analyses, detail oriented, and strong problem-solving skills Resilient in understanding wide range of users, including Shopee customers and internal business and operations users to optimize for lean processes and cascade into productization and new process implementation strategies Experience with eCommerce is highly desirable Experience using JIRA, application emulators, SQL is a plus

Company: บริษัท เทนเซ็นต์ (ประเทศไทย) จำกัด
column8: Full Stack Engineer (1 position) Tencent (Thailand) Company Limited Job Responsibilities and Qualifications : Responsibilities:

IZUMO is a new-era VTuber project with a mission to create a sustainable platform where everyone can live as they want to be. We aim to unlock the potential of humanity through the avatar technology. Recently, we completed the “SAI by IZUMO” project with world-class artists in the anime and gaming industry. IZUMO continues to support all creators in maximizing their potential creativity with emerging technologies. If you are intrigued by the opportunities in the emerging virtual entertainment industry, apply now! The Role As a Server-Side TypeScript Engineer, you will be an integral part of our technology team, responsible for building robust and scalable server-side applications that power our cutting-edge social platforms. Bring your expertise in TypeScript, server-side development, and passion for creating exceptional user experiences to shape the future of entertainment technology. You will be responsible for: Designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications using TypeScript and Node.js. Architecting, implementing, and optimizing APIs to support seamless interactions between server and client applications. Guiding and leading cross-disciplinary dialogs to drive features from the initial concept of our new product to completion. Demonstrating expertise and ownership in major areas of the codebase. Collaborating with the leadership team, project manager, and design team to drive optimum results Creating and maintaining technical documentation for server-side code, APIs, and databases. Ideal Profile You possess a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. You have at least 3 years of experience as a Typescript developer, with hands-on experience in building large-scale applications. You have proven experience in architecting and developing APIs in a cloud environment (ex., AWS, GCP), utilizing Typescript (Node.js). You have a solid understanding of Node.js, web stacks, libraries, frameworks, and infrastructure. Experience developing native iOS / Android applications, and/or knowledge of C# is a plus. Experience developing communication systems in standard web technologies, such as streaming services and network games would be preferred. You have a strong passion for gaming, anime, manga, and/or VTuber would be a plus. You can work well in fully distributed, fast-paced international teams. What's on Offer? Join a fast growing startup building a sustainable platform for content creators globally Exciting opportunity to be part of the core team and support all aspects of product development Be part of a fully distributed international team of talented individuals
