Project Management , Training and Development, Stakeholder Awareness and Engagement. Leadership and influence skill.

Jobtitle: Frontend Developer (Web Application or Android or iOS)
column8: รายละเอียดงาน: ออกแบบ พัฒนา Front-End Website หรือ Mobile Application เพื่อสร้างประสบการณ์ที่ดีที่สุดในการใช้งานให้กับผู้ใช้ พัฒนางานให้มีประสิทธิภาพและเที่ยงตรงตามแผนงานที่วางไว้ รักษาทักษะและความรู้ด้านการใช้ภาษาพื้นฐาน การcoding conventions และการดำเนินงานตามแผนงานที่วางไว้ ให้การสนับสนุน ตรวจสอบ และวิเคราะห์สาเหตุของปัญหาหรือจุดบกพร่องของสิ่งที่กำลังพัฒนาอยู่คุณสมบัติ: เพศหญิง/ชาย อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี พร้อมจะพัฒนาความรู้ใหม่ๆ ตลอดเวลา สามารถพัฒนาสิ่งใหม่ๆ เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการผู้ใช้งาน ได้อย่างรวดเร็ว เป็นคนที่เรียนรู้ได้เร็ว และชอบทำงานเป็นทีม สามารถคิด วิเคราะห์และแก้ปัญหาได้ มีทัศนคติที่ดีในการทำงาน มีความสามารถ/ทักษะในการพัฒนาด้วยภาษา Web Application - HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP เชี่ยวชาญ JavaScript libraries และ frameworks เช่น AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS, Boostrap Android - Java iOS - Object-C เชี่ยวชาญการจัดการ  asynchronous request, partial page updates, and AJAX มีความเข้าใจ และเชี่ยวชาญ เรื่องปัญหาความเข้ากันได้ข้ามเบราว์เซอร์ และสามารถทำให้ Code ทำงานร่วมกันได้เป็นอย่างดี หากมีความรู้หรือประสบการณ์ในด้านเหล่านี้จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถฟัง อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี เข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการทำ SEO, SEM, SMM สามารถใช้งาน git version control system มีประสบการณ์การพัฒนา Software ด้วย Agile/Scrum Process

Job descriptions: Responsible for product success from vision to execution across investment & wealth portfolios. Create product vision, roadmap, strategy and key value proposition Develop a deep end to end understanding of your customers and stakeholders, using various tools and methods, to continually gather and analyze qualitative and quantitative data. Own & manage all product life-cycles on our products and services from product roadmaps, product processes, create and write user stories, design user journeys, manage acceptance criteria, etc. Facilitate and work with our stakeholder and other team members to take a vision and break it down into user stories and create mockups/wireframes of new features Work closely with our partner, business team, engineers, customer experience team, and operation team to capture feedback, identify new requirements and translate requirements into deliverable solutions. Requirements: Minimum 5 years in a Product Manager / Business Analyst role in the banking platform, or consultant field. Experiences in Investment & wealth products (Mutual fund, Bond, Stocks, Digital Assets,) is required An experience in a startup company or Agile methodologies is a plus. Demonstrates an aptitude for learning complex technical concepts and can simplify & articulate ideas, with excellent communication skills, both verbal and written. Interested in learning new technologies and working towards integrating legacy industry data systems with an innovative solution with an incredible user journey. Able to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done. Familiarity with Jira or other product management tools is a plus. You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team You are very good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels. You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization, and in a variety of situations.

At SiteMinder we believe the individual contributions of our employees are what drive our success. That’s why we hire and encourage diverse teams that include and respect a variety of voices, identities, backgrounds, experiences and perspectives. Our diverse and inclusive culture enables our employees to bring their unique selves to work and be proud of doing so. It’s in our differences that we will keep revolutionising the way for our customers. We are better together! What We Do… We’re people who love technology but know that hoteliers just want things to be simple. So since 2006 we’ve been constantly innovating our world-leading hotel commerce platform to help accommodation owners find and book more guests online - quickly and simply. We’ve helped everyone from boutique hotels to big chains, enabling travellers to book igloos, cabins, castles, holiday parks, campsites, pubs, resorts, Airbnbs, and everything in between. And today, we’re the world’s leading open hotel commerce platform, supporting 40,000 hotels in 150 countries - with over 100 million reservations processed by SiteMinder’s technology every year. About the Strategic Operations Analyst, Customer role... We are looking for a talented Analyst to join our Strategic Operations team, with a primary focus on elevating Customer Analytics and driving Data Activation across the Customer lifecycle. As an integral part of our team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping data-driven decisions and contributing to the success of our organisation. In this role, you will work alongside the Strategy, Analytics, Operations and Customer Success teams and use our rich data ecosystem and a world class Data stack to create great customer outcomes & drive business impact at speed and scale. In our book, analysts are so much more than reporting and we want you to be at the heart of operations & strategy. What you’ll do: Turbocharge our Operations using a combination of data, tech, and x-functional collaboration The team has built a solid data & tech foundation to empower you to quickly spin up customer data and connect it to operational systems. Using this solid base, we want you to work alongside business leaders to: Create beautiful data products (e.g. dashboards) that improve visibility on, and understanding of customer health in different phases of the customer lifecycle and facilitate intervention for our frontline teams (e.g. onboarding teams, customer success agents, enterprise account managers) Create a data-driven system to support automated workflows that will help focus customer success intervention where it is most effective via a playbook of strategic, data-driven customer actions (e.g. retention plays when customer shows signs of churn, upsell, driving product adoption) Create the data layers to support personalised, targeted customer communication to support digital, highly scalable customer lifecycle journeys This is a role that requires a good amount of x-functional collaboration with diverse stakeholders. While we do need help on the data & tech front, we also want you to be a part of the team for the whole process: Use your special powers in Data & Analytics to help us understand trends in Business & Customer performance Your role will require ingenuity in utilising and interpreting data, translating insights into actionable outcomes and strategic plans. Here are just a few examples of how that might come into play: Use our rich data warehouse and your problem solving skills to help the business answer tricky questions about customer growth, user behaviour, customer churn, product & feature adoption trends, onboarding / success team productivity, etc. Support performance analysis for our customer success efforts Support leadership on key meetings (Business Reviews, Regional deep dives, Marketing deep dives, etc.) Create forecasting models to help us predict future business outcomes (e.g. customer churn, upsell, product adoption, etc.) What you have: 3-5 years proven experience as a Consultant, Data Analyst, Data scientist or a similar analytical role, preferably in the software industry or B2B environment. Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Statistics, Data science, Engineering or a related quant field. A Master's degree is a plus. A self starter with high energy and a proven ability to roll up your sleeves to get things done Experience optimising customer journeys, and running data-driven experiments to increase customer lifecycle value (churn, revenue, etc.) A team player with a humble attitude, you can give and take criticism Experience collaborating with business leaders to support strong data-led decision making Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate complicated technical analysis into compelling narratives that can be used to influence senior leaders. A keen eye for detail, a critical mind, and the ability to prioritise tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Enjoy analysing business drivers and levers, getting deep into the data, using first principles thinking, and consistently delivering great results Knowledge of the hotel tech industry or hospitality sector is advantageous but not essential. Experience extracting, manipulating and interpreting customer data using SQL (Snowflake or Databricks experience preferred, but any will do). Handy with data visualisation tools like Tableau or Looker and have a willingness to get better. Experience with Excel and/or Google sheets and are confident analysing data + building models in excel using excel functions (lookups, pivots, formatting, manipulation and transformation, visualisation) Bonus: experience with Salesforce Bonus: experience with Customer Engagement & Marketing automation software like Marketo, Intercom or Salesforce Marketing cloud Bonus: experience with ETL or Reverse ETL tools like Fivetran, Hightouch, Census Bonus: experience with advanced analytical tools like R, Python Bonus: experience with Machine Learning Our Perks & Benefits… - Equity packages for you to be a part of the SiteMinder journey - Hybrid working model (in-office & from home) - Mental health and well-being initiatives - Generous parental (including secondary) leave policy - Paid birthday, study and volunteering leave every year - Sponsored social clubs, team events, and celebrations - Employee Resource Groups (ERG) to help you connect and get involved - Investment in your personal growth offering training for your advancement Does this job sound like you? If yes, we'd love for you to be part of our team! Please send a copy of your resume and our Talent Acquisition team will be in touch. When you apply, please tell us the pronouns you use and any adjustments you may need during the interview process. We encourage people from underrepresented groups to apply. #LI-Hybrid

Role Purpose and Description: As a Market Insight Intern, you will participate as the top funnel of the data operation team to collect data and investigate anomalies and take part in processes to help us guide clients on how to grow their e-commerce businesses. We are building out a world class data operation team at aCommerce and require people who excel in fast paced, performance driven, customer facing environments. We are the leading ecommerce enabler in ASEAN and are in an exciting growth period at which you will be working with the key decision makers of global brands on a daily basis, ensuring that we exceed their expectations as well as establish long term relationships. Responsibilities: Act as a true e-commerce guru for our clients, guiding them how to grow their e-commerce business through and beyond our EIQ Market Insight platform. Create engaged customers and facilitate organic growth Data Management: Ensure accurate and up-to-date information by entering and maintaining lead data. Organize and segment leads to facilitate effective follow-up and personalized outreach. Market Research: Conduct thorough market research to gain insights into industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences. Provide comprehensive reports and analysis on market opportunities, customer needs, and potential target segments. Work closely with the Client and Application Support teams to ensure a flawless client and user experience Keep ahead of the industry’s developments and apply best practices in everything you do. Qualifications: Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Detail-oriented with excellent organizational abilities. Basic understanding of digital marketing concepts and lead generation strategies. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights. Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently and as part of a team. Eagerness to learn about SaaS platforms, marketplace intelligence, and business development practices. BEING PART OF THE PRODUCT TEAM If your next challenge is to be an expert and key player in the ecommerce industry, joining our Product team will be your right decision. We’re a bunch of fun-loving individuals who are passionate about all things ecommerce, passionate about the success of our clients and passionate about the customer experience. By joining our team, you will be responsible for building our future products. Essentially, the main factor that drives this team is aCommerce’s DNA or core values and culture. We incorporate our company’s DNA into everything we do. Additionally, you will be working with and learning from teammates who are flexible, adaptable and share positive energy with each other. Come and join us if this journey sounds interesting to you! What’s in it for YOU? An opportunity to work with one of the largest ecommerce Enablers in Southeast Asia with a multicultural environment that will offer you challenges to develop your career and professional skills. aCommerce provides a variety of unique perks—and they’re available to you whenever you need them. From solid healthcare services, work from home options, comfortable workspace, flexible leave (since it’s important to enjoy quality time off), flexible work hours and attractive work locations: EmQuartier for our Thailand office, Sahid Sudirman Center in Jakarta or SM Aura Office Tower in Manila. aCommerce believes in investing in YOU which is why you will be given the opportunity to explore the world of technology and innovation in ecommerce. Work alongside experts who will enhance and recognize your professional knowledge to the highest potential! YOU ARE GETTING MORE THAN JUST A JOB! At aCommerce, we provide you with more than just a job. Our business help large multinational brands (L’Oréal, Samsung, Adidas and Johnson & Johnson to name a few) with their ecommerce revolution and being in the thick of it will transform your growth to wherever you and your career want to be! Being part of the #aTeam means: ● You are valued. Everyone is equally important and works together on uncharted challenges alongside inspiring colleagues from all over the region. ● Being trusted. Once a month, you have the benefit to work remotely and choose your own workspace. ● Being celebrated! May that be a small win or a major milestone in your career, you have a family here who will support and celebrate every step of the way of your aCommerce journey. ● Comfortable at work. We provide you with a laptop, a cozy working space and smart casual dress code! Just come in as you are and bring your passion, commitment and “can do” attitude at work. There’s a lot of things that you can look forward to if you join us today and we leave it up to you to discover what’s in store for you. INTERESTING FACTS ● Getting to equal when it comes to being a gender-balanced organization is something we celebrate! We are proud of our gender ratio. ● We have more than 20+ nationalities who are working hard to take aCommerce ahead every day.

Company Description At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible. At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon. We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future. Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too. We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands. Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description Job Description We are looking for Test Engineer, As a Test Engineer, you will work closely with engineers in group to create Mfg. Test program to test Storage products. You will be responsible to develop and maintain test code and update it based upon feedback from mfg. test. It could range from fixing bugs – to increase test yield or optimization or implementation of new test screens, application, tool as advised by engineering or QA teams. This position may require you to go to mfg. floor (as needed) on site to observe issues and implement or roll out solution. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Work closely with SW/HW architects and other engineers in multiple disciplines (including electrical, mechanical, firmware, and manufacturing) to develop use cases, test plans and automated tests in a process driven environment. Develop and maintain tools for automation used in testing of data center products using Python, C#, React, Microsoft SQL Server. Some knowledge of SQL queries Thinking out about testing products in HVM (High volume mfg.) environment. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Fermware, EE, ME, and NPI, System Test teams Assist and develop processes for Mfg. Failure analysis processes. Good documentation/ communication skills to train fellow engineers and technicians. Qualifications REQUIRED: Bachelor’s degree in a related field e.g. Computer Engineering or equivalent. At least 7-10 years of recent experience working in an area of their specialty or related field. Advanced skills in programming languages such as Python, C# Clear on fundamentals of Object-Oriented Programming. Experience in creating and deploying Application programming interfaces (API). PREFERRED: Previous experience as programming in High Volume mfg. facilities Bachelors in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent SKILLS: Demonstrated understanding of Software Programming concepts and principles Excellent written and oral communication, interpersonal and relational skills, with the ability to quickly develop relationships of trust and confidence with a variety of people and personalities, at all levels within an organization Self-motivated with the ability to effectively multi-task and work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team environment Strong active listening skills with the ability to ask thoughtful and probing questions to determine client needs Ability to make clear, logical decisions based on facts, taking into consideration the big picture, long and short-term effects, and exercising sound judgment when making changes to Mfg. test Programs. Additional Information Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution. Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

ชื่อบริษัท Blockdit Co.,Ltd เงินเดือนโดยเฉลี่ย ต่อรองได้ สถานที่ทำงาน ปทุมวัน ประเทศ ไทย งานโดย บริษัทจ้างโดยตรง ประเภทการจ้างงาน งานประจำ ระดับประสบการณ์ 1-3 ปี ระดับการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี มาร่วมกัน UNBLOCK YOUR REAL WORLD กับ Blockdit บริษัท แอลทีแมน จำกัด เราเป็นบริษัท Tech Startupในคอนเซ็ปต์ Content Focused Platform For Better Society ปัจจุบัน Blockdit มีผู้ใช้งานแอปพลิเคชันแล้วกว่า 2,000,000 คนต่อเดือนเท่ากับว่าตัวงานที่ทุกคนได้ทำ Impact กับคนจำนวนมากระดับล้านคน สิทธิประโยชน์ถ้าคุณได้มีโอกาสร่วมงานกับเรา มี MacBook ให้พร้อมทำงาน ที่นี่เราเริ่มงานกัน 10 โมง หยุดเสาร์-อาทิตย์ และวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ ตามธนาคารแห่งประเทศไทย เข้าบริษัท 2 วัน ทำงานจากที่บ้าน 3 วัน ประกันสุขภาพ / ประกันชีวิต / ประกันอุบัติเหตุ ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี กับโรงพยาบาลชั้นนำของไทย สวัสดิการเพื่อที่อยู่อาศัย กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ แบบ Employee’s Choice (เปิดโอกาสให้สมาชิกสามารถเลือกนโยบายการลงทุนได้ด้วยตนเอง) กองทุนประกันสังคม วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี (สะสมได้) ใครอยากพัฒนาศักยภาพตนเอง โดยมีโอกาสได้ทำงานกับคนเก่งๆ ลองมาช่วยกันสร้างผลกระทบเป็นวงกว้างต่อสังคมไปพร้อมๆ กัน ลักษณะงาน Research technical solutions, perform feasibility studies, and do quick prototyping Build reusable, testable, and efficient NodeJS code together with unit tests Optimize code for the lowest latency, the highest availability, the highest performance and the best security Translate technical requirements into high quality code under challenged time constraint with ease of maintenance in mind Continuously improve coding practice to maximize testability, readability and maintainability คุณสมบัติ 2+ years NodeJS experience, or excellent academic result or previous job performance Bachelor degree in computer engineering or computer science Technology focused, self-motivated, detail-oriented, proactive in problem solving, and self-improvement Positive attitude and ability to work with both non-technical and technical team members Solid understanding in algorithms, data structures, and asynchronous programming Proficient in NodeJS and commonly used NodeJS libraries such as Express, Apollo Server, Moment, Sharp, Winston, or proven ability to learn on the job Proficient in popular data layer such as MariaDB, MongoDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, Kafka, or proven ability to learn on the job Experience in common development tools such as Babel, NPM/Yarn, or proven ability to learn on the job Experience in testing tools such as Mocha, Chai, Sinon or proven ability to learn on the job Experience in design patterns, unit testing, and test-driven development approach Exposure to Agile practice, continuous integration/delivery, and collaboration tools such as GitHub, Jenkins ส่งใบสมัคร งานอื่นๆ ที่ใกล้เคียงกัน Web Developer (React) Senior Software Engineer Programmer / Developer (Nodejs, React) Java Programmer Full Stack Developer (React.js & Node.js) Keyword tags: Core developer (NodeJS / Golang)
 
 
 
 
 
 NodeJS

Job Description Implement Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 software application on Supply Chains, Inventory, WMS, Procurement or Sales Distribution Modules. Design process flow to map with client’s business. Perform Analysis of Business Flow, and mapping of AX 2012 Features, with identification of GAP Requirements Propose for relevant solution with reasoning, based on Standard AX 2012 features, for the identified Business Requirements Configure Microsoft Dynamics AX configuration according to System Design. Make basic design (functional design document) instruction to developer. Create test case and conduct system testing. Create UAT test script and UAT support. Create training material (user manual and presentation). Provide user training. Support users for go-live operations.

Overview Weatherford is a leading global energy services company. Our world-class experts partner with customers to optimize their resources and realize the full potential of their assets. Across our operating locations, including manufacturing, research and development, service, and training facilities, operators choose us for strategic solutions that add efficiency, flexibility, and responsibility to any energy operation. We are focused on technology development, digital solutions, and defining our footprint in the new energy space. Our ability to provide integrated solutions across our segments will be critical to growth in our core operations and the energy transition. Energy producers face unique challenges every day, so it is our job to create solutions that enhance safety, streamline operations, and sustain uptime to meet or exceed their targets. We operate across the global energy landscape employing some of the best diverse talent in the industry. At Weatherford, we understand the value each individual brings to the table. We celebrate diversity in all its forms and are immensely proud of our workforce. We invite you to join our passionate, talented, world-class team. When you join Weatherford, you instantly feel connected to something bigger - a community that is grounded by our core values and driven to create innovative solutions for our customers. We celebrate each other's successes, grow together, and learn from each other constantly. Individually, we are impressive. Together, we are unstoppable. We are One Weatherford. Weatherford offers competitive compensation, a comprehensive benefits program and provides you a challenging and enriching career path, with a healthy balance of structure and flexibility to chart your own course. Weatherford is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. Responsibilities Our internship will provide you with hands on experiences which will drive your personal success and development. You will become familiar with how the oil and gas industry works and how Weatherford impacts outcomes. You will participate in technically focused training, professional development training, and team meetings. The core of your internship will include a project with meaningful impact, where you will work across groups to develop solutions and then present your results. During your internship you will be supported by your manager, as well as our Talent Development team who will ensure that you grow professionally as well as in your knowledge of our organization and industry. As an Intern, you will be responsible for: Receiving coaching and mentoring to enable you to understand our organization and projects to develop your skills. Completing internal projects to identify business improvements and critical customer outcomes. Learning about our organization, our systems and processes to assist with the completion of projects and tasks. Collaborating with cross-functional teams and interns to interact and network with global business leaders. Presenting your project outcomes to our Senior Leadership team Providing feedback at the conclusion of your internship. Applying Health, Safety and Environment (HS&E) standards and procedures in all situations to ensure compliance is maintained. Qualifications Be currently enrolled in the 3 rd year of university in Bachelor of Engineering. Have minimum of 2.75 GPAX. SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE: Be proficient in English language ie speak, read and write. Have attitude of a leader. Have strong communication skill. Have ability of team player. Have great computer skill. Possess an interest in learning, observing, and practicing a variety of experiences in our industry. Demonstrate awareness, understanding, and skills necessary to work in a diverse environment. Articulate with strong interpersonal skill. Have ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines. Have solid project management acumen. Be detail-oriented, self-directed, proactive, and curious. Be flexible and adaptable.

Qualifications Be currently enrolled in the 3 rd year of university in Bachelor of Engineering. Have minimum of 2.75 GPAX. SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE: Be proficient in English language ie speak, read and write. Have attitude of a leader. Have strong communication skill. Have ability of team player. Have great computer skill. Possess an interest in learning, observing, and practicing a variety of experiences in our industry. Demonstrate awareness, understanding, and skills necessary to work in a diverse environment. Articulate with strong interpersonal skill. Have ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines. Have solid project management acumen. Be detail-oriented, self-directed, proactive, and curious. Be flexible and adaptable.

Company: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN)
column8: Major Responsibilities: As the regional specialist for the application of the ESMS, this position is responsible for ensuring that ESMS procedures, standards and principles are applied on the regional project portfolio. He/she will also build ESMS capacity in the region to enhance ESMS compliant project design and ensure effective implementation of the risk management strategies. This involves coaching and training of existing regional staff, project proponents and project managers (including external to IUCN) as well as supporting recruitment, onboarding and training of project ESMS officers. This position provides safeguards expertise to support learning from ESMS application in support of further refining the system and increasing the system’s efficiency. She/he will monitor the application of safeguard tools in the region, distil lessons learned and support the global ESMS Coordinator in system development, refinements and learning. This position will report to the Regional MEL Coordinator but will be guided technically by the global ESMS Coordinator. SPECIFIC DUTIES Regional portfolio ESMS application Application of ESMS procedures on the regional project portfolio, specifically: 1. Environmental and social due diligence at project design stage • Screen projects on environmental and social impacts, define risk category, identify necessary impact studies and safeguard tools/plans; • Advise proponents on stakeholder engagement during project design and implementation phase; • Support proponents in contracting experts for environmental and social assessments; where issues are less complex, carry out targeted assessments and stakeholder consultation; • Appraise the quality of final ESIA reports and environmental and social management plans (ESMP) and other safeguard tools; • Ensure appropriate budgeting for ESMS activities; • Conduct final compliance check and prepare ESMS clearance of projects. 2. ESMS support during project implementation • Provide ESMS training for executing agency (EA) and relevant partners at project inception; • Appraise any ESMS deliverables that are due in the inception phase; • Support the EA in reporting progress on implementation of safeguard tools and compliance with all ESMS requirements; • Contribute to annual project implementation reviews/ supervision missions and to the development of the ESMS specific aspects of the mid-term review and terminal review; • Manage ESMS project data including entries to the Project Portal. 3. Grievance management and incident reporting • Support the EA in setting-up a project-level grievance mechanism; • Work with EA to solve grievance in line with IUCN’s three-staged grievance process; • Maintain a register of grievance and report on progress solving grievances; • Ensure timely reporting of incidents and implementation of corrective actions. Build ESMS capacity in the region: To enhance ESMS compliant project design and ensure effective implementation of the risk management strategies, it is essential to strengthen regional ESMS capacity. This involves: 1. Train and coach regional staff on the ESMS to ensure not only consistent application but also pro-active integration of ESMS principles into project design; 2. Support the global ESMS Coordinator in the development of ESMS training materials and delivery of training sessions; 3. Contribute to the recruitment, hiring and on-boarding of new project ESMS officers in the region. ESMS development, refinement, and learning: Supporting the global ESMS Coordinator in system development, refinements, and learning. This involves: 1. Capture lessons learned and feed-back from the EA and project stakeholders and suggest refinement and improvements of the system; 2. Contribute to enhancement of institutional processes to increase effectiveness of ESMS application; 3. Generate lessons on the ESMS application identifying good practices and synthesising these practices for dissemination; 4. Perform other duties as may be assigned from time to time. Please Note: The above TORs contain the main responsibilities and duties of this position. However, in an ever evolving organisation such as IUCN staff members are expected to show flexibility in their approach to work and be willing to undertake other tasks that are reasonably allocated to them but which are not part of their regular TORs. Where any task becomes a regular part of staff member’s responsibilities, the TORs should be changed in consultation between the manager, the staff member and the HR Unit. Any one of the three may initiate the consultation.

Overview Weatherford is a leading global energy services company. Our world-class experts partner with customers to optimize their resources and realize the full potential of their assets. Across our operating locations, including manufacturing, research and development, service, and training facilities, operators choose us for strategic solutions that add efficiency, flexibility, and responsibility to any energy operation. We are focused on technology development, digital solutions, and defining our footprint in the new energy space. Our ability to provide integrated solutions across our segments will be critical to growth in our core operations and the energy transition. Energy producers face unique challenges every day, so it is our job to create solutions that enhance safety, streamline operations, and sustain uptime to meet or exceed their targets. We operate across the global energy landscape employing some of the best diverse talent in the industry. At Weatherford, we understand the value each individual brings to the table. We celebrate diversity in all its forms and are immensely proud of our workforce. We invite you to join our passionate, talented, world-class team. When you join Weatherford, you instantly feel connected to something bigger - a community that is grounded by our core values and driven to create innovative solutions for our customers. We celebrate each other's successes, grow together, and learn from each other constantly. Individually, we are impressive. Together, we are unstoppable. We are One Weatherford. Weatherford offers competitive compensation, a comprehensive benefits program and provides you a challenging and enriching career path, with a healthy balance of structure and flexibility to chart your own course. Weatherford is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. Responsibilities Our internship will provide you with hands on experiences which will drive your personal success and development. You will become familiar with how the oil and gas industry works and how Weatherford impacts outcomes. You will participate in technically focused training, professional development training, and team meetings. The core of your internship will include a project with meaningful impact, where you will work across groups to develop solutions and then present your results. During your internship you will be supported by your manager, as well as our Talent Development team who will ensure that you grow professionally as well as in your knowledge of our organization and industry. As an Intern, you will be responsible for: Receiving coaching and mentoring to enable you to understand our organization and projects to develop your skills. Completing internal projects to identify business improvements and critical customer outcomes. Learning about our organization, our systems and processes to assist with the completion of projects and tasks. Collaborating with cross-functional teams and interns to interact and network with global business leaders. Presenting your project outcomes to our Senior Leadership team Providing feedback at the conclusion of your internship. Applying Health, Safety and Environment (HS&E) standards and procedures in all situations to ensure compliance is maintained. Qualifications Be currently enrolled in the 3 rd year of university in Bachelor of Engineering. Have minimum of 2.75 GPAX. SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE: Be proficient in English language ie speak, read and write. Have attitude of a leader. Have strong communication skill. Have ability of team player. Have great computer skill. Possess an interest in learning, observing, and practicing a variety of experiences in our industry. Demonstrate awareness, understanding, and skills necessary to work in a diverse environment. Articulate with strong interpersonal skill. Have ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines. Have solid project management acumen. Be detail-oriented, self-directed, proactive, and curious. Be flexible and adaptable.

รายละเอียด 1) ให้คำปรึกษาเบื้องต้นในเรื่องของระบบรักษาความปลอดภัย งาน access control , Bluetooth, face scan , ระบบไม้กั้น , งาน cctv 2) นำเสนอผลิตภัณฑ์ ระบบรักษาความปลอดภัยงาน access control , Bluetooth, face scan , ระบบไม้กั้น , งาน cctv ให้กับกลุ่มลูกค้ารายใหม่ 3) สร้างความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีกับลูกค้า 4) ผลักดันยอดการขายให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายที่ได้รับ และจัดทำรายงานสรุป รวมถึงเอกสารอื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง คุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร 1) วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี ไม่จำกัดสาขาวิชา 2) มีประสบการณ์ด้านการขายในส่วนงานวัสดุก่อสร้าง อย่างน้อย 1 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ หรือเคยดูแลลูกค้างานโครงการ กลุ่ม ผู้ออกแบบ, developer , ผู้รับเหมา 3) มีรถยนต์ส่วนตัว มีใบขับขี่ และสามารถเดินทางภายในกรุงเทพได้ 4) มีความซื่อสัตย์และทัศนคติที่ดี ทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดี สวัสดิการ

If this is your first time applying you will need to create a candidate account when you click on apply. Job Description Conduct Cybersecurity monitoring and event analysis Support on improving Threat detection and security protection model (ML, AI, Condition base) (depending on experience) Ensure all the identified anomaly event under responsibility are promptly investigated Perform threat intelligence analysis and communicate the result to stakeholders in order to improve people, process and technology. Support the organization as one of the advisors in cybersecurity event collection, cybersecurity analysis and cybersecurity response Perform Research and Development in the area of ‘Defense Security’ and assist the unit in development the practice roadmap Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, MIS, Information Security or IT related field Knowledge in Security Operation Center, Cybersecurity analysis CSOC-related technologies such as SIEM, UEBA, SOAR and Threat Intelligence are familiar. Basic knowledge of enterprise security architecture, security frameworks (NIST, ISO, etc.), and digital forensics. Knowledge in Digital forensic, Machine learning, Stat, Cloud technology is a plus Relevant security certification is a plus, e.g. Cybersecurity incident handling, CISSP, CEH, GIAC Strong leadership, security analytical and problem-solving skill Good command in English We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business. If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us.

IZUMO is a new-era VTuber project with a mission to create a sustainable platform where everyone can live as they want to be. We aim to unlock the potential of humanity through the avatar technology. Recently, we completed the “SAI by IZUMO” project with world-class artists in the anime and gaming industry. IZUMO continues to support all creators in maximizing their potential creativity with emerging technologies. If you are intrigued by the opportunities in the emerging virtual entertainment industry, apply now! The Role As a Senior Unity Developer, you will be a key contributor to the development of engaging and immersive experiences for our cutting-edge social platforms. You will be responsible for : Collaborating with designers and artists to bring creative concepts to life through Unity development. Designing and implementing mechanics, features, and functionalities to enhance user experiences. Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code in C# for Unity 3D. Conducting thorough testing to identify and resolve bugs and performance issues. Providing support with guiding and leading cross-disciplinary dialogs to drive features from the initial concept of our new product to completion. Demonstrating expertise and ownership in major areas of the codebase. Collaborating closely with the leadership team, project manager, and design team. Mentoring, motivating, and inspiring junior engineers. Ideal Profile You have at least 4 years of experience as a Unity Developer, for both Android and iOS applications, as well as prior experience in leading and mentoring teams. You are proficient in C# programming language and Unity development. You also have hands-on experience integrating external APIs (server-side) within applications. You possess experience using Github, Notion, and Slack. Familiarity with platforms such as AppStore / Google Play is a plus. Solid knowledge or hands-on experience using any or all of the following - Typescript(Node.js), Unity Addressable Asset System, Realtime Database or Cloud Firestore, and Agora would be advantageous. You can work well in a fully distributed, fast-paced international teams. What's on Offer? Join a fast growing startup building a sustainable platform for content creators globally Exciting opportunity to be part of the core team and support all aspects of product development Be part of a fully distributed international team of talented individuals

Ability to perform smart hand activity under instruction-based activities at sites. • Ability to lift / move computer equipment weighing up to 50Lbs. • Skilled in desk side support and PC break/fix including basic administration of Windows O/S. • Experience with Anti-spyware and Anti-virus software. • Some usage Knowledge of TCP/IP networking, DNS, DHCP, VPN, and RDP. • Smart hand support for peripheral and networking hardware, including, but not limited to monitors, keyboards, mice, printers, fax machines, scanners, routers, wireless routers, switches, firewalls, racks, cabinets, multi-port data termination panels all under ‘Smart Hands’ capability. • Ability to work with deadlines and complete tasks on-time. Threat Researcher (Bangkok based, relocation provided) Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to Know our Team: The Security Department oversees security, compliance, GRC, and security operations for all Agoda. We are vigilant in ensuring there is no breach or vulnerability threatening our company or endangering our employees in order to keep Agoda safe and protected. This would be a great challenge for those who want to work with the best technology in a dynamic and advanced environment. The Opportunity: You will be immersed in research involving the very latest cyber threats and unprecedented attacks, specifically those targeting the travel sector. Tracking these hacker groups and their evolving tactics will be a pivotal aspect of your role. Given the nature of such challenges, which change on a weekly basis, innovative and outside-the-box solutions are not just encouraged, they are a necessity. In this Role, you’ll get to: Replicate malware in isolated environment and check security posture, and advice improvements. Ability to identify TTPs used, malware family and threat actors based from attack information. Analyze each step of the attack cycle and come up with detection ideas to mitigate them. Working knowledge on top password stealers like Vidar,Redline. Hunting to find undetected malware, DLP threats and API weaknesses. Author custom detection rules to provide extra layer of security besides products. Ability to document and produce research content in form of reports. Follow in the wild attacks and tricks on a daily basis, and protect Agoda against these attacks in form of attack surface reduction / hunt rule What you’ll Need to Succeed: Bachelors in Computer Science or related degree. Experience 3-5 years in cybersecurity research. Malware analysis (static and behavioral), network PCAP and memory analysis. Fundamentals of malware and phishing attacks. Able to separate malicious behavior from clean activity in SIEM logs Demonstration of published research in public domain is a big plus (Whitepapers,Blogs,GitHub etc.) Good at pattern recognition and thinking out of the box solutions. Scripting knowledge (Python, PowerShell) Passionate with fighting Cybercriminals, and up to date with latest security news. Good communication skills in English to communicate security risks to other teams. *Relocation package is provided for this position* Hybrid Working Model WFH Set Up Allowance 30 Days of Remote Working from anywhere globally every year Employee discount for accommodation globally Global team of 90+ nationalities 40+ offices and 25+ countries Annual CSR / Volunteer Time off Benevity Since 1979, Seagate has been creating precision-engineered data storage technologies that deliver superior capacity, speed, safety, and performance. We are a diverse workforce of 40,000 creative, hard-working, passionate people all over the world—Silicon Valley, the Southeast Asia, India, China, the United Kingdom, and beyond. At Seagate, we know that data is always in motion, alive, connected—and we harness it in order to maximize human potential. Drive Korat Product Engineering is to achieve objectives of operational effectiveness in particular of Yield, Test Time, Quality and Customer Satisfaction. This is also including providing technical guidance across functions in-depth knowledge for problem-solving and deliver engineering solution for new product market launch. Be responsible to launch products per strategic Time-to-Market roadmap schedule and achieve the objectives of Operational Effectiveness in particular of Yield, Test Time, Quality and Customer Satisfaction for long run sustainability. Failure analysis to find root cause of design/manufacturing problem and initiate new technical engineering idea for solution and improve yield & quality. Can support and provide technical solution based on engineering knowledge to serve challenging business task. Able to prioritize multiple tasks, manage conflicting deadlines and work effectively in a dynamic environment. Excellent teamwork, leadership, organization, people management and presentation skills Ability to effectively plan, control and take responsibility for timeline and status update. Fluent in English communication both spoken and written. Energetic and passionate Understand basic knowledge of Hard Disk Drive fundamental. Well engineering knowledge about Magnetic properties and Laser Technology Prefer new graduate and former intern. Data Analytics to support Global trends. Programming skill is preferable on Python, Matlab, and Visual C Failure Analysis Korat, Thailand Our Korat facility is our largest manufacturing site worldwide, with almost 20,000 employees. Here, our team produces cloud-based storage equipment, from individual storage components to finish drives. Our employees enjoy ample on-site parking as well as free shuttle vans and buses within the city of Korat, to and from Bangkok, and on the weekend to and from Khon Kaen University. At work you can grab a delicious breakfast, lunch, dinner or snacks at one of our 24-7 on-site canteens or coffee shop. We offer ping-pong, a running/walking trail, basketball and volleyball teams, and classes in our on-site fitness center. We also have many on-site events and opportunities to give back to the local community. Location : Korat Thailand Travel : None

Job Title Modality Sales Specialist (HPM) Job Description Philips is a global leader in health technology, committed to improving billions of lives worldwide and striving to make the world healthier and more sustainable through innovation. Driven by the vision of a better tomorrow. But it’s not just what we do, it’s who we are. We are 80,000, wonderfully unique individuals, with two things in common. An unwavering sense of purpose and a relentless determination to deliver on our customers’ needs. It’s what inspires us to create meaningful solutions – the kind that make a real difference – when it matters most. The world and our customers’ needs are changing faster than ever before and while we are proud of what we do already, we know we can do more. That’s why we need you, to help us tackle increasingly complex challenges posed by ever evolving health and well-being needs. In this role, you have the opportunity to make life better Looking at the challenges the world is facing today Philips’ purpose has never been more relevant. So whatever your role, if you share our passion for helping others, you’ll be working towards creating a better and fairer future for all. You are responsible for Portfolio: Hospital Patient Monitors The role is responsible to develop and execute the Go-to-Market Strategy for Patient Monitoring IT solutions and Critical Care Information System, Medical Device Integration portfolio in alignment with Market's Business and overall Marketing Strategy. Be knowledge expert on product and drive overall business and product deal support by providing clinical and technical product (modality) expertise on the product / modality. Support the Modality Sales and Clinical teams as a One Point of Contact ensuring Marketing Strategy and execution plans are aligned. Work with the relevant stakeholders to ensure outstanding New Product Introductions and Regional product launches in line with the global and market business strategy. Support the Business Marketing Leader in the interaction with the business and especially the BMC (Business Market Combination) process. Participates in defining and controlling of the implementation of the business policy, pricing strategy and product/modality to be sold by the BU in the region, according to established guidelines. Partners with Marketing with input on sales tools, pricing issues and competitive threats which enable Marketing to best support the Specialists and provide input to the BG/BIU Prepares and delivers accurate business forecasting on a monthly via accurate lead and opportunity management To succeed in this role, you’ll need a customer-first attitude and the following Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Marketing/Business Management. 5 years of career experience. Experience in working in complex organizations in marketing or commercial function in a large Multinational Company. Customer focus, consultative solution selling and good problem-solving skills. Ability to build and nurture strong relationships within matrix by developing strong cooperation with peers, cross business, and cross function. Be the Point of contact and "go to" resource for modality sales specialist and clinical application teams. Ability to build capabilities, process design, ownership, and implementation. Can-do attitude, creative mindset, searching for solution, strong drive and focus on results, belief that we can win, ability to move or get around barriers to success. Seasoned professional in Lean methodology. In return, we offer you A path towards your most rewarding career. Philips is growing its marketing capability enterprise wide. Succeeding in this market-based role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career, in other areas in Philips or otherwise. We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person. Thus, we offer competitive health benefits, a flexible work schedule and access to local well-being focused activities. How we work at Philips Our newly-adopted hybrid work concept fuses flexibility with collaboration to deliver great outcomes for our people and our customers. We are embracing an approach wherein we spend more time together than apart – which for full-time employees translates to an average of at least 3 days working from the office and up to 2 days from home – for our hybrid roles. Hybrid work flexibility means people can meet the changing demands of work and home in the most balanced, productive, and healthy way. Our hybrid working model is defined in 3 ways: We believe in the importance of impactful collaboration: There's a certain energy when everyone’s in the same room that can heighten idea generation and creative friction needed for problem-solving. We embrace flexibility: Choosing where, when and how to work can vary according to task and team schedules. Flexibility isn’t office or online, it means choosing the space that works best for you, your teams and our customers on a case-by-case basis. We want to be at our best: The way we work and our workspaces are designed to support our well-being, offer career advancement opportunities, and enable us to be at our best. Why should you join Philips? Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on innovative, customer-first health technology solutions. Help us improve the health and well-being of billions of people, every year. Ultimately creating a career that no one could have planned for. Even you.

2.) Responsible for volume consolidation for total International Business
3) Work closely with trade marketing and sales to coordinate and synchronize commercial plans with volume sales
4) Work closely with supply and customer service team to monitor shipment and delivery
5) Create and maintain a usful tool for data consolidation and performance monitoring Qualification: If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter. Job Description: Not on a global job description. Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M. Please note: your application may not be considered if you do not provide your education and work history, either by: 1) uploading a resume, or 2) entering the information into the application fields directly. 3M Global Terms of Use and Privacy Statement Carefully read these Terms of Use before using this website. Your access to and use of this website and application for a job at 3M are conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with these terms. Please access the linked document by clicking here, select the country where you are applying for employment, and review. Before submitting your application you will be asked to confirm your agreement with the terms.

Company: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited
column8: Job Position Sales Manager Manage and direct sales force to achieve sales to government agencies. Understand customer needs and present cost-effective programs and solutions that will increase customer spend, loyalty and retention. Design and recommend sales program and set short and long-term sales strategies. Evaluate and implement appropriate new sales techniques to increase the company’s sales volume. Maximize revenue for designated account package by growing sales within existing accounts, expanding customer contacts, identifying and developing new opportunities at a level consistent with or exceeding company expectations. Drive the alignment to the sales and company strategies by creating operational plans and identifying areas for continuous improvement in the sales process. Engage with vendors and partners to create go-to-market strategies. Nurturing excellent business relations with a portfolio of key clients. Seeking out new business opportunities and liaise with stakeholders of the company. Proactively recruits new qualifying customer. Bachelor’s degree in IT , Engineering or related field. 7 years of channel sales experience in a business-to-business sales. Strong business acumen including negotiation skills Fluent in English both written and verbal (Minimum 750 TOEIC score). Ability to travel/ work upcountry and abroad.

Company: The International of School Hatyai Co., Ltd.
column8: Bloomsbury International School Hatyai seeks a caring, diligent and enthusiastic primary teacher to join our team for the next academic year. Job starts: August 14th 2024 Location: Hatyai, Thailand. Contract Type: Full Time Contract Term: 2 years, with a further 2-year contract extension available thereafter. Principal: Mr. David Tansey Located in the city of Hatyai in southern Thailand, Bloomsbury International School Hatyai is a co-educational International Independent School. Bloomsbury was founded in 2016 and offers a British style curriculum to both day and boarding students. Our Primary School is small with around 130 students, but this is expanding on a weekly basis due to our growing reputation. We are a caring, kind team, committed to every student achieving their very best. The students here universally want to do well, and all interactions are based upon obvious and clear respect. We have received our full accreditation from CIS, one of only 20 schools in Thailand to achieve this accolade. This is a great place to work, alongside a fully qualified, dedicated gand friendly staff team. The Position The Primary department has gained a reputation for excellence within the local community, and we wish the new teachers to develop that good practice still further. We have a well established and clear curriculum, based upon the English National Curriculum. We use Talk for Writing and White Rose Maths. We also have developed our own International Education Curriculum and our own Leadership Curriculum. It is expected that we will continue to develop our own wider curriculum offer still further next year. Pupils in Years 5 and 6, bring their own device to school and we fully embed Technology for Learning into most lessons when it enhances the learning. Our prime role is to develop the use of English in every lesson, as the vast majority of our students speak English as an additional language. Talk for Writing is central to our work and therefore a commitment to learning or better still experience of using it would be an advantage. As we are a small school, all of our staff need to be an integral part of the team. We have one class in each year but work collaboratively to develop our provision. We have some flexibility across the primary school as to where the successful candidate. Key Information All international staff are expected to be completely fluent in English. The successful candidate will: • Have UK qualified teacher status or equivalent. • Have a professional manner and the ability to communicate clearly and well • Be approachable, knowledgeable and committed to academic and personal excellence • Be caring and ready to collaborate in a professional team Location Hatyai is located in southern Thailand, only 40 minutes' drive from the nearest beach in Songkhla Town and within easy reach of Krabi, Phuket, Nakhon Si Thammarat, Koh Samui and Koh Lipe, as well as Penang and Langkawi across the border in Malaysia. The international airport offers 16 flights per day to Bangkok and daily flights to Singapore and Kuala Lumpur, both of which are only a short distance away,opening up the rest of Asia. It is easy to spend your weekends or holidays exploring this beautiful part of the world. Hatyai itself is an up and coming city without the high cost of living found in other more well known destinations in Thailand. There are large western style malls and supermarkets, and many bars and restaurants providing a range of international food, yet Hatyai retains a very 'Thai' feel and the population are very friendly and helpful, welcoming people with the famous 'Thai Smile'. To Apply Please upload your CV and a supporting statement of up two pages stating why you think you are good match for this role. We will be holding rolling interviews therefore early application is advised. For more information about the school, visit the website <www.bloomsbury.ac.th>. Applicants must provide 2 referees, one of which will be your current or most recent employer, Principal or equivalent.  If you do not wish us to contact your referees initially please make that clear on your application. We are committed to Child Protection and successful candidates will undergo background checks using the International Child Protection Certificate (ICPC). To apply, please use the "Apply Now" button below. Bloomsbury International School Hatyai, is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of all children and young people in our care and requires all applicants to share this commitment. We follow recruitment practices that are aligned with the recommendations of the International Task Force on Child Protection. All appointments are subject to an interview, satisfactory professional references and checks of identity, criminal records and qualifications.

[Summer Internship 2024] Customer Marketing Intern Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to know our team: At Agoda, the Marketing team consists of more than just marketers. We are smart analysts, talented creatives, gifted data scientists, and more. We turn consumer insights from our global products into compelling creatives and actionable steps. We create ideas, measure their impact, and analyze responses. We’re world leaders in online marketing and aim higher every day. The Opportunity: We value everything data: All that we do is based on data. We translate user attitudes into insights and consumer behavior into strategies. We encourage team members to own what they do and invest in their ideas, especially if they are supported by data. We have global impact: Agoda exists to make travel fun, affordable, and accessible no matter where our customers are in the world. Through experimenting and measuring, we strive for ideas that reach millions and innovations that generate real impact. We are dynamic: We move fast, so we are never bored of what we do. We support our team members to learn and grow on the job or try new initiatives. From loyalty to pricing to branding to analytics and more, there is plenty to explore In this role, you’ll get to: Be curious. Look for gaps in our existing portfolio and look for creative new ways to communicate important brand messages – drive the creative team to push boundaries; benchmark key competitors, but also strive to be a category leader Take ownership. Manage campaigns from end to end – the daily set-up of one-time and automated mobile campaigns. Work with the marketing team to develop/optimize existing products, manage targeting and segmentation, scheduling and deployment. Own the customer experience and ensure users remain engaged, optimized and active Think ahead. Manage the roadmap to document and schedule all experiments/campaigns delivered globally Look for opportunities. Optimize key metrics including CTR, open rates, and sales. Design new products and experiences to address key business needs Act fast. Champion best practices, industry trends, and ensure these are translated into tangible ideas and department frameworks Test, test and test some more. Develop an ongoing and detailed AB testing plan to help the continuous improvement of key metrics What you’ll need to succeed: Able to do the internship from 27th of May to 2nd August 2024 (10-week program) Currently a 3rd-year or below university student at a respected university Proficiency in MS Office Ability to prioritize and manage workload and meet critical project deadlines Ability to work independently, multi-task productively and be a team player Strong attention to detail Adaptable to new technologies and quick learner #Students #1 #summerintern Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. Get to Know our Team: The Global Service Delivery (GSD) team is responsible for Agoda’s office infrastructure and staff connectivity. We provide the hardware, software, and access to resources that allows staff to achieve their goals. We operate in 10 different countries, providing 24/7 support to all Agoda employees. Whether in the office, working remotely, or traveling, we enable everyone to stay connected. The GSD team uses state-of-the-art cloud management technologies combined with the best of on-site services to manage the latest hardware running Windows, macOS, and Linux. The Opportunity: For our team in Bangkok , we are looking for candidates with a high level of IT Support experience. Information Technology is Agoda’s core competency, and an IT career with us provides excellent growth opportunities in an exciting, multicultural environment. In this Role, you’ll get to: Track and monitor HR announcement to ensure all new hires are granted approved access rights of Agoda’s systems including Active directory and user’s mailboxes. Track and monitor HR announcement to ensure all access rights are removed once an employee leaves the company. Provide support and troubleshooting for requests received via ServiceDesk and ensure all requests are completed within the agreed SLA. User management. Handling user account creation and deletion, password change, account lockout issue Responsible for providing/removing access to shared folders. Managing Distribution Lists on Active Directory and Share Point. Responsible for resolving day-to-day issues as assigned to the GSD Operations team. Responsible for completing multiple projects on time and that they meet the given KPIs. Ability to make quick decisions, implement standards and best practices to improve the support processes. What you’ll need to succeed: Fluent in Thai and English Enthusiastic team player. Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or related field. Minimum 2 years’ experience in IT Helpdesk, Operations support Solid knowledge of SQL Database Server, Query Command are preferable. Good knowledge of Okta admin would be advantage. Good knowledge of Active directory management tools, Exchange and Share Point. Good knowledge of Azure AD, Exchange online or Microsoft Office 365 Customer Service minded, all the way. Great communication and interpersonal skills; a good sense of humor is always a plus. Organization and time management skills, analytical skills, attention to detail and accuracy Must demonstrate ownership and be both proactive and reactive. Computer proficiency in MS Office especially MS Excel is a plus. #bangkok #Thailand Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. Marketing Operation Specialist – Bangkok Based Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Our Meta-Search Engine team is seeking a specialist to join the team In this Role, you’ll get to: Handle data validation and processing in operational level aligned with standards and SLAs of MSE Mapping Operations. Analyze, report, and distribute validation results, suggest ideas with actionable plan to improve and develop both manual and automated workflows regarding quality and efficiency. Maintain and improve work standards and SOPs/guidelines, ensuring documents are always up to date. Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to improve quality of works regarding operational and/or technical approaches, also propose idea with actionable plan to standardize workflows and documents. Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues upon request. Support ad-hoc projects upon requests. This role is good for you if you: Are self-driven, self-organized and hard working: there is a lot to do here. It’s fun, rewarding and you will learn tons along the way, but it’s still a lot and we need someone who really wants to make a difference. Have the ambition to become something more: we hire for the long term and help people grow. You will learn a lot and get a real chance to progress in your career. Want a chance to learn how to innovate and always improve: Agoda is never happy with the status quo: we’re on a quest for continuous improvement. You will learn how to review what you do, how to analyze data, how to come up with ideas and how to validate hypothesis before testing them and seeing what kind of results you can actually drive yourself. What you’ll Need to Succeed: Undergraduate degree from an accredited university (fresh graduates are welcome). Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English; fluency in other languages is a plus. Experiencing in day-to-day operations in tech or Hospitality/OTA industry is a plus. Data-driven, analytical, and detail-oriented mindsets are required. Ability to work under pressure and time-constraint environment; fast learner, adapts well to and is energized by change. Ability to self-manage, multi-task, communicate effectively, work independently, and work as a team; proactive, friendly, with a sense of ownership. [Summer Internship 2024] CEG Project Management Intern Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Get to know our team: The Customer Experience Group (CEG) of Agoda effectively serves our customers and partners to ensure satisfying results. This great task is accomplished with the support of our Global Service Vertical team. We serve as the backbone for Customer Experience Group’s global operations. Our team is comprised of project managers, process owners, analysts, and talent management. Together we to improve the quality and efficiency of our customer and partner support processes. Working with the Global Service Vertical team is a great opportunity to collaborate with various stakeholders and develop initiatives with other subsidiaries of Booking Holdings and external partners all over the world. We are a very data-driven environment, eager to move fast and learn through experimentation. A clear focus on supporting our customers and partners is bolstered by a strong, entrepreneurial culture that enriches us and Agoda’s business performance. The opportunity: , where we support new business initiatives, improve and maintain efficiency and effectiveness of processes, and lead changes to improve customer and partner experience. In this role, you’ll get to: Facilitate collaboration and effective coordination across various Agoda departments and teams within CEG to achieve project milestones and support business initiatives. Uncover opportunities, and analyze issues, identify risks, and propose solutions to be implemented Support projects aimed at improving and maintaining operational KPIs such as service level (SL), customer satisfaction (CSAT), net promoter score (NPS), quality of service, partners satisfaction, productivity, costs, etc. Define and design action plans for initiatives in partnership with management team Resolve problems through data analysis and effectively communicate your findings Ensure calibration between project teams and other stakeholders as well as provide efficient and regular reporting to management You may be involved in operational flow configuration, analysis aimed at improving processes, activity automation, and new product improvement implementation. This is a hands-on role where you may have to conduct many of your own data analyses (SQL, Metabase, ThoughtSpot, & Tableau) and/or build on a low-code/simplified JavaScript tool. You will likely need a blend of technical, analytical, and project management/communication skills to be successful in this role. What You’ll need to succeed Able to do the internship from 27th of May to 2nd August 2024 (10-week program) Currently a 3rd-year or below university student at a respected university Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic, multicultural environment Positive attitude and openness to learn and adapt Fluent in English both spoken and written Structured logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Jobtitle: [Cooperative Internship 2024] Database Administrator Intern, Data Team
column8: [Cooperative Internship 2024] Database Administrator Intern, Data Team Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. The Opportunity: Agoda is looking for internship student who is interested to know how we manage database infrastructure for 1000+ database servers with milliseconds response time and more than 99.9999% uptime of MSSQL Server Databases. You will be involved in the database design, data managing and database development with automated database Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. You will learn how to build docker image for product development team in order to use in their development life cycle. In this Role, you’ll get to: Build database docker in different engines to provide for developer to use in their development Develop database SQL code with quality and performance optimization Setup migrate and re-architect Agoda production database to support business growth. Proactive monitoring to detect unusual behavior on production database i.e. high query resource usage, unusual database traffic, database server capacity and coordinate with Engineering team to optimize query performance before it affects to user experience. Research and implement automation tool to help reduce human time on daily basis i.e. Installation and upgrade tool, Database deployment tool, Anomaly Detection, etc. What you’ll Need to Succeed: B.Sc. in Computer Science / Information Systems / Computer Engineering or related field Understand database design concept, ER diagram and ability to write SQL query Love to solve problem with good analysis skill and always try to make thing better Familiar with relational and/or non-relational databases Excellent English written and verbal communication It’s Great if you have: Have knowledge about database high availability or query performance tuning Knowledge in Docker or Kubernates Practical knowledge with database management, Windows, Powershell, Linux and shell script Proficient in Python #students #cooperativeintern Equal Opportunity Employer At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. Marketing Specialist – Bangkok Based Apply Now Bangkok, Thailand About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. Our Meta-Search Engine team is seeking a specialist to join the team In this Role, you’ll get to: Handle data validation and processing in operational level aligned with standards and SLAs of MSE Mapping Operations. Analyze, report, and distribute validation results, suggest ideas with actionable plan to improve and develop both manual and automated workflows regarding quality and efficiency. Maintain and improve work standards and SOPs/guidelines, ensuring documents are always up to date.
