If you receive an offer or information from someone purporting to be an employee of Hitachi Solutions from any other domain, it may not be legitimate. Hitachi Solutions is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at all levels. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status. We are committed to creating a workplace that is inclusive and welcoming to everyone, and we believe that a diverse workforce is essential to our success. We encourage all qualified applicants to apply for our job openings and we will consider all candidates for employment regardless of their background.

Location: Bangkok, Thailand Thales people architect identity management and data protection solutions at the heart of digital security. Business and governments rely on us to bring trust to the billons of digital interactions they have with people. Our technologies and services help banks exchange funds, people cross borders, energy become smarter and much more. More than 30,000 organizations already rely on us to verify the identities of people and things, grant access to digital services, analyze vast quantities of information and encrypt data to make the connected world more secure.Thales has been present in Thailand since the early 1990s, opening its first representative office in Bangkok in 2005. Today, Thales Thailand employs 45 people, and has numerous programmes and achievements to its name in both the civil and defence sectors. The Group is a long-term strategic supplier of defence systems for the Royal Thai Army and Navy. In aerospace, Thales plays a key strategic role, delivering country-wide solutions to Thai customers in the area of air traffic management, radars and navigation aids. Thales is supplying ground transportation solutions to the main and urban rail lines in the area of signalling and fare collection. Role & Responsibilities: System Administrator-Linux (Infrastructure Engineer) will be responsible for deploy, operate, and maintain the enterprise IT infrastructure solution including Server Hardware, Server Virtualization on VMware and Orcale OVM, Network Storage SAN & NAS, RHEL Servers and Windows Servers, Pace-maker Cluster. He/she will provide 2nd level support to Service Desk team and response to NOC calls. Main Activities / Tasks: Responsible forday-to-day operations and administration of Data center IT Infrastructure consisting Server Hardware, Server Virtualization on VMware and Orcale OVM, Network Storage SAN & NAS, RHEL and Windows Servers their HA/Clustering Configurations, Perform daily system monitoring andproactively handle events, incidents and resolve reported problems Installation, configuration and maintenance of IT-system infrastructure in accordance to the security standard and change management policy Performpreventive maintenance of IT-system infrastructure, and patching in accordance to corporate vulnerability and patch management policy. Support and maintain branch-offices system infrastructure Maintain and update on a comprehensive IT-System documentations. Coordinate with vendors for third level support to ensure performance and high availability of the IT-Systems. Support application team in various system setup related to IT-system configuration. Maintain & execution of IT Disaster Recovery Plan consisting of Hypervisors, RHEL&Windows Server, and SAN&NAS Storage. Execution per an assignment tasks until an internal projects, ensure completion in accordance to target schedule. Job location and schedule Bangkok, Thailand (occasionally Ayutthaya/Bang pa-in) 24 x 7 Standby / On-Call Availability (based on duty roster schedule assignment) 9.00 am to 6.00 pm Not limit to working overtime/overnight until holidays per any incidents or working schedule Knowledge and skills Experience in installation, configuration and maintenance of datacenter solution such VMware vSphere ESXi and vCenter HA&Cluster, Oracle OVM, RHEL Cluster Servers, SAN Storage, SAN Switches, Data replication, and Windows servers. Experience in configuration and administration of Hardware Server, Blade server. Experience in Security hardening on RHEL and Windows Server OS Experience in provisioning and configuring SAN/NAS storage and logical volumes. Hands-on experience in supporting & troubleshooting Cluster servers, such as RHEL, Oracle-OVM, and VMware Hypervisors, Experience in patching server operating system, appliance firmware upgrade, and server software upgrades. Familiar with server Access controls, AAA, RBAC, ACL, Active directory integration, Windows and Linux Firewall policy configuration and support. Knowledge in IT/Infrastructure Security Compliance Experience in integrating system Infrastructure with enterprise monitoring (ELK, Log point, SolarWinds Centreon) Understanding of ITIL process incident management, change management and problem management. Education, qualifications Bachelor degree in IT or computer engineering RHCE certification. Minimum 3 years’ experience in an enterprise environment ITIL and/or VMware certifications is a plus Able to communicate in English Experience 3-5 year technical experience in supporting datacenter IT-system infrastructure. Familiar with Network infrastructure, Security and Risk Management Others Good communication skill Positive working attitude with high integrity Ability to work efficiently and independently in a fast-paced, governmental environment. Please note that this position needs to be 100% onsite The work location is DCA (Department of Consular Affairs): Department of Consular Affairs123 Chaengwattana roadThung song hongLak si 10210Bangkok, Thailand At Thales we provide CAREERS and not only jobs. With Thales employing 80,000 employees in 68 countries our mobility policy enables thousands of employees each year to develop their careers at home and abroad, in their existing areas of expertise or by branching out into new fields. Together we believe that embracing flexibility is a smarter way of working. Great journeys start here, apply now!

Helping Tier-1 businesses across Telcos, BFSI and Utility sectors to fast track their digital transformation journey to digital maturity using our innovative digital platforms, niche consulting and next generation services. Value partnership on large transformation projects Digital Services – Deploy people, technology, processes that gives Tier-1 businesses the advantage of Digital transformation Consulting – Bespoke consulting models to help Tier-1 businesses align business and IT needs efficiently and unravel new opportunities. Digital Products – Products that power Tier-1 businesses to attain business excellence, add intelligence to their existing operations and to deliver superior customer experience. The Role Role : Finance Manager Experience : 4+ years Location : Sathorn, AIA Building, Bangkok Job Type : Permanent/Work from office. Roles and Responsibilities. • Perform a variety of advanced financial analyses to determine present and forecasted financial health of the company • Use financial modeling to simulate financial scenarios • Present potential scenarios and outcomes to management team • Manage the preparation and publication of departmental and organization financial documents • Collaborate with management on development and execution of funding strategies • Examine financial and legal documents to verify accuracy and adherence to financial regulations and acceptable financial principles • Develop or recommend solutions for problems or situations Ideal Profile You have at least 1 year experience within a Finance role, ideally within the IT Services industry. You are a strong team player who can manage multiple stakeholders You possess strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data You are highly goal driven and work well in fast paced environments What's on Offer? Work alongside & learn from best in class talent A role that offers a breadth of learning opportunities Fantastic work culture

Improving system quality by identifying issues and common patterns, and developing standard operating procedures. Enhancing applications by identifying opportunities for improvement, making recommendations and designing and implementing systems. Maintaining and improving existing codebases and peer review code changes. Liaising with colleagues to implement technical designs. Investigating and using new technologies where relevant. Providing written knowledge transfer material. Must be able to communicate in English and Thai Requirements Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology or related fields. At least 3 or more years of experience as Mendix Developer. Professional with good attitude and service mind. Strong analytical and reasoning skills with an ability to visualize processes and outcomes. Experience in JAVA,CSS projects will be considered as a plus. Good communication skill in listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Know low-code method is preferable. Hands-on experience in Oracle and MySQL.

Company Description At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible. At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon. We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future. Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too. We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands. Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Perform the Validation and Qualification of the Slider Fabrication Process. Project management in order to intercept the new process into the new product. Electrical performance data analysis. Component data qualification. Process Data and Failure Analysis. Contact key stakeholders with Slider Process Development and Wafer in the USA Team. Qualifications REQUIRED: A Bachelor’s Degree or Higher in Electronics, Engineering or Physical Sciences, Physics, or related field. At least 5-7 years of experience as a Process Engineer in the Electronics Industry. Having experience in Slider Fab Process or Hard Drive Technology would be an advantage. PREFERRED: Data analysis Project management SKILLS: Able to work independently and stand-alone, strong leadership, and good team player Passion and innovative Demonstrate a high-to-fluent level of English proficiency (spoken/reading/written). Additional Information Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution. Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at staffingsupport@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

Company Description At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible. At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon. We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future. Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too. We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands. Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Completes assigned tasks that meet quality, functionality and schedule objectives. Provides verbal and written status including reports to the Lead Engineer and the Department Manager. Under Lead Engineer’s direction, helps identify and resolve issues by participating in DOE discussions and subsequently collecting and analyzing data. Handles specific tasks associated with component level checkout of preamps and Read Channel ICs. Contributes to the debug of any cross-functional related issues during drive integration. Collects and analyzes data for functional design reviews. Helps prepare Readiness review materials and preview content with the Lead Engineer. In any activity requiring cross-functional effort, during Lead’s absence, the Development Engineer would represent the System Engineering and help make trade-offs in evaluating various options. After a product has been transferred off-shore, Development Engineer will provide appropriate support in resolving new technical issues, reviewing data for new/revised components etc. Mentor interns and junior engineers. May provide input on hiring decisions of technical team members. Develops and prioritizes own and others’ goals and workloads to meet project objectives and deadlines. Influences team decisions and results. Requires only general supervision and little guidance. Understanding of basic principles in most functional areas such as RSS, Servo, Mechanical, Material Science and controller Able to make system-level decisions based on understanding of interdependencies between competing interests from different functional groups to obtain the best trade-offs under a specific application / condition. Recommend, devise, and implement technical solutions and understand trade-offs. Provide input to program / project technical strategy. Follows department/work group processes, recommends improvements to them and develops new processes. Able to document and publish technical documentations for general consumption. Has broad knowledge of general business operations. Knows & comprehend individual and project goals. Understand the practical implications of one’s work on operations or vice versa (e.g. materials availability, volume manufacturing environment). Sees issues from customer’s perspective and develops rapport with customers. Acts in a responsive and flexible manner to balance customer requests with established priorities. Understands impact of individual projects/process on customer’s process and productivity. Proficiently uses standard and specialized engineering tools and equipment used by the discipline and/or department. Uses PC, Emulator, Bus Analyzer, SIO Interface, and able to instrument using various equipment such as scope, logic analyzer, and other lab tools. Read, analyze, and interpret documents such as technical reports, instructions, and procedures and scientific journals Write technical reports/documentation, department procedures and business correspondence with good grammar, spelling, punctuation and structure. ·Proficiently apply principles of advanced calculus, modern algebra, advanced statistical theory, advanced mathematical concepts such as limits, rings, quadratic and differential equations, permutations, proofs of theorems, exponents, logarithms. Proficiently apply mathematical operations to such tasks as frequency distribution, determination of test reliability and validity, analysis of variance, correlation techniques, sampling theory, and factor analysis. Define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions. Interpret an extensive variety of technical instructions in written, mathematical or diagram form. Apply principles of logical or scientific thinking. Deal with nonverbal symbolism (formulas, scientific equations, graphs, etc.,) in its most difficult phases. Deal with a variety of abstract and concrete variables. Qualifications REQUIRED: Bachelor's in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering + 5 - 7 years. related experience Master degree  in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering + 3 - 5 years. related experience SKILLS: Ability to multi-task. Ability to speak, read and write English. Knows basic budgets/costs of program/project and their impact. Ability to present information, ideas, perspective, to peers, team members and managers and respond to questions effectively . Speak effectively one-on-one and in small group situations. Productivity tools such MS Office a must Additional Information Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution. Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at staffingsupport@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.

The opportunity EY’s consulting professionals bring a wealth of experience in working with major financial institutions to align their operating model and infrastructure to business strategy. We assemble the right multi-disciplinary teams, use consistent and proven global methodologies and tools, and draw on the full breadth of EY’s global network, to deliver value and trusted advice to the clients. Our key service offerings cover business and technology strategy & transformation, customer and distribution effectiveness, operations, shared services / outsourcing support, performance management, program advisory, enterprise intelligence, risk management and regulatory change. Your key responsibilities As a Delivery Lead, you will lead a team of EY consultants, technical architects and engineers in the implementation of Digital Banking Initiatives . You will hold ownership and accountability on the delivery of quality deliverables, working and communicating effectively with the engagement team and client’s team to ensure exceptional performance. Functioning as a mix between a Programme Manager and a Lead Business Analyst, you will need to be able to manage the overall programme whilst at the same time be sufficiently proficient in requirements gathering, analysis and working with a technology-centric team to understand and orchestrate the technicalities of the project. Often functioning as the Voice of the Customer, you will be the glue between client/business and technology and ensuring that business requirements are clearly understood by the technical team and on the flipside ensure that any technical limitations or constraints can be easily understood by the business team. Skills and attributes for success Good understanding of Mobile Banking Trends , ability to interpret their impact on customers, and experience in implementation of such initiatives in Thailand and / or ASEAN Strong techno-functional background and good understanding of Digital Banking Architecture Strong leadership and team management skills, with prior experience in leading delivery teams both locally and across borders Possess strong interpersonal and teaming skills, and experienced in engaging with both business stakeholders and technical stakeholders Strong presentation skills and proficiency in the use of PowerPoint, Word and Excel To qualify for the role you must have Thai nationality Minimum 8-10 years’ experience in the Thai Retail Banking industry, with a focus on digital/ mobile banking initiatives . Experience with relevant FinTech ecosystems and system integration would also be looked upon favorably. Academic background in Engineering, IT, Finance or Banking Successful delivery leadership of large scale banking technology projects Experience in agile delivery methodologies, e.g. sprints, product backlogs, user stories Track record of managing cross functional and cross-border teams Track record dealing with senior stakeholders and adapting to demanding environments Fluency in Thai and English language is mandatory If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible. The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build. EY | Building a better working world EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer (React) to join our team and help us build and maintain innovative web applications. The Software Engineer (React) will be responsible for creating interactive user interfaces using the React JavaScript library, as well as collaborating with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver high-quality software solutions. Requirements Responsibilities Developing and maintaining user-facing features using the React library. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and test software solutions. Writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code Troubleshooting and debugging issues as they arise Keeping up to date with emerging trends and best practices in front-end development Participating in code reviews and contributing to a positive team culture. Ensuring that software is delivered on time and meets the requirements of stakeholders. Preferred Qualifications: Bacheor's degree in Computer Science or a related field Proven experience as a React Developer or similar role. Strong proficiency in JavaScript, CSS, and HTML Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous data fetching Knowledge of modern front-end development tools and frameworks such as webpack, babel, and npm Experience with version control systems such as Git Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Strong verbal and written communication skills Preferred Qualifications: Experience with server-side rendering and/or Next.js Familiarity with testing frameworks such as Jest or Enzyme Knowledge of GraphQL and Apollo Client Understanding of UX design principles and accessibility best practices

Description Digital Alchemy, a global Marketing Automation Services Provider, provides marketing services and technical support to local and global organizations.  We have a network of 8 offices spanning Asia and the Americas.  Our philosophy is based on the interaction of 3 transformations, 1. Our personal Transformation to learn and develop; 2. Transformation of the markets we operate in through our work; and 3. Transformation of the world that we live in through the development and support of sustainable enterprises that benefit under privileged communities and reduce the degradation of our environment. Digital Alchemy is an inclusive and diverse employer, we do not discriminate on any basis including gender, ethnicity, religious background, sexuality and any other factors, we actively recruit for a strong diverse workforce. You'll be experienced with  SQL, ETL, Unix and database systems and supporting the internal teams in implementing our marketing automation solutions and contributing from the data engineering side to the delivery of high-quality API-first data solutions. Role & Responsibilities: Dissecting how client's businesses operate and understanding their marketing processes to provide the best solution. Advise & improve on business processes to support and empower internal teams to provide excellent service to stakeholders/clients. Interact with clients and subject matter experts to meet business requirements Understanding of customer data and provide business consultation based on data element Responsible for incident management and maintaining a high service level for client service and satisfaction by meeting the needs and requests of clients in a complete and timely manner. Design, develop and maintain data models and ETL solutions that meet requirement specifications Execute unit tests, support system integration tests, deployment and post verification test Develop technical specifications and support manuals for data acquisition, transformation and load/transfer processes from a variety of data sources Support the implementation and application of in-house marketing automation solutions in the lifecycle of the change request. Qualifications: Degree in IT or any related field 3 - 5 years working experience in Business Analyst and Database Developer Demonstrated knowledge & understanding of SQL, ETL, Unix, APIs and Programming languages (eg: NodeJS/ Perl/Shell/Java/PHP), enterprise job scheduling tool and database systems Excellent verbal, written and client facing communication skills Strong demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills Willingness to take on responsibility and work in a challenging and high-pressure environment Ability to learn new technologies and tools for various projects Attention to detail and multi-tasking capability

Want to be a part of our team? The Specialist: GTM Practice Solutions participates in the delivery of solution design, configuration and escalated problem management of solutions and services in client environments. This position is required to offer pre-sales support by identifying opportunities and contributing to the design and configuration requirements related to client proposals. The Specialist: GTM Practice Solutions works towards expert level certification, whilst at the same time developing business knowledge. Develops specific marketing plans and activities for specific product(s) or product line(s) to establish, enhance or distinguish product placement within the competitive arena. Develops business plans and product positioning in the marketplace. Oversees market research, monitors competitive activity and identifies customer needs. Establishes pricing strategies. Works with engineering, manufacturing and sales to develop new products or enhance existing product(s) or product line(s). Working at NTT Key Roles and Responsibilities: Participate in the creation and delivery of technical solutions to clients by engaging with them during the planning and solution definition phase and defining the standards of work (SoW). Offer detailed technical support in the analysis of user and technical requirements, specifications development, solution design and development, propose technical solutions and provide a high-level design of technical or service solutions to meet the client’s requirements. Provide user support and assist with troubleshooting and design, configuration and escalated problem management. Participate in the development of technical training and training programs. Identify opportunities and contribute subject matter expertise to the design and configuration requirements in relation to RFP / RFI and proposals of low complexity. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define the solution roadmap and milestones. Work on strategic projects that enhance current solution concepts and/or the creation of new ones. Work closely with the sales team to evaluate and activate new accounts. Contribute to the knowledge base of solutions and services by sharing best practices and lessons learnt with clients. Understand the client’s environment, business needs and provide expertise and consulting on the relevant solutions. Work closely with vendors to understand their strategies for solutions and services, can articulate the roadmap, and associated impacts for clients. Knowledge, Skills and Attributes: Strong understanding of IT industry environment and business needs Demonstrate knowledge of market, verticals, horizontals, business administration and business change inability to lead technical design workshops with the client and NTT stakeholders Possess good technical, quantitative and analytical skills Possess the ability to work with clients and business teams to create client-orientated solutions and services Demonstrate interpersonal skills with the ability to develop and maintain strong stakeholder relationships Ability to recognise opportunities for enhancement and continuous improvement Ability to engage with a variety of stakeholders and colleagues at all levels Ability to establish and manage processes and practices through collaboration and the understanding of business Ability to manage urgent and complex tasks simultaneously Academic Qualifications and Certifications: Bachelor’s degree - BSc / Bcom Informatics Qualification preferred Project Management certification Required Experience: Demonstrable experience in a similar role within a related environment Experience working across multiple domains Project management experience Demonstrated experience working with clients to understand their requirements and define appropriate solutions What will make you a good fit for the role? Standard career level descriptor for job level: • Seasoned and experienced professional • Has full understanding of specialisation area • Resolves wide range of issues in creative ways • Fully qualified, career level, career journey-orientated • Uses good judgement in selecting tools and methods to solve problems • Networks with senior internal and external people in own area of expertise • Receives little instruction on day-to-day work, receives general instructions on new assignments • Typically requires demonstrable related experience with a Bachelor’s or equivalent degree; or moderate level experience and a Master’s or equivalent degree; or a PhD or equivalent degree without experience; or equivalent work experience Equal Opportunity Employer NTT is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category

Jobtitle: Clinical Sales Specialist - Negative Pressure Wound Therapy (NPWT)
column8: 3M has a long-standing reputation as a company committed to innovation. We provide the freedom to explore and encourage curiosity and creativity. We gain new insight from diverse thinking, and take risks on new ideas. Here, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter. Job Description: Purpose This position is accountable for execution of the sales plan / account plan developed by Sales Manager (SM) in order to meet set revenue and growth targets. This position supports the sales manager to work closely with our customers and clinical team to ensure that education is delivered to patients, carers, medical and nursing staff in assigned areas in response to the needs of the customer, and in alignment with account planning and overall tactical sales plans. Principal Accountabilities/Key Responsibilities ·       Work under supervision of SM to deliver the sales target and other business goals on quarterly and annual basis. ·       Work with SM to consistently build strong customer demand and preference for 3M NPWT products and services including engaging Key Opinion Leaders in respective accounts. ·       Generating demand of 3M NPWT products and initiates sales process by prospecting, scheduling of appointments, conducting sales presentations, understanding business needs, develop proposals and sales closure. ·       Drives advocacy for 3M NPWT products by ensuring up-to-date knowledge of both product and clinical evidence to hospital customers, and by providing the necessary clinical support in the respective accounts. ·       Proactively keeping up to date on product knowledge and market trend by participating in educational opportunities offered by company or other appropriate channels. ·       Accountable for customer satisfaction and providing high quality service. ·       Responsible for keeping commitments in a timely manner and resolving issues promptly. ·       Monitors and reports to SM any marketing information and competitor sales and product strategies. ·       Participates in all trade shows, conferences and other projects as determined by SM. ·       Conducts all business activities according to applicable rules and regulations and observes all company policy and procedures to ensure meeting ethical standards and compliance obligations. Position Qualifications, Experience & Skills ·       Bachelor’s degree in related field of medical science or nursing or clinical medicine related disciplines, working in medical device business ·       2 to 4 years’ sales experience in Advanced Wound Care or Orthopedic Trauma or Negative Pressure Wound Therapy is preferred. ·       Good data analysis skill, strong interpersonal communication and clinical selling approach ·       Good command of both written and speaking English. ·       Self-motivated; willing to learn and to take responsibility, matured. ·       Able to work under time pressure and work independently. ·       Good at presentation and facilitation. ·       Team-spirited and good interpersonal skills. ·       Proficient in relevant Microsoft Office applications. Learn more about 3M’s creative solutions to the world’s problems at www.3M.com or on Twitter @3M.Our approach to flexibility is called Work Your Way, which puts employees first and drives well-being in ways that enable 3M’s business and performance goals. You have flexibility in where and when work gets done. It all depends on where and when you can do your best work. Please note: your application may not be considered if you do not provide your education and work history, either by: 1) uploading a resume, or 2) entering the information into the application fields directly. 3M Global Terms of Use and Privacy Statement Carefully read these Terms of Use before using this website. Your access to and use of this website and application for a job at 3M are conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with these terms. Please access the linked document by clicking here, select the country where you are applying for employment, and review. Before submitting your application you will be asked to confirm your agreement with the terms.

Company Description Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials. The company’s products and solutions, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. The company employs approximately 36,000 employees in more than 50 countries. Reported sales in 2021 were $8.4 billion. Learn more at www.averydennison.com. Job Description ABOUT YOUR ROLE :You will be responsible for sales and account management for existing customers and develop new customers to achieve budgeted sales and profit contribution. You will report to the Sales Manager and will be based in Bang Na YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE: Grow the business by managing existing accounts and identifying new potential customers., Promote the use of products to new and existing customers through the application of selling skills and building relationships with all levels within the target customers. Understand our Product Portfolio and Sales Process. Solving technical issues with close coordination with the Quality Assurance & Technical Support Team. Manage market intelligence and monitor market trends in the region. Actively involved in timely collections from the customers Prepare regular reports, both for Internal and Customers like Sales Forecast, Customers’ Sales Forecast, Competitor Activity, Pricing Movements, Customer Complaints etc. Qualifications Diploma/ Bachelor's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management or equivalent. 3 years + experience in Sales/Marketing/Business Development. Experience in Packaging/Chemicals/Ink/Labels/Digital Printing/Die Cutting/Manufacturing is preferred. Willing to travel. Individuals are able to showcase scalability. Or rather, the capability to cope and perform under increased or expanding responsibilities. Additional Information AVERY DENNISON IS AN EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY PROVIDER

Donaldson is committed to solving the world’s most complex filtration challenges. Employing innovation and breakthrough solutions, we are advancing filtration for a cleaner world. We look for the best people to help us succeed, offering opportunities to learn, effect change, and make meaningful contributions at work and in our communities. This is a place where you can make a world of difference. ​ Follow Us on LinkedIn: Key Accountabilities: Develop business plan to optimize sales and profits. Implement strategies and action plan. Co-work with Strategic Accounts Managers to establish productive, professional relationships with key personnel in assigned customer accounts for profitable sales growth (prospect accounts and existing accounts) Grow sales and meet revenue targets by increasing revenue spend per customer and by identifying, developing and closing new sales opportunities. Develop, recommend, and implement pricing strategies. Enhance product coverage. Develops and maintains market share information and competitive data to be used in the development of market, product, strategic and annual plans. Key Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical, Civil, Chemical, Material or its equivalent. At least 5 years of Technical Selling experience in related industry or products. Proven track record in managing new business development. Good negotiation, influencing and follow up skills. Excellence sales, negotiation and team building skills and techniques are required. Consistent achievement of sales goals. Proven ability to manage major program and major customer penetration and account maintenance is required. Technical sales experience and/or possess strong technical aptitude. Ability to build and maintain long-term customer relationships. Ability to multi-task and prioritize customer needs. Computer literacy and proficiency in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation software is required. Excellent oral and written communications skills are also required. Experience with Microsoft Dynamics or related CRM system. Managing and measuring work. Influencing others. Good business acumen. Managing up and across (Sharing of information with management) English is a must. Conversant in multiple SE Asian languages would be a plus. Extensive travel required.
